Tom likes tea better than coffee.
arabic: توم يحب الشاي أكثر من القهوة.
transliteration: twm yḥb alshay akthr mn alqhwh.

english: Tom lives in a poor neighborhood.
Tom pretended that he didn't see Mary.
arabic: تظاهر توم بأنه لم يرى ماري.
transliteration: tẓahr twm banh lm yrā mary.

english: Tom served two terms in Congress.
Tom stole money from his friends.
Tom turned on the kitchen faucet.
Tom wanted to have dinner in bed.
Tom was not invited to the party.
Tom was supposed to meet me here.
arabic: كان مفترضا أن يقابلني توم هنا.
transliteration: kan mftrḍa an yqablny twm hna.

arabic: ذهب توم لمركز المدينة بعد الظهر.
transliteration: dhhb twm lmrkz almdynh bʿd alẓhr.

english: Tom went to Boston with a friend.
arabic: ذهب توم إلى بوسطن مع صديق.
transliteration: dhhb twm ilā bwsṭn mʿ ṣdyq.

english: Tom's clothes are out of fashion.
Tomorrow is my first day of work.
arabic: غدا هو أول يوم عمل لي.
transliteration: ghda hw awl ywm ʿml ly.

english: We accept all major credit cards.
arabic: نقبل الدفع بأي نوع من بطاقات الإئتمان المعروفة.
transliteration: nqbl aldfʿ bay nwʿ mn bṭaqat aliئtman almʿrwfh.

english: We agreed to share the housework.
arabic: اتفقنا على توزيع مهام تنظيف البيت فيما بيننا.
transliteration: atfqna ʿlā twzyʿ mham tnẓyf albyt fyma bynna.

english: We arrived at the office on time.
arabic: وصلنا إلى المكتب في الوقت المطلوب.
transliteration: wṣlna ilā almktb fy alwqt almṭlwb.

english: We came back by way of Hong Kong.
arabic: عدنا بالمرور من خلال هونج كونج.
transliteration: ʿdna balmrwr mn khlal hwnj kwnj.

english: We enjoyed swimming in the river.
We felt the house shake a little.
We got up at four in the morning.
We had a good time playing cards.
arabic: أمضينا وقتاً ممتعاً و نحن نلعب الورق.
transliteration: amḍyna wqtaan mmtʿaan w nḥn nlʿb alwrq.

english: We had a good time playing chess.
arabic: أمضينا وقتاً ممتعاً و نحن نلعب الشطرنج.
transliteration: amḍyna wqtaan mmtʿaan w nḥn nlʿb alshṭrnj.

english: We had no choice but to go there.
arabic: لم يكن لدينا خيار إلا الذهاب إلى هناك.
transliteration: lm ykn ldyna khyar ila aldhhab ilā hnak.

english: We have breakfast in the kitchen.
We have little chance of winning.
We have to be ready for anything.
arabic: يجب ان نكون مستعدين لأي شيء
transliteration: yjb an nkwn mstʿdyn lay shyء

english: We live in a three-bedroom house.
arabic: نعيش في بيت فيه ثلاثة غرف نوم.
transliteration: nʿysh fy byt fyh thlathh ghrf nwm.

english: We must cancel our trip to Japan.
arabic: علينا أن نلغي رحلتنا إلى اليابان.
transliteration: ʿlyna an nlghy rḥltna ilā alyaban.

english: We must not speak in the library.
We need to get rid of the guards.
We sat in the center of the room.
We sat in the center of the room.
We saw a funny movie last Sunday.
arabic: شاهدنا فلماً مضحكاً يوم الأحد الماضي.
transliteration: shahdna flmaan mḍḥkaan ywm alaḥd almaḍy.

english: We should have been more careful.
arabic: كان من المفترض أن نكون حذرين أكثر.
transliteration: kan mn almftrḍ an nkwn ḥdhryn akthr.

english: We shouldn't have let Tom escape.
arabic: كان علينا ألا نسمح لسامي بأن يهرب.
transliteration: kan ʿlyna ala nsmḥ lsamy ban yhrb.

english: We stayed there for three months.
We stayed there for three months.
We still have a lot of food left.
arabic: ما زال لدينا الكثير من الطعام.
transliteration: ma zal ldyna alkthyr mn alṭʿam.

english: We watched the soccer game on TV.
arabic: شاهدنا مباراة كرة القدم على التلفاز.
transliteration: shahdna mbarah krh alqdm ʿlā altlfaz.

english: We went out in spite of the rain.
We went to the movies last night.
We will play soccer after school.
We're going to Boston to see Tom.
arabic: سوف نذهب إلى بوسطن حتى نرى توم.
transliteration: swf ndhhb ilā bwsṭn ḥtā nrā twm.

english: We're going to have a test today.
What are you going to do tonight?
What are you going to do with it?
What did you do on your vacation?
What did you do with that camera?
What did you do with that camera?
arabic: ما الذي فعلته بآلة التصوير تلك؟
transliteration: ma aldhy fʿlth bālh altṣwyr tlk؟

english: What did you do with those books?
What did you do with those books?
What did you major in at college?
arabic: ما الشهادة التي تخرجت بها من الجامعة؟
transliteration: ma alshhadh alty tkhrjt bha mn aljamʿh؟

english: What did you major in at college?
What did you major in at college?
arabic: ما المجال الذي قمت بدراسته في الجامعة؟
transliteration: ma almjal aldhy qmt bdrasth fy aljamʿh؟

english: What do you do in your free time?
What do you say to taking a rest?
What do you think of my new coat?
What he needs most is a good job.
arabic: ما يحتاجه حقاً هو وظيفة جيدة.
transliteration: ma yḥtajh ḥqaan hw wẓyfh jydh.

english: What is the matter with your car?
What kind of surgery do you need?
What made you come here so early?
arabic: ما الذي جاء بك إلى هنا باكراً هكذا؟
transliteration: ma aldhy jaء bk ilā hna bakraan hkdha؟

english: What season do you like the best?
arabic: أي فصل من فصول السنة تحب أكثر؟
transliteration: ay fṣl mn fṣwl alsnh tḥb akthr؟

english: What time do you leave your work?
arabic: في أي وقت تخرج من عملك؟
transliteration: fy ay wqt tkhrj mn ʿmlk؟

english: What were you doing at that time?
arabic: ما الذي كنت تفعله آن ذاك؟
transliteration: ma aldhy knt tfʿlh ān dhak؟

english: When did you change your address?
When did you get up this morning?
When will his new novel come out?
Whenever I see you, I feel happy.
Where are you going to eat lunch?

arabic: في أي مكان في النمسا تربيت؟
transliteration: fy ay mkan fy alnmsa trbyt؟

english: Where would you like to go first?
arabic: إلى أين تفضل أن تذهب أولاً؟
transliteration: ilā ayn tfḍl an tdhhb awlaan؟

english: Whether he comes or not, I'll go.
Who does this suitcase belong to?

arabic: من تلك المرأة التي ترتدي فستاناً وردياً؟
transliteration: mn tlk almrah alty trtdy fstanaan wrdyaan؟

english: Why do these things happen to me?
Why don't we have lunch together?
arabic: لمَ لا نأكل طعام الغداء معاً؟
transliteration: lmَ la nakl ṭʿam alghdaء mʿaan؟

english: Why don't you sit down and relax?
Will he be able to come tomorrow?
Will she go to America next year?
arabic: هل ستذهب إلى أمريكا العام المقبل؟
transliteration: hl stdhhb ilā amryka alʿam almqbl؟

english: Will we be in time for the train?
Will you go to the party tonight?
Will you go to the party tonight?
Will you lend me your dictionary?
Will you lend me your dictionary?
Would three o'clock be all right?
Would you ever go skinny dipping?
arabic: هل لك ان تذهب للسباحة عارياً.
transliteration: hl lk an tdhhb llsbaḥh ʿaryaan.

english: Would you like me to call a taxi?
arabic: هل تريدني أن أستدعي لك سيارة أجرة؟
transliteration: hl trydny an astdʿy lk syarh ajrh؟

english: Would you mind shutting the door?
Would you please shut the window?
You can always sleep on my couch.
arabic: أنتَ يمكنكَ دائماً النوم على أريكتي.
transliteration: antَ ymknkَ daئmaan alnwm ʿlā arykty.

english: You can always sleep on my couch.
arabic: أنتِ يمكنكِ دائماً النوم على أريكتي.
transliteration: antِ ymknkِ daئmaan alnwm ʿlā arykty.

english: You can take the bus to the station.
You can take the bus to the station.
arabic: بإمكانك الوصول إلى المحطة عن طريق الحافلة.
transliteration: bimkank alwṣwl ilā almḥṭh ʿn ṭryq alḥaflh.

english: You can say whatever you want to.
arabic: يمكنك أنت تقول أي شيء تريد.
transliteration: ymknk ant tqwl ay shyء tryd.

english: You don't need to worry about me.
You should always keep your word.

arabic: من الأفضل أن تعيد كتابة هذه الجملة.
transliteration: mn alafḍl an tʿyd ktabh hdhh aljmlh.

english: You should try to be more polite.
arabic: يجب أن تحاول أن تكون أكثر أدباً.
transliteration: yjb an tḥawl an tkwn akthr adbaan.

english: You should've told Tom the truth.
arabic: كان يجب عليك أن تقول الحقيقة لتوم.
transliteration: kan yjb ʿlyk an tqwl alḥqyqh ltwm.

english: You talk as if you were the boss.
You talk as if you were the boss.
You'll find this map very useful.
arabic: ستجد أن هذه الخريطة مفيدة للغاية.
transliteration: stjd an hdhh alkhryṭh mfydh llghayh.

english: You're in better shape than I am.
You're in better shape than I am.
arabic: أنت في حال أفضل من حالي.
transliteration: ant fy ḥal afḍl mn ḥaly.

english: You're in better shape than I am.
arabic: أنت في حالة أفضل مما أنا عليه.
transliteration: ant fy ḥalh afḍl mma ana ʿlyh.

english: You're to blame for the accident.
All of my friends are out of town.
Birds of a feather flock together.
Boston is not at all like Chicago.
arabic: بوسطن ليست مثل شيكاغو على الإطلاق.
transliteration: bwsṭn lyst mthl shykaghw ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: Can I ride this horse for a while?
Can you pick me up at the station?
arabic: أيمكنك أن تأتي لأخذي من المحطة؟
transliteration: aymknk an taty lakhdhy mn almḥṭh؟

english: Did you actually see the accident?
Did you drive her home last night?
arabic: هل أوصلتها إلى المنزل ليلة الأمس؟
transliteration: hl awṣltha ilā almnzl lylh alams؟

english: Did you enjoy the party yesterday?
Do I have to stay in the hospital?
arabic: هل يجب علي أن أبقى في المستشفى؟
transliteration: hl yjb ʿly an abqā fy almstshfā؟

english: Do I have to stay in the hospital?
arabic: هل يتوجب علي البقاء في المستشفى؟
transliteration: hl ytwjb ʿly albqaء fy almstshfā؟

english: Do you have any trouble with that?
arabic: هل لديك أي مشكلة في ذلك؟
transliteration: hl ldyk ay mshklh fy dhlk؟

english: Do you have your driver's license?

english: Do you want me to give you a hand?
Do you want me to give you a hand?
Do you want to go out for a drink?
Does this come in any other color?
Don't forget to add a little salt.
arabic: لا تنس أن تضيف قليلا من الملح.
transliteration: la tns an tḍyf qlyla mn almlḥ.

english: Don't forget what I just told you.
arabic: لا تنس ما قلته لك للتّو.
transliteration: la tns ma qlth lk lltw.

english: Don't mention our plan to anybody.
Don't sleep with the windows open.
Don't worry. I'll take care of it.
arabic: لا تقلق. أنا سوف أعتني بها.
transliteration: la tqlq. ana swf aʿtny bha.

english: English is not my native language.
Everybody wants to sit beside her.
Everything was better in the past.
arabic: كل شيء كان أفضل في الماضي.
transliteration: kl shyء kan afḍl fy almaḍy.

english: God created the world in six days.
arabic: خلق الله الأرض في ستة أيام.
transliteration: khlq allh alarḍ fy sth ayam.

english: Have you answered that letter yet?
arabic: هل رددت على تلك الرسالة بعد؟
transliteration: hl rddt ʿlā tlk alrsalh bʿd؟

english: Have you ever gone skinny dipping?
arabic: هل سبق و ذهبت للسباحة عارياً.
transliteration: hl sbq w dhhbt llsbaḥh ʿaryaan.

english: He asked me what I had been doing.
He built a fence around his house.
He built a fence around his house.
He dipped his spoon into the soup.
He doesn't know a lot about Japan.
arabic: إنه لا يعرف الكثير عن اليابان.
transliteration: inh la yʿrf alkthyr ʿn alyaban.

english: He finally decided to get married.

arabic: نهض من النوم في الساعة الثامنة صباحاً.
transliteration: nhḍ mn alnwm fy alsaʿh althamnh ṣbaḥaan.

english: He measured the length of the bed.

arabic: هو لا يخالف أبدا رأي والديه.
transliteration: hw la ykhalf abda ray waldyh.

english: He paid no attention to my advice.

He started going bald quite young.
He stood on the edge of the cliff.
He tried to pull a fast one on me.
He was very friendly to everybody.
He's a little taller than you are.
His leg was bitten by a crocodile.
How many days are there in a week?
How much did the tickets cost you?
Hurry up, or we'll miss the train.
I am determined to be a scientist.
arabic: عقدتُ العزم على أن أكون عالمًا.
transliteration: ʿqdtُ alʿzm ʿlā an akwn ʿalmana.

english: I am determined to be a scientist.
arabic: عقدتُ العزم على أن أكون عالمًا في العلوم الطبيعية.
transliteration: ʿqdtُ alʿzm ʿlā an akwn ʿalmana fy alʿlwm alṭbyʿyh.

english: I asked Tom to sign the documents.
I broke his heart, but I love him.
I can't bear the noise any longer.
arabic: لا يمكنني احتمال الضجيج أكثر من ذلك.
transliteration: la ymknny aḥtmal alḍjyj akthr mn dhlk.

english: I can't bear the noise any longer.
arabic: لا أستطيع أن أحتمل ذلك الصوت المزعج أكثر من ذلك.
transliteration: la astṭyʿ an aḥtml dhlk alṣwt almzʿj akthr mn dhlk.

english: I can't help you because I'm busy.
I convinced him that he was wrong.
I didn't tell Tom that I knew you.
I dipped my finger into the honey.
I don't believe that Tom is the killer.
arabic: لا أصدق أن توم هو القاتل
transliteration: la aṣdq an twm hw alqatl

english: I don't blame you for hitting him.
I don't have anything to give you.
I don't know where this came from.
arabic: لا أعلم من أين أتى هذا.
transliteration: la aʿlm mn ayn atā hdha.

english: I have no memory of what happened.
I haven't eaten anything for days.
arabic: أنا لم أذُقِ الطعامَ منذُ أيامٍ.
transliteration: ana lm adhُqِ alṭʿamَ mndhُ ayamin.

english: I hope I can find a job in Boston.
arabic: آمل بأن أجد وظيفة في بوستن.
transliteration: āml ban ajd wẓyfh fy bwstn.

english: I just have one other thing to do.
I killed two birds with one stone.
I know that I'll never forget you.
I know you're not in love with me.
I know you're not in love with me.
I like to study foreign languages.
I listen to the radio every night.
I listen to the radio every night.
I met an old man near the station.
I need you to tell me where to go.
I remember everything you tell me.
I saw Tom kill the neighbor's cat.
arabic: رأيتُ ساميًا حين قتل قطّة الجيران.

english: I think I'll ask Mary to marry me.
arabic: أظن بأني سأطلب من ماري أن تتزوجني.
transliteration: aẓn bany saṭlb mn mary an ttzwjny.

english: I think you'd better go on a diet.
arabic: أظن أنه من الأفضل لك أن تبدأ حمية غذائية.
transliteration: aẓn anh mn alafḍl lk an tbda ḥmyh ghdhaئyh.

english: I thought you two knew each other.

arabic: لقد قلت لهم أن يبقوا في غرفتهم.
transliteration: lqd qlt lhm an ybqwa fy ghrfthm.

english: I want a massage. I need to relax.

arabic: أريد أن أتعلم المزيد عن بوسطن.
transliteration: aryd an atʿlm almzyd ʿn bwsṭn.

english: I was late because of the traffic.
I wasn't aware that Tom should do that.
arabic: لم أكن أعلم بأنه على توم فعل ذلك.
transliteration: lm akn aʿlm banh ʿlā twm fʿl dhlk.

english: I would like to hear your opinion.

arabic: لن أدلي أبدا بشهادة ضد زوجتي.
transliteration: ln adly abda bshhadh ḍd zwjty.

english: I'll be calling you every morning.

arabic: لن أطلب المساعدة من توم مرة أخرى.

english: I'll teach you how to drive a car.
I'll teach you how to drive a car.

I'm going to need some more money.
I'm just trying to understand you.
I'm looking forward to seeing Tom.
I'm not as nice as you think I am.

english: I'm not used to this kind of work.
I've been a teacher for two years.
I've been a teacher for two years.
I've been a teacher for two years.
I've been thinking of you all day.
If I knew the truth, I'd tell you.
If it rains tomorrow, we won't go.
Is that all you wanted to tell me?
Is there a cash machine near here?
arabic: هل هناك صرّاف آلي قريب من هنا؟
transliteration: hl hnak ṣraf āly qryb mn hna؟

english: Is there a cash machine near here?
arabic: أيوجد صرّاف آلي بالقرب من هنا؟
transliteration: aywjd ṣraf āly balqrb mn hna؟

english: Is this your first visit to Japan?
arabic: هل هذه أول زيارة لك إلى اليابان؟
transliteration: hl hdhh awl zyarh lk ilā alyaban؟

english: Is your school far from your home?
It is a lot of fun to drive a car.
It looks like we fell into a trap.
It was very nice seeing you again.
It'll probably start to rain soon.
It's hard to forget what happened.
Italy is a very beautiful country.
Italy is a very beautiful country.
Keep your room as neat as you can.
Let me explain why I arrived late.
Let me have a look at the picture.
May I see the telephone directory?
May I see the telephone directory?
My father does not eat much fruit.
arabic: لا يُكثِرُ أبي من أكل الفاكهة.
transliteration: la yُkthِrُ aby mn akl alfakhh.

english: My father does not eat much fruit.
arabic: أبي لا يأكل الكثير من الفواكه
transliteration: aby la yakl alkthyr mn alfwakh

english: My father gave a nice watch to me.
My father is retiring next spring.
My father used to be a strong man.
arabic: والدي اعتاد أن يكون رجلاً قوياً.
transliteration: waldy aʿtad an ykwn rjlaan qwyaan.

english: My father used to be a strong man.
arabic: أبي اعتاد أن يكون رجلاً قوياً.
transliteration: aby aʿtad an ykwn rjlaan qwyaan.

english: My grandfather is in his nineties.
My upper right wisdom tooth hurts.
arabic: يؤلمني سن العقل في أعلى يمين أسناني.
transliteration: yؤlmny sn alʿql fy aʿlā ymyn asnany.

english: No one I know wears a tie anymore.
arabic: لا أحد أعرفهُ يرتدي ربطة العُنُق بعد الآن.
transliteration: la aḥd aʿrfhُ yrtdy rbṭh alʿُnُq bʿd alān.

english: One is red and the other is white.
Our band needs a distinctive logo.
Pick up the pencil from the floor.
Please don't run in the classroom.
arabic: من فضلك لا تركض في الصف.
transliteration: mn fḍlk la trkḍ fy alṣf.

english: Please explain why you can't come.

transliteration: mn fḍlk ashrḥ lmadha la ymknk almjyء.

english: Please help me fill out this form.
arabic: الرجاء مساعدتي في ملء هذا النموذج.
transliteration: alrjaء msaʿdty fy mlء hdha alnmwdhj.

english: Please help me fill out this form.

She is learning how to drive a car.
She put down her thoughts on paper.
arabic: دونت ما تفكر به على الورق.
transliteration: dwnt ma tfkr bh ʿlā alwrq.

english: She spends a lot of money on books.
arabic: إنها تقوم بصرف الكثير من المال على الكتب.
transliteration: inha tqwm bṣrf alkthyr mn almal ʿlā alktb.

english: She was unconscious of her mistake.
She went to the market once a week.
arabic: ذهبت إلى السوق مرة في الأسبوع.
transliteration: dhhbt ilā alswq mrh fy alasbwʿ.

english: She will get married to a rich man.
Some people seem to agree with you.
arabic: يبدو أن بعض الأناس يتفقون معك.
transliteration: ybdw an bʿḍ alanas ytfqwn mʿk.

english: Some people seem to agree with you.
Tell Tom he has to wash the dishes.
arabic: أخبر توم بأن عليه غسل الصحون.
transliteration: akhbr twm ban ʿlyh ghsl alṣḥwn.

english: Thank you for the pleasant evening.
Thank you for the pleasant evening.
Thank you in advance for your help.
That color doesn't look good on me.
That red sweater looks good on you.
That woman is much older than I am.
The accused was sentenced to death.
The bridge was built by the Romans.
The conference ended two hours ago.
The conference ended two hours ago.
The guy standing over there is Tom.
The important thing is you're here.
arabic: كل ما يهم هو أنك هنا.
transliteration: kl ma yhm hw ank hna.

english: The lion is the king of the jungle.
The price of oil is down this week.
The stock market has dropped today.
arabic: انخفضت الأسعار في سوق الأسهم اليوم.
transliteration: ankhfḍt alasʿar fy swq alashm alywm.

english: The stories in this book are scary.
The story reminded me of my father.
The tourist bus crossed the border.
The whole family is out for a walk.
There was a car accident yesterday.
There was a car accident yesterday.
There's one thing I didn't mention.
They built a fence around the farm.
They have elected a new government.
They say that he will never return.
They went to the movies last night.
Things didn't go the way I planned.
arabic: لم تجرِ الأمور كما خطّطت لها.
transliteration: lm tjrِ alamwr kma khṭṭt lha.

english: This box is not as big as that one.
This is always the way it has been.
This is definitely the best method.
arabic: لا ريب بأنّ هذه هي أفضل طريقة.
transliteration: la ryb ban hdhh hy afḍl ṭryqh.

english: This is something I bought for you.
This lesson should be kept in mind.
arabic: يجب إبقاء هذا الدرس في الحسبان.
transliteration: yjb ibqaء hdha aldrs fy alḥsban.

english: This word is also French in origin.
Tokyo is the largest city in Japan.
arabic: طوكيو هي أكبر مدينة في اليابان.
transliteration: ṭwkyw hy akbr mdynh fy alyaban.

english: Tom always has a smile on his face.
Tom always shouts when he is angry.
arabic: توم دائماً يصرخ عندما يكون غاضباً.
transliteration: twm daئmaan yṣrkh ʿndma ykwn ghaḍbaan.

english: Tom ate the last cookie in the jar.
arabic: توم أكل الكعكة الأخيرة من البرطمان.
transliteration: twm akl alkʿkh alakhyrh mn albrṭman.

english: Tom deserved the punishment he got.
arabic: استحق توم العقاب الذي حصل عليه.
transliteration: astḥq twm alʿqab aldhy ḥṣl ʿlyh.

english: Tom didn't want to dance with Mary.
arabic: توم لم يرد أن يرقص مع ماري
transliteration: twm lm yrd an yrqṣ mʿ mary

english: Tom didn't want to go to the movie.
arabic: لم يرد توم الذهاب إلى السينما.
transliteration: lm yrd twm aldhhab ilā alsynma.

english: Tom is just wasting time, isn't he?
arabic: توم يضيع الوقت فقط، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: twm yḍyʿ alwqt fqṭ، alys kdhlk؟

english: Tom is leaving next year, isn't he?
arabic: سيغادر توم العام المقبل، أ ليس كذلك؟
transliteration: syghadr twm alʿam almqbl، a lys kdhlk؟

english: Tom is looking at us now, isn't he?
arabic: توم ينظر إلينا الآن، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: twm ynẓr ilyna alān، alys kdhlk؟

english: Tom is looking for a job, isn't he?
arabic: توم يبحث عن عمل، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: twm ybḥth ʿn ʿml، alys kdhlk؟

english: Tom is now studying in the library.
Tom is pretty busy today, isn't he?
arabic: توم مشغول كثيرا اليوم، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: twm mshghwl kthyra alywm، alys kdhlk؟

english: Tom isn't a French teacher anymore.
arabic: لم يعد توم مدرسا للفرنسية بعد الآن.
transliteration: lm yʿd twm mdrsa llfrnsyh bʿd alān.

english: Tom laid the gun down on the floor.
Tom lived with us for three months.
Tom told me he wasn't sick anymore.
arabic: أخبرني توم أنه لم يعد مريضا.
transliteration: akhbrny twm anh lm yʿd mryḍa.

english: Tom tried not to look disappointed.
arabic: حاول توم أن لا يظهر بأنه خائب الأمل.
transliteration: ḥawl twm an la yẓhr banh khaئb alaml.

english: Tom tried to avoid looking at Mary.
arabic: حاول توم أن يتجنب النظر إلى ماري.
transliteration: ḥawl twm an ytjnb alnẓr ilā mary.

english: Tom wouldn't allow Mary to do that.
arabic: لم يكن توم ليسمح لماري بفعل ذلك.
transliteration: lm ykn twm lysmḥ lmary bfʿl dhlk.

english: Tom, what's wrong with you tonight?
Trees are planted along the street.
Truer words have never been spoken.
arabic: ما قيل أصدق من هذا قط.
transliteration: ma qyl aṣdq mn hdha qṭ.

english: Wait. I want to tell you something.
We all worked together on the farm.
We are going downtown to eat pizza.
arabic: نحن ذاهبون إلى وسط المدينة لنأكل البيتزا.
transliteration: nḥn dhahbwn ilā wsṭ almdynh lnakl albytza.

english: We are playing tennis this weekend.
arabic: سنلعب التنس في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع.
transliteration: snlʿb altns fy ʿṭlh nhayh alasbwʿ.

english: We don't have to do this every day.
arabic: ليس واجب علينا فعل ذلك يوميا.
transliteration: lys wajb ʿlyna fʿl dhlk ywmya.

english: We don't need to do this every day.
We have four French classes a week.
arabic: لدينا أربع حصص للغة الفرنسية في الأسبوع.
transliteration: ldyna arbʿ ḥṣṣ llghh alfrnsyh fy alasbwʿ.

english: We have four French classes a week.
We have no options but to continue.
We must contact the police at once.
We talked until two in the morning.
We were all present at her wedding.
We were all present at her wedding.
arabic: كنا جميعنا حاضرون وقت حفل زفافها.
transliteration: kna jmyʿna ḥaḍrwn wqt ḥfl zfafha.

english: We'll have to postpone the meeting.
We're lucky Tom is here to help us.
arabic: من حظنا وجود توم هنا ليساعدنا.
transliteration: mn ḥẓna wjwd twm hna lysaʿdna.

english: What do you suggest that we do now?
What time do you usually go to bed?
What time do you usually go to bed?
What time do you usually go to bed?
What time do you usually go to bed?
What you said is complete nonsense.
What's your favorite type of pizza?
When are you going to quit smoking?
When did Tom graduate from college?
When did you graduate from college?
When will you give me back my book?
Where's the best place to buy meat?
arabic: ما هو أفضل مكان يمكن شراء اللّحم منه؟
transliteration: ma hw afḍl mkan ymkn shraء allḥm mnh؟

english: Where's the entrance to the museum?
Which do you prefer, rice or bread?
arabic: ماذا تفضل أكثر، الرز أم الخبز؟
transliteration: madha tfḍl akthr، alrz am alkhbz؟

english: Who's that girl sitting over there?
arabic: من تكون تلك الفتاة الجالسة هناك؟
transliteration: mn tkwn tlk alftah aljalsh hnak؟

english: Why do I have to do this by myself?
Why do you think I'm scared of you?
You are not supposed to smoke here.
arabic: ليس من المفترض بك أن تدخن هنا.
transliteration: lys mn almftrḍ bk an tdkhn hna.

english: You might at least say "thank you."
You should listen to what Tom says.
arabic: عليك أن تصغي لما يقوله توم.
transliteration: ʿlyk an tṣghy lma yqwlh twm.

english: You shouldn't leave the baby alone.
arabic: عليك أن لا تترك الرضيع وحده.
transliteration: ʿlyk an la ttrk alrḍyʿ wḥdh.

english: You were supposed to tell Tom that.
You won't believe what Tom told me!
arabic: لن تصدّق ما قاله لي توم!
transliteration: ln tṣdq ma qalh ly twm!

english: You won't believe what Tom told me!
arabic: لن تصدّقي ما قاله لي توم!
transliteration: ln tṣdqy ma qalh ly twm!

english: You'd better go. It's getting late.
arabic: من الأفضل أن تغادر. إن الوقت متأخر.
transliteration: mn alafḍl an tghadr. in alwqt mtakhr.

english: You'll be busy tomorrow, won't you?
arabic: ستكون مشغولاً غداً، أليس ذلك صحيحاً؟
transliteration: stkwn mshghwlaan ghdaan، alys dhlk ṣḥyḥaan؟

english: You're responsible for what you do.
Adversity is the test of friendship.
Adversity is the test of friendship.
Adversity is the test of friendship.
A friend of mine is studying abroad.
Above all, don't forget to write me.
arabic: والأهم، لا تنسى أن تكتب لي.
transliteration: walahm، la tnsā an tktb ly.

english: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
All of my roommates are out of town.
All you have to do is try your best.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله هو بذل جهدك.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh hw bdhl jhdk.

english: Are you by yourself or with someone?
arabic: هل أنتَ وحدك أو مع أحد؟
transliteration: hl antَ wḥdk aw mʿ aḥd؟

english: Are you going to attend the meeting?
Both Tom and Mary were absent today.
arabic: كان كلا من توم وماري غائبان اليوم.
transliteration: kan kla mn twm wmary ghaئban alywm.

english: By the way, how many kids are going?
Can I speak to the person in charge?
arabic: هل لي أن أكلم المسؤول هنا؟
transliteration: hl ly an aklm almsؤwl hna؟

english: Can I speak to the person in charge?
arabic: هل يمكنني التحدث مع المسؤول هنا؟
transliteration: hl ymknny altḥdth mʿ almsؤwl hna؟

english: Can Tom really swim faster than you?
arabic: أيمكنه توم حقا السباحة أسرع منك؟
transliteration: aymknh twm ḥqa alsbaḥh asrʿ mnk؟

english: Can you recommend a good restaurant?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تنصحني بمطعم جيد؟
transliteration: hl ymknk an tnṣḥny bmṭʿm jyd؟

english: Can't you put it off until tomorrow?
arabic: ألا يمكنك أن تأجلها إلى الغد؟
transliteration: ala ymknk an tajlha ilā alghd؟

english: Children don't need their own rooms.
arabic: لا يحتاج الأطفال غرفًا خاصة بهم.
transliteration: la yḥtaj alaṭfal ghrfana khaṣh bhm.

english: Could you please move out of my way?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تفسح لي الطريق من فضلك؟
transliteration: hl ymknk an tfsḥ ly alṭryq mn fḍlk؟

english: Cows are eating grass in the meadow.
Do it yourself and do it right away.
Do you have an appointment with him?
Do you know how to use a dictionary?
Do you know how to use a dictionary?
Do you know how worried you made me?
Do you remember when I saw you last?
arabic: هل تذكر متى رأيتك آخر مرة؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr mtā raytk ākhr mrh؟

english: Do you wash your hands before meals?
Does Tom have a daughter named Mary?
Don't forget to pick me up tomorrow.

arabic: لا تقل شيئًا قبل التفكير فيه.
transliteration: la tql shyئana qbl altfkyr fyh.

arabic: لا تقولي شيئًا قبل التفكير فيه.
transliteration: la tqwly shyئana qbl altfkyr fyh.

english: Don't treat me as if I were a child.
Driving a car is really very simple.
Driving a car is really very simple.
arabic: قيادة السيارة أمر في غاية البساطة حقاً.
transliteration: qyadh alsyarh amr fy ghayh albsaṭh ḥqaan.

english: Earthquakes may occur at any moment.
arabic: يمكن أن تحدث الزلازل في أي لحظة.
transliteration: ymkn an tḥdth alzlazl fy ay lḥẓh.

english: English is taught in most countries.
God helps those who help themselves.
He accomplished the work as planned.
He died fighting in the Vietnam War.
arabic: لقد توفي وهو يقاتل في حرب فيتنام.
transliteration: lqd twfy whw yqatl fy ḥrb fytnam.

english: He does not know how to drive a car.
arabic: إنه لا يعرف كيف يقود سيارة.
transliteration: inh la yʿrf kyf yqwd syarh.

english: He drew a straight line on the wall.
He exchanged his cow for two horses.
He is honest. That's why I like him.
He plays the piano better than I do.
arabic: إنه يعزف على البيانو أفضل مني.
transliteration: inh yʿzf ʿlā albyanw afḍl mny.

english: He suddenly came out with the truth.
He was arrested for drunken driving.
He was poor and couldn't buy a coat.
arabic: كان فقيراً ولم يستطع شراء المعطف.
transliteration: kan fqyraan wlm ystṭʿ shraء almʿṭf.

english: He was stupid enough to believe her.
arabic: لقد كان غبي بما فيه الكفايه ليصدقها.
transliteration: lqd kan ghby bma fyh alkfayh lyṣdqha.

english: He wished she had more time for him.
arabic: لقد تمنى أن يكون لديها وقت أكثر لهُ.
transliteration: lqd tmnā an ykwn ldyha wqt akthr lhُ.

english: Her only hobby is collecting stamps.
His condition could have been worse.
arabic: كان يمكن أن تكون حالته أكثر سوءً.
transliteration: kan ymkn an tkwn ḥalth akthr swءan.

english: How did you come to know each other?
How do you know that belongs to Tom?
How many hours of sleep do you need?
How many hours of sleep do you need?
arabic: إلى كم ساعة من النوم تحتاج؟
transliteration: ilā km saʿh mn alnwm tḥtaj؟

english: How much longer is it going to take?
arabic: كم من الوقت سوف تستغرق بعد؟
transliteration: km mn alwqt swf tstghrq bʿd؟

english: Hurry up, or you'll miss your plane.
Hurry, and you will catch the train.
I accept, but only on one condition.
arabic: أنا موافق, ولكن على شرط واحد.
transliteration: ana mwafq, wlkn ʿlā shrṭ waḥd.

english: I am going to watch TV this evening.
I burst out laughing when I saw him.
I can carry those suitcases for you.
arabic: أستطيع أن أحمل تلك الحقائب عنك.
transliteration: astṭyʿ an aḥml tlk alḥqaئb ʿnk.

english: I can wait four days at the longest.
arabic: أقصى مدة انتظار يمكنني تحملها هي أربعة أيام.
transliteration: aqṣā mdh antẓar ymknny tḥmlha hy arbʿh ayam.

english: I can't forgive him for what he did.
arabic: لا أقدر أن أسامحه على ما فعل.
transliteration: la aqdr an asamḥh ʿlā ma fʿl.

english: I can't think of a suitable example.
arabic: لا أستطيع أن أفكر في مثال مناسب.
transliteration: la astṭyʿ an afkr fy mthal mnasb.

english: I can't understand his ideas at all.
arabic: لا أستطيع فهم أفكاره على الإطلاق.
transliteration: la astṭyʿ fhm afkarh ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: I don't have much desire for wealth.
I don't know because I wasn't there.
arabic: لا أعرف لأني لم أكن هناك.
transliteration: la aʿrf lany lm akn hnak.

english: I don't know how to handle children.
arabic: لا أعرف كيف أتعامل مع الأطفال.
transliteration: la aʿrf kyf atʿaml mʿ alaṭfal.

english: I don't know why we have to do that.
arabic: لا أعلم لم ينبغي أن نقوم بذلك.
transliteration: la aʿlm lm ynbghy an nqwm bdhlk.

english: I don't like swimming in salt water.
arabic: أنا لا أحب السباحة في المياه المالحة
transliteration: ana la aḥb alsbaḥh fy almyah almalḥh

english: I don't like talking with strangers.
arabic: لا افضل ان اتكلم مع الغرباء.
transliteration: la afḍl an atklm mʿ alghrbaء.

english: I don't pretend to understand women.
I don't pretend to understand women.
I don't think anybody could do that.
arabic: أشك في أن يستطيع أحد فعل ذلك.
transliteration: ashk fy an ystṭyʿ aḥd fʿl dhlk.

english: I don't want to do his work for him.
arabic: لا أريد القيام بعمله نيابة عنه.
transliteration: la aryd alqyam bʿmlh nyabh ʿnh.

english: I don't want to leave the door open.
arabic: لا أريد أن أترك الباب مفتوحًا.
transliteration: la aryd an atrk albab mftwḥana.

english: I don't want to look like a tourist.
I don't want you to forget about me.
I felt a light touch on my shoulder.
arabic: لقد شعرت بلمسة خفيفة على كتفي.
transliteration: lqd shʿrt blmsh khfyfh ʿlā ktfy.

english: I gave Tom a chance to work with me.
arabic: أنا منحت توم فرصة للعمل معي.
transliteration: ana mnḥt twm frṣh llʿml mʿy.

english: I got tired of lying in bed all day.
arabic: تعبت من الرقود في السرير طوال اليوم.
transliteration: tʿbt mn alrqwd fy alsryr ṭwal alywm.

english: I got up at six-thirty this morning.
arabic: استيقظت الساعة السادسة و النصف هذا الصباح.
transliteration: astyqẓt alsaʿh alsadsh w alnṣf hdha alṣbaḥ.

english: I guess I'd better get back to work.
arabic: لعله من الأفضل أن أعود لعملي.
transliteration: lʿlh mn alafḍl an aʿwd lʿmly.

english: I had no idea Tom could be so cruel.
arabic: لم أعتقد أن توم من الممكن أن يكون جدّاً قاسي.
transliteration: lm aʿtqd an twm mn almmkn an ykwn jdaan qasy.

english: I have a question I need to ask you.
I have a question I need to ask you.
I haven't been sleeping well lately.
arabic: لا أنام كما يجب في الآونة الأخيرة.
transliteration: la anam kma yjb fy alāwnh alakhyrh.

english: I hope this is accurate information.
arabic: آمل أن هذه معلومات ذات مصداقية.
transliteration: āml an hdhh mʿlwmat dhat mṣdaqyh.

english: I knew that something funny might happen.
arabic: علمت أن شيئا طريفا قد يحدث.
transliteration: ʿlmt an shyئa ṭryfa qd yḥdth.

english: I know who it is you're looking for.
arabic: أنا أعرف من هو الذي تبحث عنهُ.
transliteration: ana aʿrf mn hw aldhy tbḥth ʿnhُ.

english: I learned a lot about Greek culture.
I left the rest to him and went out.
I like her younger sister very much.
I need to speak with you right away.
I never actually wanted to go there.
arabic: لم أرغب ابدا في الواقع أن أذهب إلى هناك.
transliteration: lm arghb abda fy alwaqʿ an adhhb ilā hnak.

english: I persuaded him to give up the idea.
I put the jello in the refrigerator.
I saw Tom dancing with another girl.
arabic: رأيت توم يرقص مع فتاة أخرى.
transliteration: rayt twm yrqṣ mʿ ftah akhrā.

english: I skip ads on videos whenever I can.
arabic: أتخطّى الإعلانات على الفيديوهات كلما أمكن.
transliteration: atkhṭā aliʿlanat ʿlā alfydywhat klma amkn.

english: I think Tom can't understand French.
arabic: أظن بأن توم لا يفهم الفرنسية.
transliteration: aẓn ban twm la yfhm alfrnsyh.

english: I think it was a stupid thing to do.
arabic: كان القيام بذلك شيئا سخيفا على ما أعتقد.
transliteration: kan alqyam bdhlk shyئa skhyfa ʿlā ma aʿtqd.

english: I think you should read it yourself.
arabic: أعتقد أنه ينبغي عليك أن تقرأه بنفسك.
transliteration: aʿtqd anh ynbghy ʿlyk an tqrah bnfsk.

english: I think you're making a big mistake.
I thought this was common knowledge.
I thought that you'd never come here.
arabic: اعتقدت انك لن تأتي الى هنا
transliteration: aʿtqdt ank ln taty alā hna

english: I thought that you'd never come here.
arabic: اعتقدت انك لا تريد ان تأتي الى هنا .
transliteration: aʿtqdt ank la tryd an taty alā hna .

english: I want my dinner brought to my room.
I want to know who's coming with us.
arabic: أريد أن أعرف من سيأتي معنا.
transliteration: aryd an aʿrf mn syaty mʿna.

english: I wanted to buy a painting from Tom.
I was bothered by the baby's crying.
I was late because of heavy traffic.
I went to drink a beer with friends.
I went to the coffee shop yesterday.
I wish I could live near your house.
arabic: أتمنى لو أعيش قريباً من منزلك.
transliteration: atmnā lw aʿysh qrybaan mn mnzlk.

english: I won't let you slip away so easily.
I'd like to reserve a table for two.
I'll ask when the train will get in.
I'll bring you the bill immediately.
I'll take some X-rays of your teeth.
I'll tell you what I want you to do.
I'm getting off at the next station.
I'm going to find a place of my own.

arabic: أنا أقل بقليل من 150 سنتي متر.
transliteration: ana aql bqlyl mn 150 snty mtr.

english: I'm looking forward to our ski trip.
I'm not even sure if this is my key.
arabic: أنا حتىَ لستُ متأكداً إن كان هذا مفتاحي.
transliteration: ana ḥtāَ lstُ mtakdaan in kan hdha mftaḥy.

english: I'm not going to go to school today.
I'm not going to school on Saturday.
I'm not likely to forget to do that.
arabic: من الأرجح أنّني لن أنس ذلك.
transliteration: mn alarjḥ anny ln ans dhlk.

english: I'm not taking a vacation this year.
I'm not your enemy. I'm your friend.
I'm sorry. I won't do it ever again.
I'm sure Tom is planning to do that.
arabic: متأكد بأن توم يخطط لفعل ذلك.
transliteration: mtakd ban twm ykhṭṭ lfʿl dhlk.

english: I'm sure Tom will tell us the truth.
I'm trying to save room for dessert.
I'm trying to save room for dessert.

arabic: لقد إنتهيت للتو من تناول الإفطار.
transliteration: lqd inthyt lltw mn tnawl alifṭar.

english: I've promised Tom that I'd be there.
arabic: لقد وعدت توم بأن أكون هناك.
transliteration: lqd wʿdt twm ban akwn hnak.

english: If I need money, I'll ask my father.
arabic: إن احتجت المال سأطلبه من والدي.
transliteration: in aḥtjt almal saṭlbh mn waldy.

english: If you don't remind me, I'll forget.
In this case, I think he is correct.
arabic: في هذه الحالة، أعتقد أنه على حق.
transliteration: fy hdhh alḥalh، aʿtqd anh ʿlā ḥq.

english: Is this the book you're looking for?
arabic: أهذا هو الكتاب الذي تبحث عنه؟
transliteration: ahdha hw alktab aldhy tbḥth ʿnh؟

english: It happened the way Tom said it did.
It is not easy to solve the problem.
It isn't as cold here as I expected.
arabic: انها ليست باردة هنا كما توقعت.
transliteration: anha lyst bardh hna kma twqʿt.

english: It was careless of her to forget it.
It'd be better if I went to bed now.
arabic: حريّ بي أن آوي إلى فراشي الآن.
transliteration: ḥry by an āwy ilā frashy alān.

english: It's impossible to tell for certain.
Japan and South Korea are neighbors.
Keep a record of how much you spend.

arabic: لقد تم اختراع الطائرة الورقية قبل ألفَيْ عام.
transliteration: lqd tm akhtraʿ alṭaئrh alwrqyh qbl alfَy ʿam.

english: Let's not be in too much of a hurry.
Let's sit where there is some shade.
Love and hate are opposite emotions.
My aunt has been dead for two years.
My aunt was pleased with my success.
My aunt was pleased with my success.
My college tuition is too expensive.
My college tuition is too expensive.
My cousins are coming in a few days.
arabic: سيأتي أولاد عمي بعد بضعة أيام.
transliteration: syaty awlad ʿmy bʿd bḍʿh ayam.

english: My dream is to become a firefighter.
My father passed away two years ago.
My goal in life is to be a novelist.
arabic: هدفي في الحياة هو أن أصبح كاتباً روائياً.
transliteration: hdfy fy alḥyah hw an aṣbḥ katbaan rwaئyaan.

english: Open your mouth and close your eyes.
Pass me the salt and pepper, please.
arabic: من فضلك مرر إليّ الملح و الفلفل.
transliteration: mn fḍlk mrr ily almlḥ w alflfl.

english: People who don't work, won't be fed.
Please lock the door when you leave.
arabic: يرجى أن تقفل الباب عند مغادرتك.
transliteration: yrjā an tqfl albab ʿnd mghadrtk.

arabic: أصبح سامي يمشي في نومه الفترة الماضية.
transliteration: aṣbḥ samy ymshy fy nwmh alftrh almaḍyh.

english: Return this book as soon as you can.
arabic: أعد الكتاب في أقرب فرصة ممكنة.
transliteration: aʿd alktab fy aqrb frṣh mmknh.

english: She advised him not to eat too much.
She came up to me and asked my name.
She fell in love with a younger man.
She has a daughter who is a pianist.
She knows nothing about your family.
arabic: إنها لا تعرف شيئاً عن عائلتك.
transliteration: inha la tʿrf shyئaan ʿn ʿaئltk.

english: She'll be getting married next year.
So, have you thought about my offer?
That's what happened here on Monday.
arabic: هذا ما حدث هنا يوم الإثنين.
transliteration: hdha ma ḥdth hna ywm alithnyn.

english: The accident happened two hours ago.
The answer is actually quite simple.
The atomic number for hydrogen is 1.
The cat slowly approached the mouse.
The cat slowly approached the mouse.
The city was bombed by enemy planes.
The dragon is an imaginary creature.
The horse stopped and refused to move.
arabic: توقف الحصان و رفض أن يتحرك.
transliteration: twqf alḥṣan w rfḍ an ytḥrk.

english: The jets took off one after another.
arabic: أقلعت الطائرات النفاثة واحدة تلو الأخرى.
transliteration: aqlʿt alṭaئrat alnfathh waḥdh tlw alakhrā.

english: The lady is forty years old at most.
arabic: عمر السيدة أربعون عامًا على الأرجح.
transliteration: ʿmr alsydh arbʿwn ʿamana ʿlā alarjḥ.

english: The old man fell down on the ground.
The plane made an emergency landing.
The rear tire of my bicycle is flat.
The store was not a big one, was it?
arabic: لم يكن المخزن كبيراً، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: lm ykn almkhzn kbyraan، alys kdhlk؟

english: There are sixty seconds in a minute.
There are sixty seconds in a minute.
There don't seem to be any problems.
arabic: لا يبدو بأن هناك أي مشكلة.
transliteration: la ybdw ban hnak ay mshklh.

english: There is no answer to your question.
There is no doubt about his honesty.
There was no furniture in that room.
There's no water left in the bottle.
arabic: لم يبقَ في القنينة أي ماء.
transliteration: lm ybqَ fy alqnynh ay maء.

english: They checked how pure the water was.
They were punished for their crimes.
They were punished for their crimes.
This bridge was built two years ago.
This is one of Tom's favorite books.
This is where the accident happened.
This story is based on a true story.
arabic: هذه القصة مُستمّدة من قصّةٍ واقعية.
transliteration: hdhh alqṣh mُstmdh mn qṣhin waqʿyh.

english: This theory consists of three parts.
arabic: تتألف هذه النظرية من ثلاثة أجزاء.
transliteration: ttalf hdhh alnẓryh mn thlathh ajzaء.

english: Three bodies were found in the cave.
arabic: عُثرت على ثلاث حثث في الكهف.
transliteration: ʿُthrt ʿlā thlath ḥthth fy alkhf.

english: Tom and I were in Boston in October.
arabic: كنت انا وتوم في بوسطن في شهر أكتوبر.
transliteration: knt ana wtwm fy bwsṭn fy shhr aktwbr.

english: Tom can't see Mary from where he is.
arabic: لا يستطيع توم رؤية ماري من مكانه.
transliteration: la ystṭyʿ twm rؤyh mary mn mkanh.

english: Tom doesn't know how to milk a goat.
arabic: توم لا يعرف كيفية حَلْب الماعز.
transliteration: twm la yʿrf kyfyh ḥَlb almaʿz.

english: Tom gave the police a false address.
Tom glanced at the rear-view mirror.
arabic: توم القى نظرة سريعة في مرآة الرؤية الخلفية .
transliteration: twm alqā nẓrh sryʿh fy mrāh alrؤyh alkhlfyh .

english: Tom is a fluent speaker of Japanese.
Tom is outside watering the flowers.
Tom is the only one who can do this.
arabic: توم هو فقط من يمكنه فعل هذا.
transliteration: twm hw fqṭ mn ymknh fʿl hdha.

english: Tom is very proud of Mary, isn't he?
arabic: توم فخور جدا بماري أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: twm fkhwr jda bmary alys kdhlk؟

english: Tom isn't the right man for the job.
arabic: ليس توم هو الشخص المناسب للوظيفة.
transliteration: lys twm hw alshkhṣ almnasb llwẓyfh.

english: Tom loves Mary, but Mary loves John.
arabic: توم يحب ماري، ولكنها تحب جون.
transliteration: twm yḥb mary، wlknha tḥb jwn.

english: Tom promised to be here before 2:30.
arabic: وعدني توم بأنّه سيكون هنا قبل 2:30.
transliteration: wʿdny twm banh sykwn hna qbl 2:30.

english: Tom told me not to go into the cave.
arabic: توم أخبرني بأن لا أدخل المغارة.
transliteration: twm akhbrny ban la adkhl almgharh.

english: Tom's book was adapted into a movie.
Tom's death still remains a mystery.
arabic: ما زال الغموض يلفّ مقتل سامي.
transliteration: ma zal alghmwḍ ylf mqtl samy.

english: Two against one is not a fair fight.
arabic: اثنان ضد واحد ليس صراعا عادلا.
transliteration: athnan ḍd waḥd lys ṣraʿa ʿadla.

english: Watch out! There's a big hole there.
We can't sleep because of the noise.
We can't sleep because of the noise.
We can't sleep because of the noise.
arabic: نحن لا نستطيع النوم بسبب الضجة
transliteration: nḥn la nstṭyʿ alnwm bsbb alḍjh

english: We haven't seen what we need to see.
arabic: لم نرى ما كنا نريد أن نراه.
transliteration: lm nrā ma kna nryd an nrah.

english: We make milk into cheese and butter.
arabic: نصنع الزبدة و الجبنة من الحليب.
transliteration: nṣnʿ alzbdh w aljbnh mn alḥlyb.

english: We used to swim in this river a lot.
What do people do for fun in Boston?
arabic: ماذا يفعلون الناس من اجل المتعة في بوسطن؟
transliteration: madha yfʿlwn alnas mn ajl almtʿh fy bwsṭn؟

english: What is this fish called in English?
When I grow up, I want to be a king.
arabic: حَيْنَ أكبر، أُريد أن أصبِحَ ملِكًا.
transliteration: ḥَynَ akbr، aُryd an aṣbِḥَ mlِkana.

english: When did you begin studying English?
When do you plan to leave for Japan?
Why didn't you just say that before?
Why don't people say what they mean?
arabic: لم لا يقول النّاس ما يعنونه حقّا؟
transliteration: lm la yqwl alnas ma yʿnwnh ḥqa؟

english: Why don't we just agree to disagree?
arabic: لمَ لا نتّفق على ألّا نتّفق فحسب؟
transliteration: lmَ la ntfq ʿlā ala ntfq fḥsb؟

english: Would you prefer to speak in French?
You don't seem to care what happens.
arabic: لا يبدو أنك تهتم بما يحدث.
transliteration: la ybdw ank thtm bma yḥdth.

english: You may have read this book already.
You ought to have come here earlier.
arabic: كأن عليك أن تأتي إلى هنا مبكراً.
transliteration: kan ʿlyk an taty ilā hna mbkraan.

english: You should have accepted his advice.
You should've completed it long ago.
arabic: كان ينبغي أن تكمله منذ وقت طويل.
transliteration: kan ynbghy an tkmlh mndh wqt ṭwyl.

english: You shouldn't need to do that again.
You're either with us or you're against us.
A drowning man will clutch at a straw.
A lot of tourists invaded the island.
A lot of tourists invaded the island.
A loud noise in the night scared him.
All of a sudden, a dog began barking.
Any student can answer that question.
arabic: أي طالب يمكنه الرد على هذا السؤال.
transliteration: ay ṭalb ymknh alrd ʿlā hdha alsؤal.

english: Anybody who wants to come is invited.
arabic: أي شخص يريد القدوم فهو مدعوّ.
transliteration: ay shkhṣ yryd alqdwm fhw mdʿw.

english: Arabic is written from right to left.
arabic: تكتب العربية من اليمين إلى اليسار.
transliteration: tktb alʿrbyh mn alymyn ilā alysar.

english: Are you a senior high school student?
Are you going to Tom's party tonight?
Are you sure you know how to do this?
arabic: أمتأكد من معرفتك بكيفية فعل هذا؟
transliteration: amtakd mn mʿrftk bkyfyh fʿl hdha؟

english: Are you sure you know how to do this?
arabic: أمتأك من أنك تعرف كيف تفعل هذا؟
transliteration: amtak mn ank tʿrf kyf tfʿl hdha؟

english: At one time, there was a bridge here.
arabic: كان يوجد جسر هنا في يوم من الأيام.
transliteration: kan ywjd jsr hna fy ywm mn alayam.

english: Which university are you studying at?
Can you pause the video for a moment?
Can you tell me why Tom is in Boston?
arabic: هلّا أخبرتني عن سبب وجود توم في بوسطن؟
transliteration: hla akhbrtny ʿn sbb wjwd twm fy bwsṭn؟

english: Cars arrived there one after another.
Close the window before going to bed.
arabic: اغلق النافذة قبل الذهاب الى السرير
transliteration: aghlq alnafdhh qbl aldhhab alā alsryr

english: Correct the mistakes, if there are any.
Correct the errors, if there are any.
arabic: صَحِح الأخطاء, إذا كان هناك أي منها.
transliteration: ṣَḥِḥ alakhṭaء, idha kan hnak ay mnha.

english: Could I have one more coffee, please?
arabic: فضلا، أيمكنني الحصول على كوب قهوة آخر؟
transliteration: fḍla، aymknny alḥṣwl ʿlā kwb qhwh ākhr؟

english: Did you do your homework by yourself?
Did your uncle let you drive his car?
arabic: هل سمح لك عمك أن تقود سيارته؟
transliteration: hl smḥ lk ʿmk an tqwd syarth؟

english: Do you feel any pain in your stomach?
Do you have this in any other colors?
Do you know who bought your painting?
Do you really think Tom will do that?
arabic: أحقا تظن أن توم سيفعل ذلك؟
transliteration: aḥqa tẓn an twm syfʿl dhlk؟

english: Do you remember your passport number?
Don't drink beer before going to bed.
arabic: لا تشرب الجعة قبل الذهاب إلى السرير.
transliteration: la tshrb aljʿh qbl aldhhab ilā alsryr.

english: Don't forget to do your homework, OK?
Don't forget to take out the garbage.
Don't touch me with your soapy hands.
arabic: لا تلمسني وفي يدك أثر الصابون.
transliteration: la tlmsny wfy ydk athr alṣabwn.

english: Don't worry. This won't happen again.
arabic: لا تقلق. لن يحدث هذا ثانية.
transliteration: la tqlq. ln yḥdth hdha thanyh.

english: Guess who's coming to dinner tonight.
arabic: احزروا من سيأتينا على العشاء اليوم.
transliteration: aḥzrwa mn syatyna ʿlā alʿshaء alywm.

english: Have you finished reading that novel?
He did exactly what I told him to do.
He excelled in music even as a child.
arabic: كان متفوقا في الموسيقى حتى في طفولته.
transliteration: kan mtfwqa fy almwsyqā ḥtā fy ṭfwlth.

english: He gave his blood to help his sister.
arabic: لقد أعطى دمه لكى يساعد أخته.
transliteration: lqd aʿṭā dmh lkā ysaʿd akhth.

english: He had only one hundred yen with him.
He read the book from cover to cover.
arabic: قرأ الكتاب من الجلدة إلى الجلدة.
transliteration: qra alktab mn aljldh ilā aljldh.

english: He translated the verse into English.
arabic: هو ترجم الاية الى اللغة الانكليزية .
transliteration: hw trjm alayh alā allghh alanklyzyh .

english: He was foolish enough to believe her.
He will play tennis with his friends.
arabic: سوف يلعب كرة المضرب مع أصدقائه.
transliteration: swf ylʿb krh almḍrb mʿ aṣdqaئh.

english: Health is more important than wealth.
Her feeling for him was reciprocated.
Her new novel will be out next month.
Hey, what are you guys talking about?
His performance was worthy of praise.
I added this website to my favorites.
arabic: لقد وضعت هذا الموقع في مفضلاتي.
transliteration: lqd wḍʿt hdha almwqʿ fy mfḍlaty.

english: I am familiar with this neighborhood.
I am not the captain of the new team.
I appreciate what you've done for me.
I assumed that was why you called me.
arabic: ظننت أنّك اتّصلت بي من أجل ذلك.
transliteration: ẓnnt ank atṣlt by mn ajl dhlk.

english: I can play the piano after a fashion.
I can see you're upset. What's wrong?
I can't lend Tom any money right now.
arabic: لا يمكنني إقراض توم في الوقت الحالي.
transliteration: la ymknny iqraḍ twm fy alwqt alḥaly.

english: I did that without consulting anyone.
I didn't think that Tom was that old.
arabic: لم أعتقد أن توم كان بذاك العمر.
transliteration: lm aʿtqd an twm kan bdhak alʿmr.

english: I didn't want to cry in front of Tom.
I don't believe I know where that is.
arabic: لا أعتقد أنّني أعرف هذا المكان.
transliteration: la aʿtqd anny aʿrf hdha almkan.

english: I don't believe a word you're saying.
I don't believe she would understand.
I don't know anything about his past.
I don't know what you heard about me.
arabic: لا أعلم ما الذي سمعته عني.
transliteration: la aʿlm ma aldhy smʿth ʿny.

english: I don't know where my ski gloves are.
arabic: لا أعرف أين توجد قفازات التزلج الخاصة بي.
transliteration: la aʿrf ayn twjd qfazat altzlj alkhaṣh by.

english: I don't know where my sunglasses are.
arabic: لا أعرف أين توجد نظاراتي الشمسية
transliteration: la aʿrf ayn twjd nẓaraty alshmsyh

english: I go to a restaurant every other day.
I got my foot caught in a train door.
I have lunch at noon with my friends.
arabic: أتناول الغداء عند الظهيرة مع أصدقائي.
transliteration: atnawl alghdaء ʿnd alẓhyrh mʿ aṣdqaئy.

english: I have never seen a red refrigerator.
arabic: لم أرَ براداً أحمر من قبل.
transliteration: lm arَ bradaan aḥmr mn qbl.

english: I have never seen a red refrigerator.
arabic: لم يسبق لي أن رأيت ثلاجةً حمراء.
transliteration: lm ysbq ly an rayt thlajhan ḥmraء.

english: I have no more time to talk with you.
arabic: لَيسَ لَديَّ المَزيدُ مِنَ الوقتِ للتَّحَدُثِ مَعَكَ
transliteration: lَysَ lَdyَ almَzydُ mِnَ alwqtِ lltَḥَdُthِ mَʿَkَ

english: I have nothing to do with the matter.
arabic: ليس لدي أيُ شأنٍ في هذا الأمر.
transliteration: lys ldy ayُ shanin fy hdha alamr.

english: I hope Tom is more careful next time.
arabic: أتمنى ان يكون توم أكثر حرصاً المرة القادمة.
transliteration: atmnā an ykwn twm akthr ḥrṣaan almrh alqadmh.

english: I know what it is you're looking for.
arabic: أنا أعرف ما الذي تبحث عنهُ.
transliteration: ana aʿrf ma aldhy tbḥth ʿnhُ.

english: I know why you don't want to do that.
arabic: أعلم لماذا لا تريد القيام بذلك.
transliteration: aʿlm lmadha la tryd alqyam bdhlk.

english: I lost my wife in a traffic accident.
I love the sound of rain on the roof.
arabic: أحب صوت الغيث أثناء هطوله علی السقف.
transliteration: aḥb ṣwt alghyth athnaء hṭwlh ʿlی alsqf.

english: I paid 1,500 yen for this dictionary.
I read at least one book every month.
arabic: أقرأ على الأقل كتاباً واحداً في الشهر.
transliteration: aqra ʿlā alaql ktabaan waḥdaan fy alshhr.

english: I spent all afternoon in the library.
arabic: لقد قضيت كل نهاري في المكتبة
transliteration: lqd qḍyt kl nhary fy almktbh

english: I spent all afternoon in the library.
I started learning Chinese last week.
I suggested that he go there at once.
arabic: أنا أقترح أن يذهب إلى هناك في الحال.
transliteration: ana aqtrḥ an ydhhb ilā hnak fy alḥal.

english: I think that Tom is hiding something.
I think you are a really nice person.
I tried to forget that she had cried.
arabic: حاولت أن أنسى أنّها قد بكيت.
transliteration: ḥawlt an ansā anha qd bkyt.

english: I want a list of all Tom's relatives.
I was here yesterday for three hours.
arabic: كنت هنا البارحة لمدة ثلاث ساعات.
transliteration: knt hna albarḥh lmdh thlath saʿat.

english: I will lend you money just this once.
I would like to hear your voice, too.
I'll give you a good piece of advice.
I'm going there even if you don't go.
arabic: أنا ذاهب إلى هناك حتى ولو لم تذهب.
transliteration: ana dhahb ilā hnak ḥtā wlw lm tdhhb.

english: I'm going to be late for the meeting.
I'm going to go shopping after lunch.
I'm going to help you save some time.
I'm just trying to uncover the truth.
I'm looking for a gift for my father.
I'm not going to turn my back on Tom.
I'm sorry, but I can't hear you well.
I'm too scared to go there by myself.
arabic: أنا خائف جداً من الذهاب إلى هناك بمفردي.
transliteration: ana khaئf jdaan mn aldhhab ilā hnak bmfrdy.

english: I'm too scared to go there by myself.
arabic: أنا خائف جداً من الذهاب إلى هناك بنفسي.
transliteration: ana khaئf jdaan mn aldhhab ilā hnak bnfsy.

english: I'm too scared to go there by myself.
arabic: أنا خائفه جداً من الذهاب إلى هناك بمفردي.
transliteration: ana khaئfh jdaan mn aldhhab ilā hnak bmfrdy.

english: If I were you, I'd follow his advice.
If you buy in bulk, it's 20% cheaper.
If you're looking for a job, call me.
arabic: إن كنت تبحث عن وظيفة، اتصل بي.
transliteration: in knt tbḥth ʿn wẓyfh، atṣl by.

english: Is the university's library open now?
It appears the storm has calmed down.
It is up to you to decide what to do.
It was where you told me it would be.
arabic: كان في المكان الذي قلت لي سيكون.
transliteration: kan fy almkan aldhy qlt ly sykwn.

english: It wasn't easy to solve this problem.
arabic: لم يكن من السهل حل هذه المشكلة
transliteration: lm ykn mn alshl ḥl hdhh almshklh

english: It's easy to see why people like Tom.
arabic: مِن السهل معرفة سبب حبّ الناس لِتوم.
transliteration: mِn alshl mʿrfh sbb ḥb alnas lِtwm.

english: Japan is in the eastern part of Asia.
Lack of sleep is bad for your health.
Let me sleep for another ten minutes.
Let's eat something before we go out.
Let's wait until the crowd thins out.
Mary looked at herself in the mirror.
arabic: نظرت ماري إلى نفسها في المرآة.
transliteration: nẓrt mary ilā nfsha fy almrāh.

english: Mary seems to be bored with the game.
arabic: يظهر أن ماري ملّتْ من هذه اللعبة.
transliteration: yẓhr an mary mlt mn hdhh allʿbh.

english: May I see your driver's license, sir?
Most people don't drink enough water.
arabic: لا يشرب أغلب الناس ما يكفيهم من المياه.
transliteration: la yshrb aghlb alnas ma ykfyhm mn almyah.

english: Most students come to school on foot.
arabic: معظم الطلبة يأتون إلى المدرسة مشياً على الأقدام.
transliteration: mʿẓm alṭlbh yatwn ilā almdrsh mshyaan ʿlā alaqdam.

english: My aunt gave me a book for Christmas.
arabic: أهدتني عمتي كتابًا في عيد ميلاد المسيح.
transliteration: ahdtny ʿmty ktabana fy ʿyd mylad almsyḥ.

english: My aunt gave me a book for Christmas.
arabic: أهدتني خالتي كتابًا في عيد ميلاد المسيح.
transliteration: ahdtny khalty ktabana fy ʿyd mylad almsyḥ.

english: My father doesn't let me drive a car.
arabic: لا يسمح لي أبي بقيادة السيارة.
transliteration: la ysmḥ ly aby bqyadh alsyarh.

english: My father helped me with my homework.
My mother is making my father a cake.
My mother sent me a birthday present.
arabic: أرسلت لي أمي هدية لعيد ميلادي.
transliteration: arslt ly amy hdyh lʿyd mylady.

english: My sister sometimes makes our dinner.
My uncle brought a new TV set for us.
arabic: اشترى لنا عمّي جهاز تلفاز جديد.
transliteration: ashtrā lna ʿmy jhaz tlfaz jdyd.

english: Next Monday and Tuesday are holidays.
No one I know writes letters anymore.
arabic: لا أحد أعرفهُ يكتب خِطابات بعد الآن.
transliteration: la aḥd aʿrfhُ yktb khِṭabat bʿd alān.

english: No words can express her deep sorrow.
No words can express her deep sorrow.
arabic: الكلمات لا يسعها التعبير عن حزنها العميق.
transliteration: alklmat la ysʿha altʿbyr ʿn ḥznha alʿmyq.

english: No words can relieve her deep sorrow.
arabic: الكلمات لا يسعها التخفيف عن حزنها العميق.
transliteration: alklmat la ysʿha altkhfyf ʿn ḥznha alʿmyq.

english: None of my classmates live near here.
arabic: لا أحد من زملائي يعيشون بالقرب من هنا.
transliteration: la aḥd mn zmlaئy yʿyshwn balqrb mn hna.

english: Nothing is written on the helicopter.
Peach trees require lots of sunshine.
arabic: أشجار الخوخ تتطلب الكثير من أشعة الشمس.
transliteration: ashjar alkhwkh ttṭlb alkthyr mn ashʿh alshms.

english: Please clean the floor with this mop.
arabic: من فضلك نظف الارض بهذه الممسحة
transliteration: mn fḍlk nẓf alarḍ bhdhh almmsḥh

english: School begins the day after tomorrow.
School starts in September in Europe.
arabic: تبدأ الدراسة في أوروبا شهر سبتمبر.
transliteration: tbda aldrash fy awrwba shhr sbtmbr.

english: She divided the cake into six pieces.
She is getting prettier and prettier.
She needs him more than he needs her.
She taught me how to make a web site.
She's accustomed to getting up early.
Tell me your impression of this book.
Thanks to your help, I could succeed.
That music always reminded me of you.
That's not what I wanted to show you.
arabic: ليس هذا ما أردت منك رؤيته.
transliteration: lys hdha ma ardt mnk rؤyth.

english: That's not what I wanted to tell you.
arabic: ليس هذا ما أردت إخبارك عنه.
transliteration: lys hdha ma ardt ikhbark ʿnh.

english: The boy captured the bird with a net.
The exact same thing happened to Tom.
The first step is always the hardest.
arabic: الخطوة الأولى دائماً ما تكون الأصعب.
transliteration: alkhṭwh alawlā daئmaan ma tkwn alaṣʿb.

english: The man caught the girl by the wrist.
The rain has let up, so we can begin.
arabic: لقد توقف المطر, لذا يمكننا البدء.
transliteration: lqd twqf almṭr, ldha ymknna albdء.

english: The ship sails for Honolulu tomorrow.
The truth is I've never even met Tom.
arabic: الصراحة أني لم أقابل توم أبدا.
transliteration: alṣraḥh any lm aqabl twm abda.

english: The victim declined to press charges.
The world doesn't revolve around you.
Their punishment was harsh, but just.
There are a lot of books in his room.
There are fifty members in this club.
There was nothing I could do for Tom.
arabic: لا يمكنني القيام بشيء لأجل توم.
transliteration: la ymknny alqyam bshyء lajl twm.

english: There were twenty or so people there.
There's been a lot of rain this year.
arabic: هطل الكثير من المطر هذه السنة.
transliteration: hṭl alkthyr mn almṭr hdhh alsnh.

english: There's been a lot of rain this year.
There's so much I want to say to you.
arabic: هناك الكثير مما أود قوله لك.
transliteration: hnak alkthyr mma awd qwlh lk.

english: There's something I want to show you.
arabic: هناك شيئاً ما أريد أن ُأريكَ إياه.
transliteration: hnak shyئaan ma aryd an ُarykَ iyah.

english: These are all the things that I need.
They are talking about this and that.
arabic: إنهم يتحدثون عن هذا و ذاك.
transliteration: inhm ytḥdthwn ʿn hdha w dhak.

english: This beach is a popular tourist spot.
This book is difficult to understand.
This hotel is better than that hotel.
arabic: هذا الفندق أفضل من ذاك الفندق.
transliteration: hdha alfndq afḍl mn dhak alfndq.

english: This is an extremely important point.
This is an extremely important point.
This is an extremely important point.
This is the key that opens that door.
arabic: هذا هو المفتاح الذي يفتح الباب.
transliteration: hdha hw almftaḥ aldhy yftḥ albab.

english: This is the time he normally arrives.
arabic: هذا هو الوقت الذي يصل فيه عادة.
transliteration: hdha hw alwqt aldhy yṣl fyh ʿadh.

english: This park reminds me of my childhood.
Tom always did his best to help Mary.
arabic: على الدوام قدم توم أفضل ما يستطيع لمساعدة ماري.
transliteration: ʿlā aldwam qdm twm afḍl ma ystṭyʿ lmsaʿdh mary.

english: Tom asked Mary if she would help him.
arabic: سأل توم ماري إن كانت ستساعده.
transliteration: sal twm mary in kant stsaʿdh.

english: Tom asked me what had become of Mary.
Tom decided to enter the competition.
Tom didn't expect any help from Mary.
arabic: لم يتوقّع توم أيّة مساعدة من ماري.
transliteration: lm ytwqʿ twm ayh msaʿdh mn mary.

english: Tom didn't want to get married again.
Tom got into trouble because of Mary.
arabic: وقع توم في ورطة بسبب ماري.
transliteration: wqʿ twm fy wrṭh bsbb mary.

english: Tom has three sons and two daughters.
Tom leaned down and picked up a rock.
Tom lives in a nice little apartment.
arabic: يعيش توم في شقة صغيرة لطيفة
transliteration: yʿysh twm fy shqh ṣghyrh lṭyfh

english: Tom made cookies for Mary's children.
Tom says that he enjoyed the concert.
arabic: يقول توم بأنه استمتع بالحفلة الموسيقية.
transliteration: yqwl twm banh astmtʿ balḥflh almwsyqyh.

english: Tom told me that we were out of time.
arabic: أخبرني توم أن الوقت نَفَذَ منّا.
transliteration: akhbrny twm an alwqt nَfَdhَ mna.

english: Too much drinking will make you sick.
arabic: الإكثار من شرب المسكر سيصيبك بالمرض.
transliteration: alikthar mn shrb almskr syṣybk balmrḍ.

english: Watch the rear. I'll watch the front.
arabic: راقب الجزء الخلفي . ساراقب انا الجزء الامامي.
transliteration: raqb aljzء alkhlfy . saraqb ana aljzء alamamy.

english: We are grateful to you for your help.
We named my son after my grandfather.
What are you going to name your baby?
What do you want to do in the future?
arabic: ماذا تريد أن تفعل في المستقبل؟
transliteration: madha tryd an tfʿl fy almstqbl؟

english: What he says does not make any sense.
arabic: ما يقوله ليس له أي معنى.
transliteration: ma yqwlh lys lh ay mʿnā.

english: When did you get back from your trip?
Where are you getting the money from?
Which goes faster, a ship or a train?
Who knows what might happen tomorrow?
arabic: من يعلم ما قد يحص غدًا؟
transliteration: mn yʿlm ma qd yḥṣ ghdana؟

english: Why did you tell Tom it was my fault?
arabic: لماذا أخبرت توم بأنه كان خطئي؟
transliteration: lmadha akhbrt twm banh kan khṭئy؟

english: Why do you like wearing hats so much?
Why do you think I told her about it?
Why do you think you have to do that?
arabic: لم تعتقد أنّه يجب أن تقوم بذلك؟
transliteration: lm tʿtqd anh yjb an tqwm bdhlk؟

english: Why don't you and I do that together?
Will you drink another cup of coffee?
arabic: هل تشرب كأسًا آخر من القهوة.
transliteration: hl tshrb kasana ākhr mn alqhwh.

english: You are tall, but he is still taller.
You aren't responsible for that mess.
arabic: أنتَ لستُ مسؤؤلاً عن تلك الفوضى.
transliteration: antَ lstُ msؤؤlaan ʿn tlk alfwḍā.

english: You aren't responsible for that mess.
arabic: أنتِ لستِ مسؤولة عن تلك الفوضى.
transliteration: antِ lstِ msؤwlh ʿn tlk alfwḍā.

english: You don't give up too easily, do you?
arabic: أنت لا تستسلم بسهولة جداً، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: ant la tstslm bshwlh jdaan، alys kdhlk؟

english: You have to be prepared for anything.
You should have told it to me sooner.
You should start as early as you can.
arabic: ينبغي أن تبدأَ أبكر ما يمكنك.
transliteration: ynbghy an tbdaَ abkr ma ymknk.

english: You're a friend of Tom's, aren't you?
Your mother is in critical condition.
"Did she buy a watch?" "Yes, she did."

arabic: هل ستمطر غدا؟ لا أتمني ذلك
transliteration: hl stmṭr ghda؟ la atmny dhlk

english: "Will you help me?" "I'll be glad to."
After the lightning, came the thunder.
All I know is that he came from China.
arabic: كل ما أعرفه هو أنه من الصين.
transliteration: kl ma aʿrfh hw anh mn alṣyn.

english: Being very tired, I went to bed early.
arabic: كنت متعباً فخلدت إلى النوم باكراً.
transliteration: knt mtʿbaan fkhldt ilā alnwm bakraan.

arabic: كلما زادت الكمية زادت السعرات الحرارية.
transliteration: klma zadt alkmyh zadt alsʿrat alḥraryh.

english: Can I borrow your tennis racket today?
arabic: هل لي أن أستعير مضربك اليوم؟
transliteration: hl ly an astʿyr mḍrbk alywm؟

english: Can I borrow your tennis racket today?
arabic: أيمكنني أن أستعير مضرب التنس خاصتك لليوم؟
transliteration: aymknny an astʿyr mḍrb altns khaṣtk llywm؟

english: Can I borrow your tennis racket today?
Can you give me a lift to the station?
Can you give me a lift to the station?
arabic: هل لك أن تقلني إلى المحطة؟
transliteration: hl lk an tqlny ilā almḥṭh؟

english: Could you give me a ride to the station?
Did you forget to wax the floor again?
Do you know how to get to Tom's house?
arabic: هل تعرف كيف أصل إلى منزل توم؟
transliteration: hl tʿrf kyf aṣl ilā mnzl twm؟

english: Do you know what time it is in Boston?
arabic: هل تعلم كم الوقت الأن في بوسطن؟
transliteration: hl tʿlm km alwqt alan fy bwsṭn؟

english: Don't depend on your parents too much.
Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
Don't worry. He knows what he's doing.
arabic: لا تقلق. إنهُ يعرف ما يفعلهُ.
transliteration: la tqlq. inhُ yʿrf ma yfʿlhُ.

english: Don't you get bored when you're alone?
arabic: ألا تحس بالملل عندما تكون وحيداً؟
transliteration: ala tḥs balmll ʿndma tkwn wḥydaan؟

english: Even though he was poor, he was happy.
arabic: بالرغم من فقره إلا أنه تغمره السعادة.
transliteration: balrghm mn fqrh ila anh tghmrh alsʿadh.

english: Guacamole is a dip made from avocados.
arabic: صلصة غواكامولي هي صلصة مصنوعة من الأفوكادو.
transliteration: ṣlṣh ghwakamwly hy ṣlṣh mṣnwʿh mn alafwkadw.

english: He has an unpleasant look in his eyes.
He is my friend. Do you guys know him?
arabic: إنه صديقي، هل تعرفونه يا شباب؟
transliteration: inh ṣdyqy، hl tʿrfwnh ya shbab؟

english: He paid no attention to what she said.
arabic: لم يعر أي اهتمام لما قالت.
transliteration: lm yʿr ay ahtmam lma qalt.

english: He was listening to music in his room.
arabic: كان يستمع إلى الموسيقى في غرفته.
transliteration: kan ystmʿ ilā almwsyqā fy ghrfth.

english: He wouldn't allow me to drive his car.
arabic: لم يسمح لي أن أقود سيارته إطلاقاً.
transliteration: lm ysmḥ ly an aqwd syarth iṭlaqaan.

english: How can I remember Chinese characters?
How far is it from here to the museum?
How far is it from your house to the park?
How long do you play tennis every day?
arabic: كم ساعة في اليوم تلعب التنس؟
transliteration: km saʿh fy alywm tlʿb altns؟

english: How many boys are there in this class?
arabic: كم ولداً موجود في هذا الصف؟
transliteration: km wldaan mwjwd fy hdha alṣf؟

english: How many cats are there in this house?
arabic: كم عدد القطط الموجودة في هذا المنزل ؟
transliteration: km ʿdd alqṭṭ almwjwdh fy hdha almnzl ؟

english: How many times do I need to repeat it?
I can't believe Tom made that mistake.
arabic: لا أصدق أن توم ارتكب هذا الخطأ.
transliteration: la aṣdq an twm artkb hdha alkhṭa.

english: I can't come up with a plan right now.
I can't concentrate while you're here.
arabic: لا يمكنني التركيز عندما تكون هنا.
transliteration: la ymknny altrkyz ʿndma tkwn hna.

english: I can't forget the day when I met him.
arabic: لا يمكنني أن أنسى اليوم الذي قابلته فيه.
transliteration: la ymknny an ansā alywm aldhy qablth fyh.

english: I can't understand what you're saying.
I can't understand what you're saying.
I decided to tell her that I love her.
I didn't know what Tom was looking at.
arabic: لم أكن أعرف ما الذي كان ينظر إليه توم.
transliteration: lm akn aʿrf ma aldhy kan ynẓr ilyh twm.

english: I don't want to go shopping by myself.
I don't want to talk to Tom right now.
arabic: أنا لا أريد أن أتحدث إلى توم الآن.
transliteration: ana la aryd an atḥdth ilā twm alān.

english: I don't worry so much about my resume.
arabic: أنا لستُ قلقاً كثيراً بشأن سيرتي الذاتية.
transliteration: ana lstُ qlqaan kthyraan bshan syrty aldhatyh.

english: I forgot to do my homework last night.
arabic: نسيت أداء الواجب المنزلي الليلة الماضية.
transliteration: nsyt adaء alwajb almnzly allylh almaḍyh.

english: I had my thirtieth birthday last week.
arabic: لقد كان عيد ميلادي الثلاثين الأسبوع الماضي.
transliteration: lqd kan ʿyd mylady althlathyn alasbwʿ almaḍy.

english: I have a lot of passwords to remember.
arabic: لديَ الكثير من كلمات السر لأتذكرها.
transliteration: ldyَ alkthyr mn klmat alsr latdhkrha.

english: I have no more than 1,000 yen with me.
I have to memorize a lot of passwords.
arabic: يجب عليَ حفظ الكثير من كلمات السر.
transliteration: yjb ʿlyَ ḥfẓ alkthyr mn klmat alsr.

english: I haven't been fishing in a long time.
arabic: لم أقم بصيد السمك منذ وقت طويل
transliteration: lm aqm bṣyd alsmk mndh wqt ṭwyl

english: I hope that all your dreams come true.
I intend to stay at a five-star hotel.
arabic: أنوي الإقامة في فندقٍ من فئة الخمسة نجوم.
transliteration: anwy aliqamh fy fndqin mn fئh alkhmsh njwm.

english: I like dogs, but my sister likes cats.
arabic: أنا أُحب الكلاب, ولكن أُختي تحب القطط.
transliteration: ana aُḥb alklab, wlkn aُkhty tḥb alqṭṭ.

english: I lost my watch, so I have to buy one.
arabic: أضعت ساعتي فعليّ الآن أن أشتري واحدة أخرى.
transliteration: aḍʿt saʿty fʿly alān an ashtry waḥdh akhrā.

english: I met him on the street the other day.
I needed to make sure you'd come here.
arabic: أردتُ أن أتأكد أنك ستأتي إلى هنا.
transliteration: ardtُ an atakd ank staty ilā hna.

english: I once wanted to be an astrophysicist.
arabic: أردتُ مرّةً أن أتخصّصَ في الفيزياء الفلكيّة.
transliteration: ardtُ mrhan an atkhṣṣَ fy alfyzyaء alflkyh.

english: I only need one onion for this recipe.
arabic: أحتاج بصلة واحدة فقط لهذه الوصفة.
transliteration: aḥtaj bṣlh waḥdh fqṭ lhdhh alwṣfh.

english: I prefer going out to staying at home.
arabic: أفضل الخروج على البقاء في البيت.
transliteration: afḍl alkhrwj ʿlā albqaء fy albyt.

english: I remember singing that song long ago.
arabic: أتذكر أني غنيت هذه الأغنية منذ وقت بعيد.
transliteration: atdhkr any ghnyt hdhh alaghnyh mndh wqt bʿyd.

english: I rushed out to see what was going on.
arabic: انا خرجت مسرعا لارى ماذا حدث بالخارج
transliteration: ana khrjt msrʿa larā madha ḥdth balkharj

english: I studied in Boston from 2003 to 2007.
arabic: درست في بوسطون من عام ألفين و ثلاثة إلى عام ألفين و سبعة للميلاد.
transliteration: drst fy bwsṭwn mn ʿam alfyn w thlathh ilā ʿam alfyn w sbʿh llmylad.

english: I think it is best not to be impolite.
arabic: أظن أن من الأفضل ألا تكون وقِحًا.
transliteration: aẓn an mn alafḍl ala tkwn wqِḥana.

english: I told them to send me another ticket.
arabic: أخبرتُهُم أن يُرْسِلُوا لي تذِكرةً أُخرى.
transliteration: akhbrtُhُm an yُrsِlُwa ly tdhِkrhan aُkhrā.

english: I usually go for a walk every morning.
I wanted to show them my appreciation.
I will not blame him for the accident.
I wonder why nobody does that anymore.
arabic: أتساءل لم يعد أحد يقوم بذلك.
transliteration: atsaءl lm yʿd aḥd yqwm bdhlk.

english: I'd like you to meet a friend of mine.
I'd love to know what's going on here.
arabic: أودّ أن أعلم ما يحدث هنا.
transliteration: awd an aʿlm ma yḥdth hna.

english: I'd rather stay here than go to Tom's.
arabic: أفضل البقاء هنا على أن أذهب لتوم.
transliteration: afḍl albqaء hna ʿlā an adhhb ltwm.

english: I'll be staying here for three months.
I'll never forget what you did for me.
arabic: لن أنس أبدا ما فعلته من أجلي.
transliteration: ln ans abda ma fʿlth mn ajly.

english: I'll return the book as soon as I can.
I'm going to see the dentist tomorrow.
I'm sorry. I didn't intend to do that.
I'm sure that she will come back soon.
arabic: أنا متأكد من أنها ستعود قريباً.
transliteration: ana mtakd mn anha stʿwd qrybaan.

english: I've been walking for over four hours.
I've never been sick a day in my life.
In which folder did you save the file?
Is French more difficult than English?
arabic: هل اللغة الفرنسية أصعب من الإنجليزية؟
transliteration: hl allghh alfrnsyh aṣʿb mn alinjlyzyh؟

english: Is this your first visit to this town?
arabic: هل هذه أول زيارة لك للمدينة؟
transliteration: hl hdhh awl zyarh lk llmdynh؟

english: It'll only take a minute of your time.
Just do the essential repairs, please.
arabic: فقط قم بالإصلاحات الضرورية, لو سمحت..
transliteration: fqṭ qm baliṣlaḥat alḍrwryh, lw smḥt..

english: Last night, he studied all night long.
Let's ask her when she gets back home.
Let's forget last night ever happened.
arabic: لننسى كلّيّة ما حدث اللّيلة الماضية.
transliteration: lnnsā klyh ma ḥdth allylh almaḍyh.

english: Let's not waste time arguing about it.
arabic: لنتوقف عن تضييع الوقت في الجدال بشأن ذلك.
transliteration: lntwqf ʿn tḍyyʿ alwqt fy aljdal bshan dhlk.

english: Let's see what we're up against first.
arabic: لنرى طبيعة المشكل الذي نواجهه أولا.
transliteration: lnrā ṭbyʿh almshkl aldhy nwajhh awla.

english: Love is strong, but money is stronger.
Mary bought a new dress for the party.
Mary took the cookies out of the oven.
Muslims believe that there is only one God.
arabic: يؤمن المسلمون أنّه هناك ربّ واحد فقط.
transliteration: yؤmn almslmwn anh hnak rb waḥd fqṭ.

english: My brother helped me with my homework.
My brother helped me with my homework.
My major is medieval European history.
arabic: تخصصي هو تاريخ أوروبا في العصور الوسطى.
transliteration: tkhṣṣy hw tarykh awrwba fy alʿṣwr alwsṭā.

english: My wife is afraid to drive my new car.
arabic: زوجتي خائفة من قيادة سيارة جديدة.
transliteration: zwjty khaئfh mn qyadh syarh jdydh.

english: No one believes what Tom says anymore.
arabic: لا أحد يصدق ما يقولهُ توم بعد الآن.
transliteration: la aḥd yṣdq ma yqwlhُ twm bʿd alān.

english: No one knows where that dog came from.
arabic: لا أحد يعلم من أين أتى ذلك الكلب.
transliteration: la aḥd yʿlm mn ayn atā dhlk alklb.

english: Not every question deserves an answer.
Only one person survived the accident.
Our company makes use of the Internet.
Our plane was flying above the clouds.
Please do what you consider necessary.
arabic: من فضلك إفعل ما تراهُ ضرورياً.
transliteration: mn fḍlk ifʿl ma trahُ ḍrwryaan.

english: She helped the old man cross the road.
arabic: لقد ساعدتْ العجوز على عبور الطريق.
transliteration: lqd saʿdt alʿjwz ʿlā ʿbwr alṭryq.

english: She helped the old man cross the road.
arabic: لقد ساعدتْ الرجل العجوز على عبور الطريق.
transliteration: lqd saʿdt alrjl alʿjwz ʿlā ʿbwr alṭryq.

english: She prefers staying home to going out.
arabic: إنها تفضل البقاء في المنزل على الخروج.
transliteration: inha tfḍl albqaء fy almnzl ʿlā alkhrwj.

english: She told me that she wanted a pet dog.
So far everything has been successful.
arabic: حتى الآن، كل شيء كان ناجحا.
transliteration: ḥtā alān، kl shyء kan najḥa.

english: Sorry, but I can't hear you very well.
arabic: المعذرة لكنّي لا أستطيع سماعك جيّداً.
transliteration: almʿdhrh lkny la astṭyʿ smaʿk jydaan.

english: That has happened to me several times.
That's something you need to remember.
That's the fastest train in the world.
That's the place where I used to work.
arabic: ذلك هو المكان الذي كنت أعمل فيه.
transliteration: dhlk hw almkan aldhy knt aʿml fyh.

english: The Japanese like to travel in groups.
The Japanese like to travel in groups.
The birds flew away in all directions.
The birds flew away in all directions.
The boy washing the car is my brother.
arabic: الولد الذي يغسل السيارة هو أخي.
transliteration: alwld aldhy yghsl alsyarh hw akhy.

english: The college accepted him as a student.
The girl was afraid of her own shadow.
The hunter followed the bear's tracks.
The ice melted into a puddle of water.
The man aimed a gun at the detectives.
The new method was anything but ideal.
arabic: الطريقة الجديدة لم تكن مثاليةً البتة.
transliteration: alṭryqh aljdydh lm tkn mthalyhan albth.

english: The new plan has been very successful.
The parcel weighs more than one pound.
The police set out to solve the crime.
The problem is too difficult to solve.
The question is where to buy the book.
arabic: المشكلة هي أين يمكن أن يُشترى الكتاب.
transliteration: almshklh hy ayn ymkn an yُshtrā alktab.

english: The road runs parallel with the river.
The water in this river is very clean.
arabic: المياه في هذا النهر نظيفة جدا.
transliteration: almyah fy hdha alnhr nẓyfh jda.

english: The weather has been good until today.
There are lots of animals in the park.
arabic: هناك الكثير من الحيوانات في الحديقة.
transliteration: hnak alkthyr mn alḥywanat fy alḥdyqh.

english: There are lots of animals in the park.
arabic: يوجد الكثير من الحيوانات في المنتزه.
transliteration: ywjd alkthyr mn alḥywanat fy almntzh.

english: There must be a better way to do this.
arabic: لا بدّ أنّ هناك طريقة أفضل لفعل هذا.
transliteration: la bd an hnak ṭryqh afḍl lfʿl hdha.

english: There's an emergency exit in the rear.
They agreed to elect him as president.
They called off their visit to London.
They demanded damages from the driver.
They have four classes in the morning.
They lived in Spain for several years.
They say that she was born in Germany.
This bus will take you to the airport.
This bus will take you to the airport.
This is the first time that I've been here.
This telescope must be used carefully.
This will be a very dangerous mission.
Tom actually did what he said he'd do.
arabic: قام توم بعمل ما قد قال انه سيفعله حقا
transliteration: qam twm bʿml ma qd qal anh syfʿlh ḥqa

english: Tom and I are dependent on each other.
Tom and I are dependent on each other.
Tom and Mary are anxious to find jobs.
arabic: توم وماري متوترين للغاية للعثور على عمل.
transliteration: twm wmary mtwtryn llghayh llʿthwr ʿlā ʿml.

english: Tom asked Mary if she wanted to dance.
arabic: سأل "توم" "ماري" ما إذا كانت تود الرقص
transliteration: sal "twm" "mary" ma idha kant twd alrqṣ

english: Tom asked me why I could swim so fast.
arabic: سألني توم لماذا يمكنني السباحة بهذه السرعة.
transliteration: salny twm lmadha ymknny alsbaḥh bhdhh alsrʿh.

english: Tom can't decide whether he should go.
arabic: لا يستطيع توم أن يقرر فيما إذا كان عليه الذهاب.
transliteration: la ystṭyʿ twm an yqrr fyma idha kan ʿlyh aldhhab.

english: Tom couldn't read his own handwriting.
arabic: لم يتمكّن سامي من قراءة خطّه هو.
transliteration: lm ytmkn samy mn qraءh khṭh hw.

english: Tom didn't believe anything Mary said.
arabic: لم يصدّق توم أيا من كلام ماري.
transliteration: lm yṣdq twm aya mn klam mary.

english: Tom doesn't usually show his feelings.
Tom has a dentist appointment at 2:30.
arabic: توم لديه موعد اسنان عند الثانية والنصف
transliteration: twm ldyh mwʿd asnan ʿnd althanyh walnṣf

english: Tom has just been promoted to manager.
Tom isn't good at talking to children.
arabic: توم ليس جيد للحديث مع الاطفال
transliteration: twm lys jyd llḥdyth mʿ alaṭfal

english: Tom said that he wasn't allowed to do that.
arabic: قال توم بأنه لم يكن مسموحا له فعل ذلك.
transliteration: qal twm banh lm ykn msmwḥa lh fʿl dhlk.

english: Tom said that Mary was a good swimmer.
arabic: توم قال ان ماري كانت سباحة جيدة.
transliteration: twm qal an mary kant sbaḥh jydh.

english: Tom understands what needs to be done.
arabic: يعرف توم ما هو المطلوب عمله.
transliteration: yʿrf twm ma hw almṭlwb ʿmlh.

english: Tom was heartbroken when his dog died.
arabic: توم كان قلبه مكسور عندما مات كلبه
transliteration: twm kan qlbh mkswr ʿndma mat klbh

english: Tom was the one who started the fight.
Walk faster, or you'll miss the train.
arabic: سر بسرعة، أو إنّك ستفوّت القطار.
transliteration: sr bsrʿh، aw ink stfwt alqṭar.

english: Walk faster, or you'll miss the train.
We are all convinced of his innocence.
We could be making a big mistake here.
arabic: يمكن أن نرتكب خطأ كبير هنا.
