transliteration: ymkn an nrtkb khṭa kbyr hna.

english: We have a lot of earthquakes in Japan.
arabic: لدينا الكثير من الزلازل في اليابان.
transliteration: ldyna alkthyr mn alzlazl fy alyaban.

english: We need you to help us this afternoon.
arabic: نحتاج منك أن تساعدنا هذا المساء.
transliteration: nḥtaj mnk an tsaʿdna hdha almsaء.

english: We returned to Boston on October 20th.
arabic: عدنا إلى بوستن في العشرين من أكتوبر.
transliteration: ʿdna ilā bwstn fy alʿshryn mn aktwbr.

english: What are we having for dinner tonight?
What are you up to tomorrow afternoon?
What do you actually do in the office?
arabic: ما هي طبيعة عملك في المكتب؟
transliteration: ma hy ṭbyʿh ʿmlk fy almktb؟

english: What specifically are you looking for?
What specifically are you looking for?
What specifically are you looking for?
What time are you getting up tomorrow?
What'll you be doing over the weekend?
arabic: ماذا ستفعل في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع؟
transliteration: madha stfʿl fy ʿṭlh nhayh alasbwʿ؟

english: Which do you prefer, spring or autumn?
Which ice cream shop are you going to?
arabic: أي مَحَل مثلجات أنتَ ذاهب إليه؟
transliteration: ay mَḥَl mthljat antَ dhahb ilyh؟

english: Why did you tell them it was my fault?
Why do you blame me for what happened?
Would you be arrested if you did that?
arabic: هَل سَيتمُّ إعتِقالُكَ إنْ فَعَلتَ ذلِك؟
transliteration: hَl sَytmُ iʿtِqalُkَ in fَʿَltَ dhlِk؟

english: You always try to blame somebody else.
You can take off the bandage tomorrow.
You certainly have a lot of questions.
You just have to promise me one thing.
arabic: أنتً عليكَ فقط أن تعدُني بشيء واحد.
transliteration: antan ʿlykَ fqṭ an tʿdُny bshyء waḥd.

english: You just have to promise me one thing.
arabic: أنتِ عليكِ فقط أن تعِديني بشيء واحد.
transliteration: antِ ʿlykِ fqṭ an tʿِdyny bshyء waḥd.

english: You mustn't depend on others for help.
arabic: يجب ألا تعتمد على الآخرين للمساعدة.
transliteration: yjb ala tʿtmd ʿlā alākhryn llmsaʿdh.

english: You only have 24 hours left to decide.
You should live up to your principles.
You shouldn't have given up so easily.
arabic: كان عليك ألّا تستلم بهذه السهولة.
transliteration: kan ʿlyk ala tstlm bhdhh alshwlh.

english: Your daughters have turned into women.
Your help is necessary to our success.
"Do you have a pen?" "Yes, I have one."
"Do you have a pen?" "Yes, I have one."
"Is he coming?" "No, I don't think so."
A widower is a man whose wife has died.
All you need to do is listen carefully.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله هو أن تسمع بعناية.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh hw an tsmʿ bʿnayh.

english: Are you looking for something specific?
Are you sure you don't need to do that?
arabic: هل أنت متأكد بأنك لست بحاجة فعل هذا؟
transliteration: hl ant mtakd bank lst bḥajh fʿl hdha؟

english: Aren't you going to finish your supper?
Astronomy is by no means a new science.
arabic: علم الفلك ليس جديدا على الإطلاق.
transliteration: ʿlm alflk lys jdyda ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: Because I had a cold, I stayed at home.
arabic: لقد بقيت في المنزل لأنني كنت مصاباً بالزكام .
transliteration: lqd bqyt fy almnzl lanny knt mṣabaan balzkam .

english: Can this possibly be the right address?
arabic: هل يمكن أن يكون هذا العنوان الصحيح؟
transliteration: hl ymkn an ykwn hdha alʿnwan alṣḥyḥ؟

english: Can you tell me the way to the library?
arabic: هل يمكنك إخباري الطريق إلي المكتبة؟
transliteration: hl ymknk ikhbary alṭryq ily almktbh؟

english: Did you forget to sign your name again?
Do you have any idea who would do this?
arabic: هل لديك اي فكرة عن من يستطيع فعل هذا؟
transliteration: hl ldyk ay fkrh ʿn mn ystṭyʿ fʿl hdha؟

english: Do you know what Tom does for a living?
arabic: هل تعلم ما يعمله توم لكسب لقمة العيش؟
transliteration: hl tʿlm ma yʿmlh twm lksb lqmh alʿysh؟

english: Do you know what Tom does for a living?
arabic: هل تعلم ما يعمله توم لكسب رزقه؟
transliteration: hl tʿlm ma yʿmlh twm lksb rzqh؟

english: Do you know what Tom does for a living?
arabic: هل تعرف ما هي مهنة توم؟
transliteration: hl tʿrf ma hy mhnh twm؟

english: Do you think Tom knows Mary likes John?
arabic: هل تظنّ أن سامي يعلم بحبّ ليلى لفاضل؟
transliteration: hl tẓn an samy yʿlm bḥb lylā lfaḍl؟

english: Don't be late for the meeting tomorrow.
Don't despise a man because he is poor.
Don't forget that there are exceptions.
arabic: لا تنس أنّه توجد حالات استثنائيّة.
transliteration: la tns anh twjd ḥalat astthnaئyh.

english: Don't forget to lock up when you leave.
arabic: لا تنس إقفال الأبواب عند مغادرتك.
transliteration: la tns iqfal alabwab ʿnd mghadrtk.

english: Don't forget to take a camera with you.
arabic: لا تنس أن تأخذ كاميرا معك.
transliteration: la tns an takhdh kamyra mʿk.

english: Don't give up. You still have a chance.
arabic: لا تستسلم فما زالت لديك فرصة.
transliteration: la tstslm fma zalt ldyk frṣh.

english: He is deaf, but knows how to read lips.
arabic: هو أصم، لكنه يعرف كيف يقرأ الشفاه.
transliteration: hw aṣm، lknh yʿrf kyf yqra alshfah.

english: He is worthy to be captain of our team.
arabic: إنه جدير بأن يكون قائد فريقنا.
transliteration: inh jdyr ban ykwn qaئd fryqna.

english: He kissed his daughter on the forehead.
He speaks English with a German accent.
He was hit by a car and died instantly.
arabic: لقد صدم من قبل سيارة وتوفي على الفور.
transliteration: lqd ṣdm mn qbl syarh wtwfy ʿlā alfwr.

english: He will go to Tokyo tomorrow, won't he?
arabic: سيذهب إلى طوكيو غداً، أليس ذلك صحيحاً؟
transliteration: sydhhb ilā ṭwkyw ghdaan، alys dhlk ṣḥyḥaan؟

english: How about playing tennis next Saturday?
arabic: ما رأيك بلعب التنس السبت القادم؟
transliteration: ma rayk blʿb altns alsbt alqadm؟

english: How could I forget something like that?
arabic: كيف لي أن أنسى شيئا كهذا؟
transliteration: kyf ly an ansā shyئa khdha؟

english: How do you say "thank you" in Japanese?
How many mosques are there in Istanbul?
How many rooms are there in your house?
Hurry up, or you'll be late for school.
arabic: أسرع و إلا ستتأخر عن المدرسة.
transliteration: asrʿ w ila sttakhr ʿn almdrsh.

english: I accept, but only under one condition.
I can't forget about that stupid movie.
arabic: لا يمكنني نسيان ذلك الفيلم السّخيف.
transliteration: la ymknny nsyan dhlk alfylm alskhyf.

english: I can't remember the tune of that song.
I can't tolerate this noise any longer.
arabic: لا أستطيع تحمل هذا الضجيج أكثر من ذلك.
transliteration: la astṭyʿ tḥml hdha alḍjyj akthr mn dhlk.

english: I didn't think you'd forget to do that.
arabic: لم أكن أعتقد أنّك ستنسى ذلك.
transliteration: lm akn aʿtqd ank stnsā dhlk.

english: I don't believe that Tom is the killer.
arabic: لا أصدق أن توم هو القاتل.
transliteration: la aṣdq an twm hw alqatl.

english: I don't like watching subtitled movies.
I don't really care one way or another.
arabic: أنا حقاً غير مهتم بطريقة أو بأخرى.
transliteration: ana ḥqaan ghyr mhtm bṭryqh aw bakhrā.

english: I don't remember what happened anymore.
I don't remember what happened anymore.
I don't see what difference that makes.
I don't shampoo my hair in the morning.
arabic: لا أغسل شعري بالصابون في الصباح.
transliteration: la aghsl shʿry balṣabwn fy alṣbaḥ.

english: I don't think Tom knows how to do that.
arabic: لا أظنّن توم يعرف كيفيّة فعل ذلك.
transliteration: la aẓnn twm yʿrf kyfyh fʿl dhlk.

english: I don't think that I'd like doing that.
arabic: لا أَضنُّ أنني سَأُحِبُّ فِعلَ ذَلِك
transliteration: la aَḍnُ anny sَaُḥِbُ fِʿlَ dhَlِk

english: I don't want to tell them why I'm late.
arabic: لا أريد أن أخبرهم عن سبب تأخّري.
transliteration: la aryd an akhbrhm ʿn sbb takhry.

english: I felt my phone vibrating in my pocket.
arabic: شعرت بأن جوالي يهتز في جيبي.
transliteration: shʿrt ban jwaly yhtz fy jyby.

english: I found the key that I was looking for.
arabic: وجت المفتاح الذي كنت أبحث عنه.
transliteration: wjt almftaḥ aldhy knt abḥth ʿnh.

english: I got scolded severely by that teacher.
I got scolded severely by that teacher.
I had no difficulty finding your house.
arabic: لم أجد صعوبة في العثور على مكان بيتك.
transliteration: lm ajd ṣʿwbh fy alʿthwr ʿlā mkan bytk.

english: I have four times more CDs than you do.
arabic: لدي أربعة أضعاف ما عندك من الأقراص المدمجة.
transliteration: ldy arbʿh aḍʿaf ma ʿndk mn alaqraṣ almdmjh.

english: I have no idea what I'm supposed to do.
arabic: ليس لدي أي فكرة عما يجب عمله
transliteration: lys ldy ay fkrh ʿma yjb ʿmlh

english: I hope I don't have to use this pistol.
arabic: آمُل ألا أضطر إلى استخدام هذا المسدس.
transliteration: āmُl ala aḍṭr ilā astkhdam hdha almsds.

english: I just wish I knew how to speak French.
arabic: أتمنتى فقط لو أستطعتُ تكلّمَ الفرنسيّةِ.
transliteration: atmntā fqṭ lw astṭʿtُ tklmَ alfrnsyhِ.

english: I knew that something bad might happen.
arabic: علمت أن شيئا سيئا قد يحدث.
transliteration: ʿlmt an shyئa syئa qd yḥdth.

english: I need more time to finish my homework.
arabic: أحتاج لمزيد من الوقت لأنهي واجبي.
transliteration: aḥtaj lmzyd mn alwqt lanhy wajby.

english: I need more time to finish my homework.
arabic: أحتاج لمزيد من الوقت لأنهي واجبي المدرسي.
transliteration: aḥtaj lmzyd mn alwqt lanhy wajby almdrsy.

english: I need more time to finish my homework.
arabic: أحتاج لمزيد من الوقت لأنجز فروضي.
transliteration: aḥtaj lmzyd mn alwqt lanjz frwḍy.

english: I remember seeing him somewhere before.
arabic: أتذكر بأني رأيته من قبل في مكان ما.
transliteration: atdhkr bany rayth mn qbl fy mkan ma.

english: I stayed in Australia for three months.
arabic: لقد بقيت في أستراليا ثلاث شهور.
transliteration: lqd bqyt fy astralya thlath shhwr.

english: I still haven't learned to drive a car.
arabic: لم أتعلم كيف أقود السيارة بعد.
transliteration: lm atʿlm kyf aqwd alsyarh bʿd.

english: I take my camera with me wherever I go.
arabic: آخذ آلة التصوير معي أينما ذهبت.
transliteration: ākhdh ālh altṣwyr mʿy aynma dhhbt.

english: I think I mistakenly deleted that file.
arabic: أنا أعتقد أني بطريق الخطأ حذفت ذلك الملف.
transliteration: ana aʿtqd any bṭryq alkhṭa ḥdhft dhlk almlf.

english: I thought we weren't going to go there.
arabic: ظننت أننا لن نذهب إلى هناك.
transliteration: ẓnnt anna ln ndhhb ilā hnak.

english: I thought you didn't believe in ghosts.
arabic: ظننت أنك لا تؤمن بوجود الأشباح.
transliteration: ẓnnt ank la tؤmn bwjwd alashbaḥ.

english: I thought you might feel sorry for Tom.
arabic: ظننت أنك قد تشعر بالأسف على توم.
transliteration: ẓnnt ank qd tshʿr balasf ʿlā twm.

english: I thought you might want to come along.
arabic: ظننت أنك قد تود الذهاب معي.
transliteration: ẓnnt ank qd twd aldhhab mʿy.

english: I thought you might want to come along.
I thought you said you didn't like Tom.
arabic: ظننتك قلت أنك لا تحب توم.
transliteration: ẓnntk qlt ank la tḥb twm.

english: I told you I don't know how to do that.
arabic: قلت لك أنني لا أعرف كيف أفعل ذلك.
transliteration: qlt lk anny la aʿrf kyf afʿl dhlk.

english: I told you this was going to be boring.
arabic: قلت لك أن ذلك سيكون مملاً.
transliteration: qlt lk an dhlk sykwn mmlaan.

english: I want to know why I needed to do that.
arabic: أريد أن أعرف لم كنت مضطرّا للقيام بذلك.
transliteration: aryd an aʿrf lm knt mḍṭra llqyam bdhlk.

english: I wanted to buy one of Tom's paintings.
I was supposed to tell Tom where to go.
arabic: كان من المفترض أن أخبر توم أين عليه الذهاب.
transliteration: kan mn almftrḍ an akhbr twm ayn ʿlyh aldhhab.

english: I will ask him about it tomorrow, then.
I would like to get a camera like this.
arabic: لكم أريد الحصول على كاميرا مثل تلك!
transliteration: lkm aryd alḥṣwl ʿlā kamyra mthl tlk!

english: I'll try to shape my ideas into a book.
I'm afraid that I don't agree with you.
I'm going to play chess with Tom today.
I'm looking forward to summer vacation.
I'm looking forward to summer vacation.
I'm pretty sure that's how it happened.
arabic: أنا على يقين أنه هكذا جرى الأمر.
transliteration: ana ʿlā yqyn anh hkdha jrā alamr.

english: I'm sorry I couldn't get to you sooner.
arabic: أنا آسف لأنني لم أستطع الوصول إليك أبْكَر.
transliteration: ana āsf lanny lm astṭʿ alwṣwl ilyk abkَr.

english: I'm sorry I didn't reply to you sooner.
I'm sure I'll find a good gift for Tom.
arabic: أنا متأكد أني سأجد هدية جيدة لتوم.
transliteration: ana mtakd any sajd hdyh jydh ltwm.

english: I'm trying to find a way to make money.
arabic: احاول العثور على طريقة لجمع الأموال.
transliteration: aḥawl alʿthwr ʿlā ṭryqh ljmʿ alamwal.

english: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.
arabic: إذا أكلت كثيرًا فإنك تصير سمينًا.
transliteration: idha aklt kthyrana fink tṣyr smynana.

english: In my opinion, you ought to let Tom go.
arabic: في رأيي ، يجب أن تترك توم يذهب.
transliteration: fy rayy ، yjb an ttrk twm ydhhb.

english: Instead of going myself, I sent a gift.
arabic: بعثت بهدية عوضاً عن الذهاب بنفسي.
transliteration: bʿtht bhdyh ʿwḍaan ʿn aldhhab bnfsy.

english: It is impossible to live without water.
It's very important to get enough rest.
arabic: انه لمن المهم جداً الحصول على كفاية من الراحة.
transliteration: anh lmn almhm jdaan alḥṣwl ʿlā kfayh mn alraḥh.

english: It's very important to get enough rest.
arabic: انه لمن المهم جداً الحصول على ما يكفي من الراحة.
transliteration: anh lmn almhm jdaan alḥṣwl ʿlā ma ykfy mn alraḥh.

english: January is the first month of the year.
arabic: يناير هو أول شهر في السنة.
transliteration: ynayr hw awl shhr fy alsnh.

english: Japan relies on Arab countries for oil.
arabic: تعتمد اليابان على نفط البلدان العربية.
transliteration: tʿtmd alyaban ʿlā nfṭ albldan alʿrbyh.

english: Many students took part in the contest.
arabic: شارك كثير من الطلاب في المسابقة.
transliteration: shark kthyr mn alṭlab fy almsabqh.

english: Mars resembles our planet in some ways.
arabic: كوكب المريخ يشبه كوكبنا في نواحي عدّة.
transliteration: kwkb almrykh yshbh kwkbna fy nwaḥy ʿdh.

english: Mary rested her head on Tom's shoulder.
arabic: وضعت ليلى رأسها على كتف سامي.
transliteration: wḍʿt lylā rasha ʿlā ktf samy.

english: My daughter is getting married in June.
My mom doesn't speak English very well.
arabic: أمي لا تتحدث الإنجليزية بشكل جيد جداً.
transliteration: amy la ttḥdth alinjlyzyh bshkl jyd jdaan.

english: My mom doesn't speak English very well.
arabic: والدتي لا تتحدث الإنجليزية بشكل جيد جداً.
transliteration: waldty la ttḥdth alinjlyzyh bshkl jyd jdaan.

english: Not many students attended the meeting.
One man's meat is another man's poison.
Seeing the policeman, the man ran away.
arabic: هرب الرجل بعد أن رأى الشرطي.
transliteration: hrb alrjl bʿd an raā alshrṭy.

english: Seeing the policeman, the man ran away.
She advised him to go on a strict diet.
arabic: نَصَحَتهُ أَن يَقومَ بِنِظامٍ غِذائيٍ صارِم
transliteration: nَṣَḥَthُ aَn yَqwmَ bِnِẓamin ghِdhaئyin ṣarِm

english: She always forgets my telephone number.
arabic: هي دائما ما تنسى رقم هاتفي.
transliteration: hy daئma ma tnsā rqm hatfy.

english: She has gone through many difficulties.
She made friends with Tom at the party.
arabic: تعرّفت على توم في الحفلة و أصبحا صديقَيْن.
transliteration: tʿrft ʿlā twm fy alḥflh w aṣbḥa ṣdyqَyn.

english: She should listen more to other people.
arabic: ينبغي لها أن تستمع إلى آراء الآخرين أكثر.
transliteration: ynbghy lha an tstmʿ ilā āraء alākhryn akthr.

english: Thank you for inviting me to the party.
arabic: شكرأ على دعوتكَ لي إلى الحفلة.
transliteration: shkra ʿlā dʿwtkَ ly ilā alḥflh.

english: Thank you for inviting me to the party.
That kind of person will fail for sure.
arabic: إنسان من ذلك النوع سيفشل بالتأكيد.
transliteration: insan mn dhlk alnwʿ syfshl baltakyd.

english: The French flag is blue, white and red.
arabic: العلم الفرنسي ازرق و ابيض و احمر.
transliteration: alʿlm alfrnsy azrq w abyḍ w aḥmr.

english: The card you drew was a red, wasn't it?
arabic: البطاقة التي سحبتها حمراء، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: albṭaqh alty sḥbtha ḥmraء، alys kdhlk؟

english: The crowd yelled when he scored a goal.
The enemy kept up the attack all night.
arabic: داوم العدو على الهجوم طوال الليل.
transliteration: dawm alʿdw ʿlā alhjwm ṭwal allyl.

english: The grand jury indicted Tom for murder.
arabic: إتهمت هيئة المحلفين الكبرى توم بجريمة قتل.
transliteration: ithmt hyئh almḥlfyn alkbrā twm bjrymh qtl.

english: The phone rang when I was having lunch.
The phone rang when I was having lunch.
arabic: رنّ جرس الهاتف و أنا آكل طعام الغداء.
transliteration: rn jrs alhatf w ana ākl ṭʿam alghdaء.

english: The police have Tom under surveillance.
The ship was at the mercy of the waves.
The swans migrate from here to Florida.
arabic: يهاجر البجع من هنا إلى فلوريدا.
transliteration: yhajr albjʿ mn hna ilā flwryda.

english: The teacher told them to stop fighting.
arabic: طلب منهم المدرّس بالتوقف عن القتال.
transliteration: ṭlb mnhm almdrs baltwqf ʿn alqtal.

english: There are a few shops next to my house.
There are a lot of students in the gym.
arabic: هناك الكثير من الطلبة في القاعة الرياضية.
transliteration: hnak alkthyr mn alṭlbh fy alqaʿh alryaḍyh.

english: There were 150 passengers on the plane.
arabic: كان هناك 150 راكباً على متن الطائرة.
transliteration: kan hnak 150 rakbaan ʿlā mtn alṭaئrh.

english: There were a lot of people in the room.
arabic: كان هناك الكثير من الناس في الغرفة.
transliteration: kan hnak alkthyr mn alnas fy alghrfh.

english: There's a body in the trunk of the car.
This is the worst thing I've ever done.
Tom blamed the teacher for his failure.
arabic: لامَ سامي معلّمه على فشله هو.
transliteration: lamَ samy mʿlmh ʿlā fshlh hw.

english: Tom can't understand why Mary is angry.
arabic: توم لا يستطيع أن يفهم لماذا مارى غاضبة.
transliteration: twm la ystṭyʿ an yfhm lmadha marā ghaḍbh.

english: Tom didn't want to look like a tourist.
arabic: توم لا يريد ان يبدو كسائح .
transliteration: twm la yryd an ybdw ksaئḥ .

english: Tom doesn't have either a cat or a dog.
Tom doesn't like talking about himself.
arabic: لا يحب توم التحدث عن نفسه.
transliteration: la yḥb twm altḥdth ʿn nfsh.

english: Tom doesn't think that Mary is at home.
arabic: لا يظن توم أن ماري في البيت.
transliteration: la yẓn twm an mary fy albyt.

english: Tom felt something crawling on his arm.
arabic: أحس توم بشيء يزحف على ذراعه.
transliteration: aḥs twm bshyء yzḥf ʿlā dhraʿh.

english: Tom got quite a few positive responses.
arabic: تلقى توم كما لا بأس به من الردود الجيدة.
transliteration: tlqā twm kma la bas bh mn alrdwd aljydh.

english: Tom hung his new dartboard on the wall.
arabic: توم علق لوح السهام المريشة خاصته على الحائط.
transliteration: twm ʿlq lwḥ alsham almryshh khaṣth ʿlā alḥaئṭ.

english: Tom knows a lot about American history.
arabic: توم يعرف الكثير عن التاريخ الأميركي.
transliteration: twm yʿrf alkthyr ʿn altarykh alamyrky.

english: Tom tried his hardest to persuade Mary.
arabic: حاول توم كل ما بوسعه لإقناع ماري.
transliteration: ḥawl twm kl ma bwsʿh liqnaʿ mary.

english: Tom wanted to know where Mary had been.
arabic: أراد توم معرفة أين كانت ماري.
transliteration: arad twm mʿrfh ayn kant mary.

english: Tom was the last one to see Mary alive.
arabic: توم كان آخر من رأى ماري حيّة.
transliteration: twm kan ākhr mn raā mary ḥyh.

english: Tom wouldn't have known the difference.
Try it and tell me what it tastes like.
We need to communicate with each other.
arabic: نحتاج ان نتواصل مع بعضنا البعض.
transliteration: nḥtaj an ntwaṣl mʿ bʿḍna albʿḍ.

english: What he said would happen has happened.
What time did you go to bed last night?
arabic: متى خلدت إلى النوم ليلة الأمس؟
transliteration: mtā khldt ilā alnwm lylh alams؟

english: When he heard the news, he turned pale.
When was the last time you rode a bike?
arabic: متى كانت آخر مرة ركبت بها دراجة هوائية ؟
transliteration: mtā kant ākhr mrh rkbt bha drajh hwaئyh ؟

english: Where are the bills that you want me to pay?
arabic: أين هي الفواتير التي تريد أن أدفعها؟
transliteration: ayn hy alfwatyr alty tryd an adfʿha؟

english: Where can I pick up my airplane ticket?
arabic: من أين سأحصل على تذكارتي للطّيران؟
transliteration: mn ayn saḥṣl ʿlā tdhkarty llṭyran؟

english: Which do you like better, meat or fish?
Why did you leave your job on the farm?
Why didn't you tell us you knew French?
arabic: لماذا لم تخبرنا بانك تعرف الفرنسية؟
transliteration: lmadha lm tkhbrna bank tʿrf alfrnsyh؟

english: Why doesn't he send me letters anymore?
arabic: لِمَ لَمْ يعد يرسل لي رسائلا؟
transliteration: lِmَ lَm yʿd yrsl ly rsaئla؟

english: Why is autumn called "fall" in America?
Without your advice, I would've failed.
Without your advice, I would've failed.
Would you tell me what's going on here?
You have brought shame upon our family.
You made the same mistake as last time.
You must be the temporary we asked for.
arabic: لا بد أنك البديل المؤقت الذي طلبناه.
transliteration: la bd ank albdyl almؤqt aldhy ṭlbnah.

english: You must realize that I can't help you.
arabic: يجب أن تدرك بأننا لن نستطيع تقديم يد العون.
transliteration: yjb an tdrk banna ln nstṭyʿ tqdym yd alʿwn.

english: You'd better start as soon as possible.
arabic: من الأفضل لك أن تبدأ في أقرب فرصة ممكنة.
transliteration: mn alafḍl lk an tbda fy aqrb frṣh mmknh.

english: You'd better take an umbrella with you.
arabic: من الأفضل أن تأخذ مظلّة معك.
transliteration: mn alafḍl an takhdh mẓlh mʿk.

english: You'll feel better tomorrow, I promise.
Your reaction wasn't surprising at all.
arabic: لم يكن رد فعلك مفاجئًا على الإطلاق
transliteration: lm ykn rd fʿlk mfajئana ʿlā aliṭlaq

english: All of my grandparents are still living.
All you have to do is tell Tom to leave.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله هو إخبار توم بأن يرحل.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh hw ikhbar twm ban yrḥl.

english: All you have to do is tell Tom to leave.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله هو إخبار توم بأن يغادر.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh hw ikhbar twm ban yghadr.

english: Because of the bad weather, I didn't go.
Can you translate English into Japanese?
Children begin school at the age of six.
arabic: يبدأ الأطفال بالذهاب إلى المدرسة في سن السادسة.
transliteration: ybda alaṭfal baldhhab ilā almdrsh fy sn alsadsh.

english: Could I get a little piece of that cake?
arabic: أيمكنني الحصول على قطعة من تلك الكعكة؟
transliteration: aymknny alḥṣwl ʿlā qṭʿh mn tlk alkʿkh؟

english: Darwin changed the way we see the world.
arabic: لقد غيرَ داروين الطريقة التي نري بها العالم.
transliteration: lqd ghyrَ darwyn alṭryqh alty nry bha alʿalm.

english: Did you practice the piano this morning?
arabic: هل تدربت على عزف البيانو هذا الصباح؟
transliteration: hl tdrbt ʿlā ʿzf albyanw hdha alṣbaḥ؟

english: Do you have the time to drink something?
arabic: هل عندك الوقت لتشرب شيئا ما؟
transliteration: hl ʿndk alwqt ltshrb shyئa ma؟

english: Do you know if he's coming to the party?
arabic: هل تعرف إن كان سيحضر الحفل؟
transliteration: hl tʿrf in kan syḥḍr alḥfl؟

english: Do you know where the police station is?
Do you know who invented the microscope?
arabic: هل تعلم من هو مخترع المجهر؟
transliteration: hl tʿlm mn hw mkhtrʿ almjhr؟

english: Do you really think that Tom won't come?
arabic: هل تظن حقا أن توم لن يأتي؟
transliteration: hl tẓn ḥqa an twm ln yaty؟

english: Do you think this book is worth reading?
arabic: هل تعتقد أن هذا الكتاب يستحق القراءة؟
transliteration: hl tʿtqd an hdha alktab ystḥq alqraءh؟

english: Don't forget to put it on your schedule.
arabic: لا تنس أن تضيف ذلك لبرنامجك.
transliteration: la tns an tḍyf dhlk lbrnamjk.

english: Either you or I must attend the meeting.
arabic: يجب أن يحضر الاجتماع أحدنا، إما أنا أو أنت.
transliteration: yjb an yḥḍr alajtmaʿ aḥdna، ima ana aw ant.

english: English has many loan words from French.
arabic: استعارت اللغة الإنجليزية كلمات كثيرة من الفرنسية.
transliteration: astʿart allghh alinjlyzyh klmat kthyrh mn alfrnsyh.

english: God never forgets even a small kindness.
arabic: لا ينس الله شيئا، و لو كان عملا صالحا صغيرا.
transliteration: la yns allh shyئa، w lw kan ʿmla ṣalḥa ṣghyra.

english: Have you ever been to the United States?
arabic: هل سبق لك أن ذهبت إلى الولايات المتحدة؟
transliteration: hl sbq lk an dhhbt ilā alwlayat almtḥdh؟

english: Have you finished your homework already?
He fell in love with her at first sight.
arabic: وقع في حبها من النظرة الأولى.
transliteration: wqʿ fy ḥbha mn alnẓrh alawlā.

english: He has been warned on several occasions.
He loves writing articles for Wikipedia.
arabic: هو يحب أن يكتب مقالات على ويكيبيديا
transliteration: hw yḥb an yktb mqalat ʿlā wykybydya

english: He only paid ten dollars for that shirt.
arabic: دفع عشرة دولارات فقط لذلك القميص.
transliteration: dfʿ ʿshrh dwlarat fqṭ ldhlk alqmyṣ.

english: He seemed disappointed with the results.
He was covered with mud from head to foot.
arabic: غطاه الوحل من رأسه إلى أخمص قدميه.
transliteration: ghṭah alwḥl mn rash ilā akhmṣ qdmyh.

english: He was covered with mud from head to foot.
arabic: غطاه الوحل من رأسه حتى قدميه.
transliteration: ghṭah alwḥl mn rash ḥtā qdmyh.

english: He was hit by a car and died right away.
arabic: صدمته سيارة و مات على الفور.
transliteration: ṣdmth syarh w mat ʿlā alfwr.

english: He will hire someone who speaks English.
He's very honest, so we can rely on him.
arabic: إنهُ أمين جداً, لذلك يمكننا الإعتماد عليه.
transliteration: inhُ amyn jdaan, ldhlk ymknna aliʿtmad ʿlyh.

english: Her ambition is to become an ambassador.
Her ambition is to become an ambassador.
His wife goes with him wherever he goes.
How many people did you see in the park?
How many schools are there in your city?
How many schools are there in your city?
Humans were never meant to live forever.
arabic: لم يُقدَّر للبشر إطلاقًا أن يعيشوا إلى الأبد.
transliteration: lm yُqdَr llbshr iṭlaqana an yʿyshwa ilā alabd.

english: I am thinking of going to the mountains.
I assume the two of you know each other.
I can speak French about as well as Tom can.
I can't believe I'm sitting next to Tom.
arabic: لا أصدق أني جالس بجانب توم.
transliteration: la aṣdq any jals bjanb twm.

english: I can't remember where I parked the car.
I don't feel like eating anything today.
arabic: لا أشعر بتناول أي طعامٍ اليوم.
transliteration: la ashʿr btnawl ay ṭʿamin alywm.

english: I don't for a moment doubt your honesty.
I don't have the time to read that book.
arabic: لا أملك الوقت الكافي لقراءة هذا الكتاب
transliteration: la amlk alwqt alkafy lqraءh hdha alktab

english: I don't know if I'll have time to do it.
arabic: لا أعلم إن كنت سأملك الوقت لفعله.
transliteration: la aʿlm in knt samlk alwqt lfʿlh.

english: I don't know this neighborhood too well.
I don't think Tom would want to do that.
arabic: لا أظنّن توم يريد فعل ذلك.
transliteration: la aẓnn twm yryd fʿl dhlk.

english: I don't think that you'll be able to do that.
arabic: لا أظنك قادرا على فعل ذلك.
transliteration: la aẓnk qadra ʿlā fʿl dhlk.

english: I don't understand this question at all.
I have no words to express my gratitude.
arabic: الكلمات لا يمكنها أن تعبر عن شكري لك.
transliteration: alklmat la ymknha an tʿbr ʿn shkry lk.

english: I have no words to express my gratitude.
arabic: الكلمات لا يمكنها التعبير عن شكري بما يكفي.
transliteration: alklmat la ymknha altʿbyr ʿn shkry bma ykfy.

english: I heard my mother singing in the shower.
I liked the room overlooking the valley.
I really wasn't expecting that from you.
arabic: لم أكن أتوقع هذا منك حقا.
transliteration: lm akn atwqʿ hdha mnk ḥqa.

english: I remember hearing that music somewhere.
arabic: أتذكر أني سمعت هذه الموسيقى في مكان ما من قبل.
transliteration: atdhkr any smʿt hdhh almwsyqā fy mkan ma mn qbl.

english: I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
arabic: إني شاكر لك من أعماق قلبي.
transliteration: iny shakr lk mn aʿmaq qlby.

english: I was very careful, but I caught a cold.
arabic: كنتُ حذراً جداً، لكنني أصبتُ بنزلةِ برد.
transliteration: kntُ ḥdhraan jdaan، lknny aṣbtُ bnzlhِ brd.

english: I went to the airport to meet my father.
I went to the airport to meet my father.
I wonder where Tom is and who he's with.
arabic: أنا أتساءل أين توم ومع من.
transliteration: ana atsaءl ayn twm wmʿ mn.

english: I would like to speak to the head nurse.
I would like to speak to the head nurse.
I'm at work now, so I'll call you later.
arabic: أنا في العمل الأن, لذلك سأتصل بكَ لاحقاً.
transliteration: ana fy alʿml alan, ldhlk satṣl bkَ laḥqaan.

english: I'm at work now, so I'll call you later.
arabic: أنا في العمل الأن, لذلك سوف أتصل بكِ لاحقاً.
transliteration: ana fy alʿml alan, ldhlk swf atṣl bkِ laḥqaan.

english: I'm going to go visit my uncle tomorrow.
I'm looking forward to doing this again.
I'm looking forward to working with you.
I'm not satisfied with what you've done.
I'm not sure what Tom was talking about.
arabic: لست متأكدا حيال ما كان يتحدث توم عنه.
transliteration: lst mtakda ḥyal ma kan ytḥdth twm ʿnh.

english: I'm old enough to make my own decisions.
arabic: أنا نضج كفايةً لأتّخذ قراراتي الخاصّة.
transliteration: ana nḍj kfayhan latkhdh qraraty alkhaṣh.

english: I'm sorry I don't have my watch with me.
I'm sorry that I can't meet you tonight.
arabic: آسف لكني لا أستطيع أن أقابلك الليلة.
transliteration: āsf lkny la astṭyʿ an aqablk allylh.

english: I'm sorry, but it's no longer available.
arabic: أنا آسف، ولكن هذا لم يعد متاحاً.
transliteration: ana āsf، wlkn hdha lm yʿd mtaḥaan.

english: I'm sure I've seen him somewhere before.
arabic: متأكّد أني رأيته قبلا في مكان ما.
transliteration: mtakd any rayth qbla fy mkan ma.

english: I've worked as a waiter for three years.
If I were you, I would also do the same.
arabic: لو كنتُ مكانك, كنتُ سأفعل نفس الشئ؟
transliteration: lw kntُ mkank, kntُ safʿl nfs alshئ؟

english: If it rains tomorrow, I'll stay at home.
arabic: إذا أمطرت غداً سأبقى في المنزل.
transliteration: idha amṭrt ghdaan sabqā fy almnzl.

english: If you don't like it, then you can quit.
arabic: إن لم يعجبك فبإمكانك أن تتركه.
transliteration: in lm yʿjbk fbimkank an ttrkh.

english: It is certainly possible if you want it.
It's about a ten-minute drive from here.
arabic: تبعد مسافة عشر دقائق بالسيارة عن هنا.
transliteration: tbʿd msafh ʿshr dqaئq balsyarh ʿn hna.

english: It's been a week since Tom and Mary met.
arabic: إنه أسبوع منذ أن تقابل توم وماري
transliteration: inh asbwʿ mndh an tqabl twm wmary

english: It's too dangerous for you to stay here.
arabic: خطير جداً بالنسبة لكَ أن تكون هنا.
transliteration: khṭyr jdaan balnsbh lkَ an tkwn hna.

english: It's too dangerous for you to stay here.
arabic: خطير جداً لكِ أن تكوني هنا.
transliteration: khṭyr jdaan lkِ an tkwny hna.

english: Let us know if you aren't going to come.
arabic: أخبرنا أن كنت لا تريد أن تأتي.
transliteration: akhbrna an knt la tryd an taty.

english: Let's play baseball when the rain stops.
arabic: لنلعب كرة القاعدة حين يتوقف المطر.
transliteration: lnlʿb krh alqaʿdh ḥyn ytwqf almṭr.

english: Mastering a foreign language isn't easy.
arabic: إتقان لغة أجنبية ليس بالأمر السهل
transliteration: itqan lghh ajnbyh lys balamr alshl

english: Muslims always pray facing toward Mecca.
arabic: يصّلي المسلمون دائما و هم متوجّهون نحو الكعبة.
transliteration: yṣly almslmwn daئma w hm mtwjhwn nḥw alkʿbh.

english: No fewer than 50 passengers were killed.
arabic: قُتل ما لا يقل عن 50 راكبًا.
transliteration: qُtl ma la yql ʿn 50 rakbana.

english: Our house was robbed while we were away.
People sometimes compare death to sleep.
arabic: يقارن الناس أحيانًا بين الموت والنوم.
transliteration: yqarn alnas aḥyanana byn almwt walnwm.

english: Please correct me when I make a mistake.
arabic: من فضلك, صحِح لي, عندما أُخطيء.
transliteration: mn fḍlk, ṣḥِḥ ly, ʿndma aُkhṭyء.

english: Please don't forget to bring a sandwich.
arabic: لا تنس أن تحضر ساندويشا من فضلك.
transliteration: la tns an tḥḍr sandwysha mn fḍlk.

english: Please tell Tom I'm sorry that happened.
arabic: رجاء أخبر توم أني آسف لما حدث.
transliteration: rjaء akhbr twm any āsf lma ḥdth.

english: Please write down what I'm going to say.
Please write your name and address here.
arabic: أكتب اسمك و عنوانك هنا من فضلك.
transliteration: aktb asmk w ʿnwank hna mn fḍlk.

english: She competed against many fine athletes.
arabic: تنافست مع العديد من الرياضيين ذوي المستوى الجيد.
transliteration: tnafst mʿ alʿdyd mn alryaḍyyn dhwy almstwā aljyd.

english: She killed herself at the age of thirty.
arabic: انتحرت عن عمر ينازه الثلاثين عاماً.
transliteration: antḥrt ʿn ʿmr ynazh althlathyn ʿamaan.

english: Shouldn't you be getting ready for work?
arabic: ألا يفترض بك أن تستعد للعمل؟
transliteration: ala yftrḍ bk an tstʿd llʿml؟

english: Speech is silver, but silence is golden.
The United States annexed Texas in 1845.
arabic: ضمّت الولاياتُ المتحدةُ الأمريكيةُ تكساسَ عام 1845.
transliteration: ḍmt alwlayatُ almtḥdhُ alamrykyhُ tksasَ ʿam 1845.

english: The car broke down, so they had to walk.
The cargo ship arrived four hours early.
arabic: سفينة الشحن وصلت مبكرة باربع ساعات.
transliteration: sfynh alshḥn wṣlt mbkrh barbʿ saʿat.

english: The dip was so hot, it burned my tongue.
arabic: الصلصة كانت حارة جداً ، انها حرقت لساني.
transliteration: alṣlṣh kant ḥarh jdaan ، anha ḥrqt lsany.

english: The judge decided against the plaintiff.
The others will arrive in a few minutes.
arabic: سيصل الاخرون في غضون دقائق قليلة.
transliteration: syṣl alakhrwn fy ghḍwn dqaئq qlylh.

english: The others will arrive in a few minutes.
arabic: سيصل الاخرون في غضون دقائق معدودة.
transliteration: syṣl alakhrwn fy ghḍwn dqaئq mʿdwdh.

english: The others will arrive in a few minutes.
The police officer fired a warning shot.
The rumor spread throughout the country.
The school is three miles from my house.
arabic: المدرسة على بعد ثلاثة أميال من منزلي.
transliteration: almdrsh ʿlā bʿd thlathh amyal mn mnzly.

english: The situation is worse than we believed.
The station is to the west of the hotel.
The students learned this poem by heart.
The students learned this poem by heart.
arabic: حفظ التلاميذ هذه القصيدة عن ظهر قلب.
transliteration: ḥfẓ altlamydh hdhh alqṣydh ʿn ẓhr qlb.

english: The submarine can dive up to 300 meters.
arabic: تستطيع الغواصه ان تغوص الي 300 متر.
transliteration: tstṭyʿ alghwaṣh an tghwṣ aly 300 mtr.

english: The tourists wandered around the stores.
The wedding will take place next spring.
There are a lot of children in the park.
arabic: هنالك الكثير من الأطفال في الحديقة.
transliteration: hnalk alkthyr mn alaṭfal fy alḥdyqh.

english: There are several ways to measure speed.
There is little milk left in the bottle.
arabic: بقي القليل من الحليب في الزجاجة.
transliteration: bqy alqlyl mn alḥlyb fy alzjajh.

english: This dictionary is superior to that one.
This is where Tom usually parks his car.
arabic: هنا حيث توم يركن سيارته غالبا.
transliteration: hna ḥyth twm yrkn syarth ghalba.

english: This park is really beautiful and clean.
arabic: هذا المنتزه جميل و نظيف حقاً.
transliteration: hdha almntzh jmyl w nẓyf ḥqaan.

english: This shop has more candy than that shop.
arabic: يوجد في هذا المتجر حلوى أكثر من المتجر الآخر.
transliteration: ywjd fy hdha almtjr ḥlwā akthr mn almtjr alākhr.

english: This shop has more candy than that shop.
arabic: في هذا المتجر حلوى أكثر من ذاك.
transliteration: fy hdha almtjr ḥlwā akthr mn dhak.

english: Those present were all against the plan.
arabic: جميع من حضر عارض تلك الخطة.
transliteration: jmyʿ mn ḥḍr ʿarḍ tlk alkhṭh.

english: To make matters worse, her husband died.
arabic: ومما زاد الطين بلةً، أن زوجها توفي.
transliteration: wmma zad alṭyn blhan، an zwjha twfy.

english: To make matters worse, her husband died.
arabic: وما زاد الأمور سوءًا، أن زوجها توفي.
transliteration: wma zad alamwr swءana، an zwjha twfy.

english: Tom asked me if I knew where Mary lived.
arabic: سألني توم إن كنت أعرف أين كانت تعيش ماري.
transliteration: salny twm in knt aʿrf ayn kant tʿysh mary.

english: Tom asked me to go to a movie with Mary.
arabic: توم طلب مني أن أذهب إلى فيلم مع ماري.
transliteration: twm ṭlb mny an adhhb ilā fylm mʿ mary.

english: Tom got three presents for his birthday.
arabic: تلقى توم ثلاثة هدايا بمناسبة عيد مولده.
transliteration: tlqā twm thlathh hdaya bmnasbh ʿyd mwldh.

english: Tom is the one who paid for the tickets.
arabic: توم هو الذي دفع ثمن التذاكر.
transliteration: twm hw aldhy dfʿ thmn altdhakr.

english: Tom isn't interested in politics at all.
arabic: توم ليس مهتماً بالسياسة بعد الآن.
transliteration: twm lys mhtmaan balsyash bʿd alān.

english: Tom isn't old enough to understand this.
arabic: توم ليس كبيراً بما يكفي ليفهم هذا.
transliteration: twm lys kbyraan bma ykfy lyfhm hdha.

english: Tom knows his way around the courthouse.
Tom said he was really glad he did that.
arabic: توم قال أنه كان سعيدا لقيامه بذلك.
transliteration: twm qal anh kan sʿyda lqyamh bdhlk.

english: Tom said that's what he's always wanted.
arabic: توم قال بماذا يريد هو دائما.
transliteration: twm qal bmadha yryd hw daئma.

english: Tom was eating dinner when Mary arrived.
arabic: كان توم يأكل العشاء عندما وصلت ماري.
transliteration: kan twm yakl alʿshaء ʿndma wṣlt mary.

english: We are working in the interest of peace.
We could see the sunset from the window.
arabic: أمكننا أن نرى غروب الشمس من النافذة.
transliteration: amknna an nrā ghrwb alshms mn alnafdhh.

english: We have a dog, a cat and three canaries.
arabic: عندنا كلبٌ، وقط، وثلاثة من الكناري.
transliteration: ʿndna klbun، wqṭ، wthlathh mn alknary.

english: We're going to wait until Tom gets here.
We're no longer living in the stone age.
arabic: لم نعد نعيش في العصر الحجري.
transliteration: lm nʿd nʿysh fy alʿṣr alḥjry.

english: What is the address of the new bookshop?
What time does your watch say it is now?
arabic: ما الوقت الذي تشير إليه ساعتك الآن؟
transliteration: ma alwqt aldhy tshyr ilyh saʿtk alān؟

english: When he was young, he was a hard worker.
arabic: عندما كان شاباً، كان عاملاً مثابراً.
transliteration: ʿndma kan shabaan، kan ʿamlaan mthabraan.

english: Where is the tourist information office?
Who was the one who issued those orders?
arabic: من هو الشخص التي أعطى هذه الأوامر؟
transliteration: mn hw alshkhṣ alty aʿṭā hdhh alawamr؟

english: Why doesn't Tom pay any attention to me?
arabic: لماذا لا يُعيرني سامي أيّ انتباه؟
transliteration: lmadha la yُʿyrny samy ay antbah؟

english: Why don't you ride your bicycle to work?
You can't afford to neglect your health.
You know I'm not coming back, don't you?
arabic: أنت تعرف أنني لن أعود، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: ant tʿrf anny ln aʿwd، alys kdhlk؟

english: You must have the report done by Monday.
arabic: يجب أن تتم هذا التقرير قبل يوم الأثنين.
transliteration: yjb an ttm hdha altqryr qbl ywm alathnyn.

english: You must work hard in order not to fail.
arabic: يجب أن تعمل بجد حتى لا تفشل.
transliteration: yjb an tʿml bjd ḥtā la tfshl.

english: You should be ashamed of your ignorance.
You should give up drinking and smoking.
arabic: ينبغي أن تقلع عن الشرب والتدخين.
transliteration: ynbghy an tqlʿ ʿn alshrb waltdkhyn.

english: You will never get bored in her company.
arabic: لن تشعر أبداً بالملل في صحبتها.
transliteration: ln tshʿr abdaan balmll fy ṣḥbtha.

english: A long time ago, there was a bridge here.
arabic: منذ زمن بعيد، كان هناك جسر هنا.
transliteration: mndh zmn bʿyd، kan hnak jsr hna.

english: A number of experts attended the meeting.
arabic: حضر اللقاء عدد من أصحاب الإختصاص.
transliteration: ḥḍr allqaء ʿdd mn aṣḥab alikhtṣaṣ.

english: Above all things, we must not be selfish.
arabic: قبل كل شيء، يجب ألا نكون أنانيين.
transliteration: qbl kl shyء، yjb ala nkwn ananyyn.

english: All Tom really wanted was glass of water.
arabic: كل ما كان يريده توم حقاً كان كأساً من الماء.
transliteration: kl ma kan yrydh twm ḥqaan kan kasaan mn almaء.

english: All of these things need to be discussed.
All of these things need to be discussed.
All of these things need to be discussed.
Are you the one who organized this party?
Did you know they were coming here today?
arabic: أعلمت أنهم كانوا سيأتون اليوم إلى هنا؟
transliteration: aʿlmt anhm kanwa syatwn alywm ilā hna؟

english: Do I have to answer all of the questions?
arabic: هل علي أن أجيب علی أسئلتك كلها؟
transliteration: hl ʿly an ajyb ʿlی asئltk klha؟

english: Do I have to answer all of the questions?
arabic: هل يجب علي أن أجيب علی أسئلتك كلها؟
transliteration: hl yjb ʿly an ajyb ʿlی asئltk klha؟

english: Don't worry, I'll translate that for you.
Don't you think you should get some rest?
arabic: ألا تظنّ أنّ عليك أخذ قسطٍ من الراحة؟
transliteration: ala tẓn an ʿlyk akhdh qsṭin mn alraḥh؟

english: Everybody is immune to smallpox nowadays.
arabic: عند كل الناس مناعةٌ من الجدري اليوم.
transliteration: ʿnd kl alnas mnaʿhun mn aljdry alywm.

english: Everyone has both strong and weak points.
arabic: كل شخص لديه كلاً من نقاط الضعف والقوة.
transliteration: kl shkhṣ ldyh klaan mn nqaṭ alḍʿf walqwh.

english: Frankly speaking, I don't agree with you.
German is the best language in the world.
arabic: الألمانية هي أفضل لغة في العالم.
transliteration: alalmanyh hy afḍl lghh fy alʿalm.

english: Good morning. We have good weather today.
arabic: صباح الخير, اليوم لدينا طقسُ جميل.
transliteration: ṣbaḥ alkhyr, alywm ldyna ṭqsُ jmyl.

english: Have you ever written a computer program?
Have you finished writing the letter yet?
He arrived with a pretty girl on his arm.
arabic: إنهُ وصل مع فتاة حسناء علي ذراعهُ.
transliteration: inhُ wṣl mʿ ftah ḥsnaء ʿly dhraʿhُ.

english: He drinks a glass of water every morning.
arabic: إنه يشرب كأساً من الماء كل صباح.
transliteration: inh yshrb kasaan mn almaء kl ṣbaḥ.

english: He had no difficulty solving the problem.
arabic: لم يواجه صعوبةً تذكر في حلّ المشكلة.
transliteration: lm ywajh ṣʿwbhan tdhkr fy ḥl almshklh.

english: He is on the point of leaving for Canada.
arabic: إنه على وشك المغادرة إلى كندا.
transliteration: inh ʿlā wshk almghadrh ilā knda.

english: He likes to go to the beach now and then.
arabic: يعجبه الذهاب بالشاطئ بين الفينة والأخرى.
transliteration: yʿjbh aldhhab balshaṭئ byn alfynh walakhrā.

english: He reminded me not to forget my passport.
He went traveling in search of adventure.
His daughter and my son are good friends.
His explanation is far from satisfactory.
arabic: تفسيره بعيد كل البعد عن أن يكون مُرْضِيًا.
transliteration: tfsyrh bʿyd kl albʿd ʿn an ykwn mُrḍِyana.

english: I admitted I was the one who'd done that.
arabic: اعترفت أنني كنت من فعل ذلك.
transliteration: aʿtrft anny knt mn fʿl dhlk.

english: I always wondered what was in your attic.
arabic: تساءلت دائما عن ما يوجد في عليتك
transliteration: tsaءlt daئma ʿn ma ywjd fy ʿlytk

english: I believe he is going to be rich one day.
arabic: أعتقد أنه سيصبح غنياً يوماً ما.
transliteration: aʿtqd anh syṣbḥ ghnyaan ywmaan ma.

english: I can't think of anything to write about.
arabic: لا شيء في بالي للكتابة عنه.
transliteration: la shyء fy baly llktabh ʿnh.

english: I didn't know how to answer his question.
arabic: لم أعرف كيف أجيب على سؤاله.
transliteration: lm aʿrf kyf ajyb ʿlā sؤalh.

english: I didn't know where to go, or what to do.
arabic: لم أعلم إلى أين أذهب أو ما أفعله.
transliteration: lm aʿlm ilā ayn adhhb aw ma afʿlh.

english: I didn't want anybody to know where I was.
arabic: لم أشأ أن يعلم أحدا أين كنت.
transliteration: lm asha an yʿlm aḥda ayn knt.

english: I don't believe you. You're always lying.
arabic: أنا لا أصدقك, أنت تكذب دائماً.
transliteration: ana la aṣdqk, ant tkdhb daئmaan.

english: I don't believe you. You're always lying.
arabic: أنا لا أصدقُكِ, أنتِ دائماً تكذبين.
transliteration: ana la aṣdqُkِ, antِ daئmaan tkdhbyn.

english: I don't have time to make you a sandwich.
arabic: لا وقت لديّ لتحضير شطيرة لك.
transliteration: la wqt ldy ltḥḍyr shṭyrh lk.

english: I don't know exactly when I will be back.
I don't remember asking for your opinion.
arabic: لا أتذكر بأنني طلبت منك أن تبدي رأيك
transliteration: la atdhkr banny ṭlbt mnk an tbdy rayk

english: I don't think she takes after her mother.
arabic: أنا لا أظن أنها تشبه أمَّها
transliteration: ana la aẓn anha tshbh amَha

english: I fell asleep before my father came home.
arabic: غفوت قبل أن يأتي والدي للمنزل.
transliteration: ghfwt qbl an yaty waldy llmnzl.

english: I finished the work in less than an hour.
arabic: لقد أنهيت العمل في أقل من ساعة
transliteration: lqd anhyt alʿml fy aql mn saʿh

english: I guess I could wait a little bit longer.
arabic: أظن أنني يمكنني الانتظار أكثر قليلا.
transliteration: aẓn anny ymknny alantẓar akthr qlyla.

english: I have three cousins on my mother's side.
I have trouble talking about my feelings.
arabic: أواجه صعوبةً في التحدث عن مشاعري.
transliteration: awajh ṣʿwbhan fy altḥdth ʿn mshaʿry.

english: I just don't feel like going out tonight.
arabic: كل ما في الأمر أني لا أريد الخروج الليلة.
transliteration: kl ma fy alamr any la aryd alkhrwj allylh.

english: I just don't feel like going out tonight.
arabic: ليس لدي رغبة في الخروج الليلة فحسب.
transliteration: lys ldy rghbh fy alkhrwj allylh fḥsb.

english: I opened the door and got out of the car.
I promise that I won't forget to do that.
arabic: أعدك أنّني لن أنس القيام بذلك.
transliteration: aʿdk anny ln ans alqyam bdhlk.

english: I really like studying foreign languages.
I remember seeing her once on the street.
arabic: أتذكر أني رأيتها مرة على الطريق.
transliteration: atdhkr any raytha mrh ʿlā alṭryq.

english: I remember seeing her once on the street.
arabic: أذكر أني لمحتها مرة على الطريق.
transliteration: adhkr any lmḥtha mrh ʿlā alṭryq.

english: I saw a fox run across the road just now.
I think Tom is likely to like this movie.
arabic: اعتقد من المحتمل بان توم يفضل هذا الفلم.
transliteration: aʿtqd mn almḥtml ban twm yfḍl hdha alflm.

english: I want to answer the last question first.
arabic: أريد الإجابةَ على السؤال الأخير أولاً.
transliteration: aryd alijabhَ ʿlā alsؤal alakhyr awlaan.

english: I want to spend more time alone with you.
arabic: أريد أن أقضي وقتًا أكثر معك وحدنا.
transliteration: aryd an aqḍy wqtana akthr mʿk wḥdna.

english: I was afraid of getting lost in the dark.
arabic: كنت خائفاً من أن أضيع في الظلمة.
transliteration: knt khaئfaan mn an aḍyʿ fy alẓlmh.

english: I was fortunate to make his acquaintance.
arabic: من حسن حظي أن صرتُ صديقه.
transliteration: mn ḥsn ḥẓy an ṣrtُ ṣdyqh.

english: I wouldn't want you to be late for class.
arabic: أنا لا أريد أن تتأخر على الصف.
transliteration: ana la aryd an ttakhr ʿlā alṣf.

arabic: أنا دائما ما أنسى أسماء النّاس.
transliteration: ana daئma ma ansā asmaء alnas.

english: I've been working since six this morning.
I've decided to stay for a few more days.
I've finally finished writing the report.
Instead of going myself, I sent a letter.
arabic: بعثت برسالة بدلاً من الذهاب بنفسي.
transliteration: bʿtht brsalh bdlaan mn aldhhab bnfsy.

english: Is Tom really going to Boston by himself?
arabic: أحقّا سيذهب توم إلى بوسطن لوحده؟
transliteration: aḥqa sydhhb twm ilā bwsṭn lwḥdh؟

english: Is there anyone else you want to talk to?
arabic: هل هناك أي شخص آخر تريد التحدث إليه؟
transliteration: hl hnak ay shkhṣ ākhr tryd altḥdth ilyh؟

english: Is this a picture that you yourself drew?
arabic: هل هذه صورة أنتَ رسمتَها بنفسك؟
transliteration: hl hdhh ṣwrh antَ rsmtَha bnfsk؟

english: Is this a picture that you yourself drew?
arabic: هل هذه صورة أنتِ رسمتِها بنفسك؟
transliteration: hl hdhh ṣwrh antِ rsmtِha bnfsk؟

english: It looks like this house is a total mess.
It seems like years since Sunday morning.
arabic: وكأن أعواما مضت منذ صباح الأحد.
transliteration: wkan aʿwama mḍt mndh ṣbaḥ alaḥd.

english: It's difficult to learn a foreign language.
Legend has it that this house is haunted.
arabic: تقول الاسطورة أن هذا البيت مسكون.
transliteration: tqwl alasṭwrh an hdha albyt mskwn.

english: Let's get out of here before Tom sees us.
arabic: دعنا نخرج من هنا قبل أن يرانا توم.
transliteration: dʿna nkhrj mn hna qbl an yrana twm.

english: Let's get out of here before Tom sees us.
arabic: دعينا نخرج من هنا قبل أن يرانا توم.
transliteration: dʿyna nkhrj mn hna qbl an yrana twm.

english: Let's get out of here before Tom sees us.
arabic: دعونا نخرج من هنا قبل أن يرانا توم.
transliteration: dʿwna nkhrj mn hna qbl an yrana twm.

english: Make a sentence with each of these words.
arabic: ألف جملة لكلٍ من هذه الكلمات.
transliteration: alf jmlh lklin mn hdhh alklmat.

english: Most people write about their daily life.
arabic: معظم الناس يكتبون عن حياتهم اليومية.
transliteration: mʿẓm alnas yktbwn ʿn ḥyathm alywmyh.

english: My mother is making a cake for my father.
arabic: تقوم أمي بإعداد كعكة لأجل أبي.
transliteration: tqwm amy biʿdad kʿkh lajl aby.

english: My mother is making a cake for my father.
One is Japanese and the other is Italian.
One of the suitcases is completely empty.
Please don't talk about me when I'm gone.
arabic: من فضلك لا تتحدث عني أثناء غيابي.
transliteration: mn fḍlk la ttḥdth ʿny athnaء ghyaby.

english: Rear end collisions often cause whiplash.
arabic: غالباً ما تسبب الاصطدامات الخلفية اصابة في الرقبة .
transliteration: ghalbaan ma tsbb alaṣṭdamat alkhlfyh aṣabh fy alrqbh .

english: She despises him only because he is poor.
Soccer is the world's most popular sport.
arabic: كرة القدم هي رياضة العالم الأكثر شعبيّة.
transliteration: krh alqdm hy ryaḍh alʿalm alakthr shʿbyh.

english: That's the difference between you and me.
The TV remote control is under the couch.
The cough syrup has a licorice flavoring.
arabic: شراب السعال فيه نكهة عرق السوس.
transliteration: shrab alsʿal fyh nkhh ʿrq alsws.

english: The doctor advised me to give up smoking.
The doctor asked me to take off my shirt.
The houses caught fire one after another.
The rioters beat many policemen to death.
arabic: قام المتظاهرون بضرب العديد من رجال الشرطة حتى الموت.
transliteration: qam almtẓahrwn bḍrb alʿdyd mn rjal alshrṭh ḥtā almwt.

english: The strike affected the nation's economy.
The students learned many poems by heart.
The teacher is with the school principal.
The world is full of gossipers and liars.
There are many red flowers in the garden.
arabic: هناك الكثير من الورود الحمراء في الحديقة.
transliteration: hnak alkthyr mn alwrwd alḥmraء fy alḥdyqh.

english: There is no reason why I shouldn't do it.
There's been an accident at the worksite.
arabic: لقد حدث حادث في ورشة البناء.
transliteration: lqd ḥdth ḥadth fy wrshh albnaء.

english: They are demanding shorter working hours.
They say that Venice is a beautiful city.
This afternoon we will have an interview.
arabic: بعد ظُهر هذا اليوم سيكون لدينا مقابلة.
transliteration: bʿd ẓُhr hdha alywm sykwn ldyna mqablh.

english: This afternoon we will have an interview.
This is the worst movie I have ever seen.
arabic: هذا أسوأ فلم شاهدته في حياتي.
transliteration: hdha aswa flm shahdth fy ḥyaty.

english: This medicine will relieve your headache.
This medicine will relieve your headache.
arabic: من شأن هذا الدواء أن يخفف من شأن حدة صداع رأسك.
transliteration: mn shan hdha aldwaء an ykhff mn shan ḥdh ṣdaʿ rask.

english: This question is one of great importance.
Throw a stick and watch the dog fetch it.
Today, I was done with my homework early.
Tom became depressed after Mary left him.
arabic: أصاب الإحباط توم بعدما تركته ماري.
transliteration: aṣab aliḥbaṭ twm bʿdma trkth mary.

english: Tom converted his bedroom into an office.
arabic: حوّل توم غرفة نومه إلى مكتب.
transliteration: ḥwl twm ghrfh nwmh ilā mktb.

english: Tom doesn't want to go to school anymore.
arabic: لا يريد توم الذهاب الي المدرسه بعد الان
transliteration: la yryd twm aldhhab aly almdrsh bʿd alan

english: Tom has decided to start studying French.
arabic: قرر "توم" أن يبدأ بتعلم اللغة الفرنسية
transliteration: qrr "twm" an ybda btʿlm allghh alfrnsyh

english: Tom is drinking directly from the faucet.
Tom is the manager of a small restaurant.
Tom isn't qualified to teach high school.
arabic: توم ليس مؤهلاً لتدريس المدرسة الثانوية.
transliteration: twm lys mؤhlaan ltdrys almdrsh althanwyh.

english: Tom isn't sure whether he's ready or not.
arabic: توم غير متأكد من أنه جاهز أم لا.
transliteration: twm ghyr mtakd mn anh jahz am la.

english: Tom isn't yet able to write his own name.
arabic: ليس بمقدور توم كتابة اسمه بعد.
transliteration: lys bmqdwr twm ktabh asmh bʿd.

english: Tom looked around, but didn't see anyone.
arabic: تلفت توم حوله، لكنه لم يرى أحدًا.
transliteration: tlft twm ḥwlh، lknh lm yrā aḥdana.

english: Tom lost three million dollars last year.
arabic: خسر توم ثلاثة ملايين دولار السنة الماضية.
transliteration: khsr twm thlathh mlayyn dwlar alsnh almaḍyh.

english: Tom said he wanted something else to eat.
arabic: قال توم بأنه يريد شيئا آخر يأكله.
transliteration: qal twm banh yryd shyئa ākhr yaklh.

english: Tom spent the entire afternoon with Mary.
arabic: توم أمضى فترة بعد الظهر بأكملها مع ماري.
transliteration: twm amḍā ftrh bʿd alẓhr bakmlha mʿ mary.

english: Tom thinks Mary should apologize to John.
arabic: يظن توم أن على ماري الاعتذار من جون.
transliteration: yẓn twm an ʿlā mary alaʿtdhar mn jwn.

english: Tom wanted to go wherever Mary was going.
arabic: توم أراد أن يذهب أينما كانت ماري تذهب .
transliteration: twm arad an ydhhb aynma kant mary tdhhb .

english: We don't know where we'll live next year.
arabic: نحن لا نعرف اين سنعيش في العام المقبل
transliteration: nḥn la nʿrf ayn snʿysh fy alʿam almqbl

english: We haven't received any help from anyone.
We need to do the important things first.
arabic: نحن بحاجة الى القيام بالاشياء المهمة اولا
transliteration: nḥn bḥajh alā alqyam balashyaء almhmh awla

english: We put up the flags on national holidays.
What kind of woman could love such a man?
arabic: أي نوع من النساء يمكن أن يحب مثل هذا الرجل؟
transliteration: ay nwʿ mn alnsaء ymkn an yḥb mthl hdha alrjl؟

english: Which came first, the chicken or the egg?
arabic: أيهما جاء أولاً، الدجاجة أم البيضة؟
transliteration: ayhma jaء awlaan، aldjajh am albyḍh؟

english: Why didn't you tell me Tom would be here?
arabic: لِمَ لَمْ تُخبِرني أنَّ توم سَيَكونُ هُنا؟
transliteration: lِmَ lَm tُkhbِrny anَ twm sَyَkwnُ hُna؟

english: Why he killed himself is still a mystery.
Why he killed himself is still a mystery.
Would you please pour me a cup of coffee?
arabic: هل لك أن تصبّ لي كأساً من القهوة من فضلك؟
transliteration: hl lk an tṣb ly kasaan mn alqhwh mn fḍlk؟

english: Would you please tell me your name again?
arabic: من فضلك، هلّا أخبرتني اسمك ثانيةً؟
transliteration: mn fḍlk، hla akhbrtny asmk thanyhan؟

english: A widow is a woman whose husband has died.
After a while, the man came into the room.
arabic: بعد لحظة، دخل الرجل الى الغرفة.
transliteration: bʿd lḥẓh، dkhl alrjl alā alghrfh.

english: All of these letters are addressed to you.
Are you saying that you didn't write this?
arabic: هل تقصد أنك لم تكتب هذا؟
transliteration: hl tqṣd ank lm tktb hdha؟

english: Australia is one of my favorite countries.
arabic: أستراليا هي إحدى الدول المفضلة لدي
transliteration: astralya hy iḥdā aldwl almfḍlh ldy

english: Both of my parents don't know how to swim.
arabic: كلا والداي لا يعرفان كيف يسبحان
transliteration: kla walday la yʿrfan kyf ysbḥan

english: Could you tell me how to get to the station?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تخبرني كيف أصل إلى المحطة؟
transliteration: hl ymknk an tkhbrny kyf aṣl ilā almḥṭh؟

english: Cancer can be cured if discovered in time.
arabic: من الممكن علاج السرطان إذا اكتشف قبل فوات الأوان.
transliteration: mn almmkn ʿlaj alsrṭan idha aktshf qbl fwat alawan.

english: Could you get me a glass of water, please?
arabic: هلا جلبت لي كأسا من الماء من فضلك؟
transliteration: hla jlbt ly kasa mn almaء mn fḍlk؟

english: Could you please tell me why you love her?
arabic: أيمكنك إخباري عن سبب حبك لها؟
transliteration: aymknk ikhbary ʿn sbb ḥbk lha؟

english: Could you please tell me why you love her?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تقول لي لماذا تحبها؟
transliteration: hl ymknk an tqwl ly lmadha tḥbha؟

english: Did you give a copy of the disk to anyone?
arabic: هل أعطيت نسخة من القرص لأي شخص؟
transliteration: hl aʿṭyt nskhh mn alqrṣ lay shkhṣ؟

english: Did you remember to close all the windows?
Do you believe in the existence of ghosts?
Do you really think Tom is doing that now?
arabic: هل تعتقد ان توم يفعل هذا الأن؟
transliteration: hl tʿtqd an twm yfʿl hdha alan؟

english: Do you really want to talk about that now?
arabic: هل أنتِ تريد حقاً التحدث بشأن هذا الأن؟
transliteration: hl antِ tryd ḥqaan altḥdth bshan hdha alan؟

english: Do you really want to talk about that now?
arabic: هل أنتِ حقاً تريدين التحدث عن هذا الأن؟
transliteration: hl antِ ḥqaan trydyn altḥdth ʿn hdha alan؟

english: Do you remember the day when we first met?
arabic: هل تذكر اليوم الذي تقابلنا فيه أول مرة؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr alywm aldhy tqablna fyh awl mrh؟

english: Don't give up yet. I'm sure you can do it.
arabic: لا تستسلم، أنا متأكد/متأكدة أنك تستطيع/تستطيعين فعل ذلك.
transliteration: la tstslm، ana mtakd/mtakdh ank tstṭyʿ/tstṭyʿyn fʿl dhlk.

english: Don't worry. He doesn't understand German.
arabic: لا تقلق. إنهُ لا يفهم الألمانية.
transliteration: la tqlq. inhُ la yfhm alalmanyh.

english: Everyone wants to meet you. You're famous!
arabic: الكل يريد أن يتعرف عليك. إنك مشهور!
transliteration: alkl yryd an ytʿrf ʿlyk. ink mshhwr!

english: He continued his work after a short break.
He made me so angry that I got a headache.
arabic: أغضبني كثيرًا لدرجة أنني أُصبت بالصداع.
transliteration: aghḍbny kthyrana ldrjh anny aُṣbt balṣdaʿ.

english: He promised me that he would come at four.
arabic: لقد وعدني أنه سيأتي على الساعة الرابعة.
transliteration: lqd wʿdny anh syaty ʿlā alsaʿh alrabʿh.

english: He was accused of stealing dinosaur bones.
He works hard to support his large family.
He's very honest, so we can depend on him.
arabic: إنهُ صادق جداً, لذا يمكننا أن نعتمد عليه.
transliteration: inhُ ṣadq jdaan, ldha ymknna an nʿtmd ʿlyh.

english: Her daughter has become a beautiful woman.
Her father left her the house in his will.
arabic: ترك أبوها البيت لها في وصيته.
transliteration: trk abwha albyt lha fy wṣyth.

english: I advise you not to keep company with Tom.
I always get nervous before I go on stage.
arabic: أتوتر دائما قبل أن أخرج إلى المسرح.
transliteration: atwtr daئma qbl an akhrj ilā almsrḥ.

english: I bought every book on Japan I could find.
arabic: اِشتريت كل كتاب وجدتّه عن اليابان.
transliteration: aِshtryt kl ktab wjdth ʿn alyaban.

english: I cannot give you a definite answer today.
arabic: لا يمكنني إعطائك جواباً نهائياً اليوم.
transliteration: la ymknny iʿṭaئk jwabaan nhaئyaan alywm.

english: I cannot give you a definite answer today.
arabic: ليس بإمكاني إعطائك جواباً قاطعاً اليوم.
transliteration: lys bimkany iʿṭaئk jwabaan qaṭʿaan alywm.

english: I didn't expect so many people to be here.
arabic: لم أتوقع أن يكون هناك هذا الحشد من الناس.
transliteration: lm atwqʿ an ykwn hnak hdha alḥshd mn alnas.

english: I don't know whether Tom is hungry or not.
arabic: لا أعلم إذا كان توم جائعاً أم لا
transliteration: la aʿlm idha kan twm jaئʿaan am la

english: I don't love anybody more than I love you.
arabic: لا أحب أحد بقدر ما أحبك
transliteration: la aḥb aḥd bqdr ma aḥbk

english: I don't think it will rain this afternoon.
arabic: لا أظن أنها ستمطر بعد الظهر.
transliteration: la aẓn anha stmṭr bʿd alẓhr.

english: I don't want to talk about this right now.
arabic: لا أريد أن أتحدث بشأن هذا الآن.
transliteration: la aryd an atḥdth bshan hdha alān.

english: I exercise because I want to stay healthy.
arabic: أقوم بالتمارين الرياضية لأحافظ على صحتي.
transliteration: aqwm baltmaryn alryaḍyh laḥafẓ ʿlā ṣḥty.

english: I give my pledge that I will quit smoking.
I haven't been completely honest with you.
I just can't work out what makes Tom tick.
arabic: انا فقط لا استطيع عمل الشيء الذي يحفز توم .
transliteration: ana fqṭ la astṭyʿ ʿml alshyء aldhy yḥfz twm .

english: I just got my textbooks for this semester.
arabic: الآن حصلت على كتب هذا الفصل.
transliteration: alān ḥṣlt ʿlā ktb hdha alfṣl.

english: I know Tom was going to do that yesterday.
arabic: أعلم أن توم كان سيفعل ذلك بالأمس.
transliteration: aʿlm an twm kan syfʿl dhlk balams.

english: I may be old, but I can still ride a bike.
arabic: لربّما كنت كبير السن ولكنني لا زلت أستطيع ركوب الدراجة.
transliteration: lrbma knt kbyr alsn wlknny la zlt astṭyʿ rkwb aldrajh.

english: I think that you're doing the right thing.
I was about to go out when the phone rang.
arabic: كنت على وشك الذهاب عندما رَنّ الهاتف.
transliteration: knt ʿlā wshk aldhhab ʿndma rَn alhatf.

english: I was going to write to you, but I forgot.
I was hoping Tom could lend me some money.
arabic: كُنتُ آملُ أنْ يُقرِضني توم بَعضَ النُّقودِ
transliteration: kُntُ āmlُ an yُqrِḍny twm bَʿḍَ alnُqwdِ

english: I went to many shops to look for the book.
arabic: ذهبت إلى العديد من المتاجر للبحث عن الكتاب.
transliteration: dhhbt ilā alʿdyd mn almtajr llbḥth ʿn alktab.

english: I wish I could forget about that incident.
arabic: ليتني كنت قادرا على نسيان تلك الحادثة.
transliteration: lytny knt qadra ʿlā nsyan tlk alḥadthh.

english: I'll never forget how helpful you've been.
I'm busy now. Let's talk about this later.
arabic: أنا مشغول الآن. يمكننا الحديث عن هذا الموضوع لاحقًا.
transliteration: ana mshghwl alān. ymknna alḥdyth ʿn hdha almwḍwʿ laḥqana.

english: I've just finished watching episode three.
arabic: انتهيت لتوّي من مشاهدة الحلقة الثالثة.
transliteration: anthyt ltwy mn mshahdh alḥlqh althalthh.

english: If you do it, I might be able to help you.
arabic: إذا فعلت ذلك, قد أكون قادر على مساعدتك.
transliteration: idha fʿlt dhlk, qd akwn qadr ʿlā msaʿdtk.

english: If you don't hurry, you'll miss the train.
If you need an umbrella I'll lend you one.
arabic: إن كنت تحتاج مظلةً، فسأعيرك واحدةً.
transliteration: in knt tḥtaj mẓlhan، fsaʿyrk waḥdhan.

english: If you want to succeed in life, work hard.
arabic: إن أردت النجاح في حياتك فاعمل بجد.
transliteration: in ardt alnjaḥ fy ḥyatk faʿml bjd.

english: It is no use trying to solve this problem.
arabic: لا فائدة من محاولة حل هذه المسألة.
transliteration: la faئdh mn mḥawlh ḥl hdhh almsalh.

english: It sounds like they're not going to leave.
It was unclear who carried out the attack.
arabic: لم يكن واضحا من الذين نفذوا الهجوم
transliteration: lm ykn waḍḥa mn aldhyn nfdhwa alhjwm

english: It wasn't the first time they had done it.
arabic: إنها لم تكن أول مرة يفعلوها.
transliteration: inha lm tkn awl mrh yfʿlwha.

english: It's better for you to stay away from Tom.
arabic: من الأفضل لك أن تبقى بعيداً عن توم.
transliteration: mn alafḍl lk an tbqā bʿydaan ʿn twm.

english: Japanese tourists abroad are big spenders.
arabic: السياح اليابانيون في الخارج هم اكبر منفقي النقود .
transliteration: alsyaḥ alyabanywn fy alkharj hm akbr mnfqy alnqwd .

english: Japanese tourists can be found everywhere.
arabic: يمكن ايجاد السياح اليابانيين في كل مكان .
transliteration: ymkn ayjad alsyaḥ alyabanyyn fy kl mkan .

english: Law and politics are two different things.
Maybe I shouldn't invite Tom to the party.
arabic: ربما علي أن لا أدعوا توم إلى الحفلة.
transliteration: rbma ʿly an la adʿwa twm ilā alḥflh.

english: My alarm clock didn't go off this morning.
arabic: لم ترن ساعتي المنبهة هذا الصباح.
transliteration: lm trn saʿty almnbhh hdha alṣbaḥ.

english: My aunt showed me how to make good coffee.
arabic: علمتني عمتي كيف أحضّر قهوةً لذيذة.
transliteration: ʿlmtny ʿmty kyf aḥḍr qhwhan ldhydhh.

english: My father contracted pneumonia last month.
arabic: أصيب أبي بذات الرئة الشهر الماضي.
transliteration: aṣyb aby bdhat alrئh alshhr almaḍy.

english: My favorite music instrument is the flute.
Our family has lived here for generations.
Our teacher will go to the USA next month.
arabic: سيذهب أستاذنا إلى الولايات المتحدة الشهر القادم.
transliteration: sydhhb astadhna ilā alwlayat almtḥdh alshhr alqadm.

english: Our teacher will go to the USA next month.
arabic: سيسافر معلمنا إلى أمريكا الشهر المقبل.
transliteration: sysafr mʿlmna ilā amryka alshhr almqbl.

english: She advised him not to use too much sugar.
arabic: نصحته ألا يضع الكثير من السكر.
transliteration: nṣḥth ala yḍʿ alkthyr mn alskr.

english: She advised him not to use too much sugar.
She didn't even try to do the right thing.
arabic: لم تحاول حتى ان تفعل الشيء الصحيح
transliteration: lm tḥawl ḥtā an tfʿl alshyء alṣḥyḥ

english: She likes music better than anything else.
arabic: تحب الموسيقى أكثر من أي شيء آخر.
transliteration: tḥb almwsyqā akthr mn ay shyء ākhr.

english: She looked as if she hadn't eaten in days.
arabic: بدت و كأنها لم تأكل منذ أيام.
transliteration: bdt w kanha lm takl mndh ayam.

english: She may have left her umbrella on the bus.
She resembles her mother in every respect.
She smiled and accepted my little present.
She was advised by him to give up smoking.
arabic: تم نصحهها من قبله للتخلي عن التدخين.
transliteration: tm nṣḥhha mn qblh lltkhly ʿn altdkhyn.

english: Shouldn't you be getting ready for school?
arabic: ألا يفترضُ بك أن تستعد للمدرسة؟
transliteration: ala yftrḍُ bk an tstʿd llmdrsh؟

english: Since you're here, we might as well begin.
Some of my friends can speak English well.
arabic: بعض أصدقائي يمكنهم تحدث الإنجليزية جيداً.
transliteration: bʿḍ aṣdqaئy ymknhm tḥdth alinjlyzyh jydaan.

english: Switch on the light. I can't see anything.
arabic: أشعل الضوء. لا يمكنني أن أرى شيئاً.
transliteration: ashʿl alḍwء. la ymknny an arā shyئaan.

english: That feast was one of the best I ever had.
arabic: كانت الوليمة من أطيب ما ذقت.
transliteration: kant alwlymh mn aṭyb ma dhqt.

english: That's the stupidest thing I've ever said.
arabic: هذا أغبى ما قُلتُه على الإطلاق.
transliteration: hdha aghbā ma qُltُh ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: That's the ugliest snowman I've ever seen.
arabic: هذا أبشع رجل ثلجي رأيته أبدا.
transliteration: hdha abshʿ rjl thljy rayth abda.

english: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
arabic: أردت الحديث معك عن هذا الأمر.
transliteration: ardt alḥdyth mʿk ʿn hdha alamr.

english: The girl released the birds from the cage.
The girl screamed when she saw the flames.
arabic: صرخت الفتاة حين رأت ألسنة اللهب.
transliteration: ṣrkht alftah ḥyn rat alsnh allhb.

english: The opening address alone lasted one hour.
The town is always crawling with tourists.
They've decided to get married next month.
This is the very CD I've been looking for.
arabic: هذه هي الأسطوانة نفسها التي كنت أبحث عنها.
transliteration: hdhh hy alasṭwanh nfsha alty knt abḥth ʿnha.

english: Tom and Mary don't live in the same state.
arabic: توم وماري لا يعيشون فى نفس الولاية.
transliteration: twm wmary la yʿyshwn fā nfs alwlayh.

english: Tom and Mary live in a house by the river.
arabic: يعيش توم وماري في بيت بمحاذاة نهر
transliteration: yʿysh twm wmary fy byt bmḥadhah nhr

english: Tom and Mary watched a nature documentary.
arabic: شاهد سامي وليلى وثائقيًا عن الطبيعة.
transliteration: shahd samy wlylā wthaئqyana ʿn alṭbyʿh.

english: Tom doesn't seem to know a lot about Mary.
arabic: لا يبدو بأن توم يعرف الكثير عن ماري.
transliteration: la ybdw ban twm yʿrf alkthyr ʿn mary.

english: Tom hasn't written to Mary in a long time.
arabic: لم يراسل توم ماري منذ زمن بعيد.
transliteration: lm yrasl twm mary mndh zmn bʿyd.

english: Tom hopes you're able to attend his party.
arabic: يأمل توم بأن تكون قادراً على حضور حفلته
transliteration: yaml twm ban tkwn qadraan ʿlā ḥḍwr ḥflth

english: Tom is able to speak three languages well.
arabic: توم يستطيع ان يتحدث ثلاث لغات جيدا
transliteration: twm ystṭyʿ an ytḥdth thlath lghat jyda

english: Tom is extremely handsome and he knows it.
arabic: توم فائق الجمال وهو يعلم ذلك.
transliteration: twm faئq aljmal whw yʿlm dhlk.

english: Tom is going to boarding school next year.
arabic: سيذهب توم إلى مدرسة داخلية في العام القادم.
transliteration: sydhhb twm ilā mdrsh dakhlyh fy alʿam alqadm.

english: Tom is going to pay for what he did to us.
Tom is going to pay for what he did to us.
arabic: سيدفع توم ثمن ما فعله بنا.
transliteration: sydfʿ twm thmn ma fʿlh bna.

english: Tom is planning to study abroad next year.
arabic: يخطط توم للدراسة بالخارج السنة القادمة.
transliteration: ykhṭṭ twm lldrash balkharj alsnh alqadmh.

english: Tom isn't strict enough with his students.
arabic: توم ليس صارماً بما فيهِ الكفاية مع طلابه.
transliteration: twm lys ṣarmaan bma fyhِ alkfayh mʿ ṭlabh.

english: Tom just loves pineapple upside-down cake.
arabic: يحب توم كعكة الأناناس المقلوبة كثيرا.
transliteration: yḥb twm kʿkh alananas almqlwbh kthyra.

english: Tom likes to do almost everything by himself.
arabic: غالبًا يُفضل توم عمل الأشياء بنفسه
transliteration: ghalbana yُfḍl twm ʿml alashyaء bnfsh

english: Tom looks like a typical American tourist.
arabic: توم يبدو وكأنه سائح امريكي نموذجي .
transliteration: twm ybdw wkanh saئḥ amryky nmwdhjy .

english: Tom said Mary wasn't reluctant to do that.
arabic: قال توم: ماري لم تكن متردده في فعل ذلك.
transliteration: qal twm: mary lm tkn mtrddh fy fʿl dhlk.

english: Tom said that he needs to call the police.
arabic: قال توم أنه يحتاج إلى أن يتصل بالشرطة.
transliteration: qal twm anh yḥtaj ilā an ytṣl balshrṭh.

english: Tom told me that I shouldn't ever do that.
arabic: أخبرني توم بألّا أفعل ذلك أبدًا.
transliteration: akhbrny twm bala afʿl dhlk abdana.

english: Tom used to work for a big firm in Boston.
arabic: كان توم يعمل لمؤسسة كبيرة في بوسطن.
transliteration: kan twm yʿml lmؤssh kbyrh fy bwsṭn.

english: Tom was hit by a truck and died instantly.
arabic: توم صدمته شاحنة ومات في الحال
transliteration: twm ṣdmth shaḥnh wmat fy alḥal

english: Tom would like to speak to you in private.
Tom's horse reared suddenly and threw him.
arabic: شبَ حصان توم فجأة و القاه ارضاً.
transliteration: shbَ ḥṣan twm fjah w alqah arḍaan.

english: What time will the flight arrive in Tokyo?
Which color do you like more, blue or red?
arabic: أي لون تفضل؟ الأزرق أم الأحمر؟
transliteration: ay lwn tfḍl؟ alazrq am alaḥmr؟

english: Which color do you like more, blue or red?
arabic: أي لون تحب أكثر؟ الأزرق أم الأحمر؟
transliteration: ay lwn tḥb akthr؟ alazrq am alaḥmr؟

english: Who knows what might happen in the future?
arabic: من يعلم ما قد يحصل مستقبلًا؟
transliteration: mn yʿlm ma qd yḥṣl mstqblana؟

english: Why don't you just start at the beginning?
Why is he angry about something like that?
arabic: لماذا هو غاضب بسبب شيء مثل ذلك؟
transliteration: lmadha hw ghaḍb bsbb shyء mthl dhlk؟

english: Why is he angry about something like that?
arabic: لمَ هو غاضب على شيء مثل هذا؟
transliteration: lmَ hw ghaḍb ʿlā shyء mthl hdha؟

english: Will you help me with my English homework?
arabic: هلّا ساعدتني في واجب اللغة الإنجليزية؟
transliteration: hla saʿdtny fy wajb allghh alinjlyzyh؟

english: Will you make a list of issues to discuss?
arabic: أيمكنك عمل قائمة بالمسائل التي ستناقش؟
transliteration: aymknk ʿml qaئmh balmsaئl alty stnaqsh؟

english: You don't know what you are doing, do you?
arabic: لا تدري ماذا تفعل، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: la tdry madha tfʿl، alys kdhlk؟

english: You must consider this problem as a whole.
arabic: يجب عليك أن تنظر في هذه المشكلة بشكلٍ كلي.
transliteration: yjb ʿlyk an tnẓr fy hdhh almshklh bshklin kly.

english: You run into Japanese tourists everywhere.
arabic: انت تواجه السياح اليابانيين في كل مكان .
transliteration: ant twajh alsyaḥ alyabanyyn fy kl mkan .

english: You should really tell Tom not to do that.
arabic: يجب عليك حقًّا أن تخبر توم ألا يفعل ذلك.
transliteration: yjb ʿlyk ḥqana an tkhbr twm ala yfʿl dhlk.

english: You were talking in your sleep last night.
You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.
arabic: ستتعلم كيف تفعلها عاجلًا أو آجلًا.
transliteration: sttʿlm kyf tfʿlha ʿajlana aw ājlana.

english: All Tom really needed was to be left alone.
arabic: كل ما كان توم يحتاجه كان أن يُترك وحيداً.
transliteration: kl ma kan twm yḥtajh kan an yُtrk wḥydaan.

english: All Tom really wanted was something to eat.
arabic: كل ما كان يحتاجه توم حقاً كان شيئاً ما ليأكله.
transliteration: kl ma kan yḥtajh twm ḥqaan kan shyئaan ma lyaklh.

english: All you have to do is read these two pages.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله هو قراءة هاتين الصفحتين.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh hw qraءh hatyn alṣfḥtyn.

english: Could you please repeat what you just said?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تكرر ما قلته للتو؟
transliteration: hl ymknk an tkrr ma qlth lltw؟

english: Did you find the book you were looking for?
arabic: أوجدت الكتاب الذي كنت تبحث عنه؟
transliteration: awjdt alktab aldhy knt tbḥth ʿnh؟

english: Did you forget to lock the door last night?
arabic: هل نسيت إقفال الباب اللّيلة الماضية؟
transliteration: hl nsyt iqfal albab allylh almaḍyh؟

english: Didn't it occur to you to shut the windows?
arabic: ألم يخطر لك أن تغلق النوافذ؟
transliteration: alm ykhṭr lk an tghlq alnwafdh؟

english: Do you have anything to say regarding this?
arabic: هل لديك ما تقوله بخصوص هذا الأمر؟
transliteration: hl ldyk ma tqwlh bkhṣwṣ hdha alamr؟

english: Do you have anything to say regarding this?
arabic: أعندك أي شيء تريد قوله بخصوص هذا الموضوع؟
transliteration: aʿndk ay shyء tryd qwlh bkhṣwṣ hdha almwḍwʿ؟

english: Do you have one a little bigger than these?
arabic: هل عندك واحد أكبر قليلًا من هذه؟
transliteration: hl ʿndk waḥd akbr qlylana mn hdhh؟

english: Do you know which one of those guys is Tom?
arabic: أتعرف مَن يكون توم من بين هؤلاء؟
transliteration: atʿrf mَn ykwn twm mn byn hؤlaء؟

english: Do you remember the town where he was born?
arabic: هل تذكر المدينة الذي ولد بها؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr almdynh aldhy wld bha؟

english: Don't forget to put a stamp on your letter.
arabic: لا تنسَ أن تضع طابعاً على رسالتك.
transliteration: la tnsَ an tḍʿ ṭabʿaan ʿlā rsaltk.

english: Don't worry about the results of your test.
Don't worry about the results of your test.
Every word in this dictionary is important.
arabic: كل كلمة في هذا القاموس مهمة.
transliteration: kl klmh fy hdha alqamws mhmh.

english: Everybody knows that two and two make four.
arabic: يعلم الجميع أن اثنين زائد اثنين تساوي أربعة.
transliteration: yʿlm aljmyʿ an athnyn zaئd athnyn tsawy arbʿh.

english: Falling rocks present a danger to climbers.
arabic: الصخور الواقعة تشكل خطرا على المتسلقين.
transliteration: alṣkhwr alwaqʿh tshkl khṭra ʿlā almtslqyn.

english: Guns don't kill people. People kill people.
arabic: الأسلحة النارية ليست من يقتل البشر. البشر هم من يقتل البشر.
transliteration: alaslḥh alnaryh lyst mn yqtl albshr. albshr hm mn yqtl albshr.

english: He is concerned about his father's illness.
He is one of the greatest artists in Japan.
He was known to the English as King Philip.
He was so mad that he forgot to eat dinner.
arabic: كان غاضباً لدرجة أنّه نسي أن يتناول طعام العشاء.
transliteration: kan ghaḍbaan ldrjh anh nsy an ytnawl ṭʿam alʿshaء.

english: I am going to play tennis in the afternoon.
I am hoping to get two copies of this book.
arabic: آمل أن أحصل على نسختين من هذا الكتاب.
transliteration: āml an aḥṣl ʿlā nskhtyn mn hdha alktab.

english: I called you in here to ask you a question.
arabic: لقد دعوتك إلی هنا لأسألك سؤالا
transliteration: lqd dʿwtk ilی hna lasalk sؤala

english: I don't like to cook when it's hot outside.
arabic: لا أحب أن أطبخ عندما يكون الجو حارّاً.
transliteration: la aḥb an aṭbkh ʿndma ykwn aljw ḥaraan.

english: I don't want to hear another word about it!
arabic: لا أُريد أن أسمع كلمة أُخرىَ عن هذا!
transliteration: la aُryd an asmʿ klmh aُkhrāَ ʿn hdha!

english: I first used a computer about 40 years ago.
arabic: أول استخدام لي للحاسوب كان منذ 40 سنة خلت.
transliteration: awl astkhdam ly llḥaswb kan mndh 40 snh khlt.

english: I had no choice but to stay in bed all day.
arabic: لم يكن لدي خيار سوی الاستلقاء علی السرير طوال اليوم.
transliteration: lm ykn ldy khyar swی alastlqaء ʿlی alsryr ṭwal alywm.

english: I have something that I want to say to you.
I have to take my medicine every six hours.
arabic: يجب أن اخذ الدواء كل ست ساعات
transliteration: yjb an akhdh aldwaء kl st saʿat

english: I like animals, for example, cats and dogs.
arabic: أنا أُحب الحيوانات, على سبيل المثال, القِطط والكلاب.
transliteration: ana aُḥb alḥywanat, ʿlā sbyl almthal, alqِṭṭ walklab.

english: I love him more than any of the other boys.
I think something may have happened to Tom.
arabic: أظن أن شيئا ما ربما حدث لتوم.
transliteration: aẓn an shyئa ma rbma ḥdth ltwm.

english: I think this table takes up too much space.
arabic: أعتقد أن هذه الطاولة تأخذ مساحة كبيرة.
transliteration: aʿtqd an hdhh alṭawlh takhdh msaḥh kbyrh.

english: I want to thank everyone for their support.
I was only thirteen years old at that time.
arabic: كنت أبلغ الثلاثين عاما فقط آنذاك.
transliteration: knt ablgh althlathyn ʿama fqṭ āndhak.

english: I will wait for you in front of the school.
I won't play because I've twisted my ankle.
I'd be unhappy, but I wouldn't kill myself.
arabic: لن أكون سعيدًا، لكن لن أقتل نفسي.
transliteration: ln akwn sʿydana، lkn ln aqtl nfsy.

english: I'd like to introduce some friends of mine.
I'll never forget the first time I saw you.
arabic: لن أنس أبدا المرّة الأولى التي رأيتك فيها.
transliteration: ln ans abda almrh alawlā alty raytk fyha.

english: I'm afraid Tom doesn't want to talk to you.
arabic: أخشى أن توم لا يريد التحدث معك.
transliteration: akhshā an twm la yryd altḥdth mʿk.

english: I'm getting off the train at the next stop.
arabic: سأنزل من القطار عند المحطة القادمة.
transliteration: sanzl mn alqṭar ʿnd almḥṭh alqadmh.

english: I'm going to stay just a little bit longer.
I'm going to take you where you'll be safe.
I'm going to take you where you'll be safe.
arabic: سآخذك إلى مكان ستكون فيه في أمان.
transliteration: sākhdhk ilā mkan stkwn fyh fy aman.

english: I'm not even sure I want to see that movie.
arabic: أنا حتى لستُ متأكداً ما إذا كُنتُ أريد أن أرى هذا الفيلم.
transliteration: ana ḥtā lstُ mtakdaan ma idha kُntُ aryd an arā hdha alfylm.

english: I've been looking forward to this all week.
If possible, I'd like to receive an answer.
arabic: إذا ممكن, أود أن أستلم جواب.
transliteration: idha mmkn, awd an astlm jwab.

english: If you want to dance, let's dance together.
arabic: إذا اردت أن ترقُص, هيا نرقص معاً.
transliteration: idha ardt an trqُṣ, hya nrqṣ mʿaan.

english: If you want, I can show you how to do that.
arabic: إذا أردت, يمكنني أن أُريك كيف تفعل ذلك.
transliteration: idha ardt, ymknny an aُryk kyf tfʿl dhlk.

english: If you were in my place, what would you do?
arabic: ماذا كنتَ ستفعَل لو كنت في مكاني؟
transliteration: madha kntَ stfʿَl lw knt fy mkany؟

english: If you were in my place, what would you do?
arabic: ماذا كنتِ ستفعَلينَ لو كنتِ في مكاني؟
transliteration: madha kntِ stfʿَlynَ lw kntِ fy mkany؟

english: In Japan a new school year starts in April.
arabic: في اليابان السنة الدراسية الجديدة تبدأ في أبريل.
transliteration: fy alyaban alsnh aldrasyh aljdydh tbda fy abryl.

english: Is it true that you weren't here yesterday?
arabic: هل صحيح أنك لم تكن هنا البارحة؟
transliteration: hl ṣḥyḥ ank lm tkn hna albarḥh؟

english: Is the cat on the chair or under the chair?
arabic: هل القطة فوق الكرسي أم أسفله ؟
transliteration: hl alqṭh fwq alkrsy am asflh ؟

english: Is the cat on the chair or under the chair?
arabic: هل القطة فوق الكرسي أم تحته؟
transliteration: hl alqṭh fwq alkrsy am tḥth؟

english: Is there anyone who might want to hurt Tom?
arabic: هل يوجد اي شخص ربما يريد أن يؤذي توم؟
transliteration: hl ywjd ay shkhṣ rbma yryd an yؤdhy twm؟

english: Is there anything else you want to tell me?
arabic: هل يوجد أي شيء أخر تريد أن تُخبرني به؟
transliteration: hl ywjd ay shyء akhr tryd an tُkhbrny bh؟

english: Is there anything that you want to tell me?
It appears to me that you are all mistaken.
It appears to me that you are all mistaken.
It is believed that he was a brave soldier.
It is clear that he has made a big mistake.
arabic: من الواضحِ أنه أرتكب خطأ كبيراً.
transliteration: mn alwaḍḥِ anh artkb khṭa kbyraan.

english: It was stupid of me to make such a mistake.
arabic: كان من الغباء مني أن أقترف خطأً كهذا.
transliteration: kan mn alghbaء mny an aqtrf khṭaan khdha.

english: It's best we don't say anything about that.
arabic: من الأفضل أن لا نقول أي شيء حيال هذا.
transliteration: mn alafḍl an la nqwl ay shyء ḥyal hdha.

english: It's crowded, so let's take the next train.
arabic: إن المكان مُزدحم، دعنا نستقل القطار القادم.
transliteration: in almkan mُzdḥm، dʿna nstql alqṭar alqadm.

english: Let me help you. Your bags look very heavy.
Let's consider the worst that could happen.
arabic: لِنُفَكّر بأسوأ ما يمكن أن يكون قد حصل.
transliteration: lِnُfَkr baswa ma ymkn an ykwn qd ḥṣl.
