english: Local shops do good business with tourists.
arabic: المتاجر المحلية تقوم بمتاجرة جيدة مع السياح .
transliteration: almtajr almḥlyh tqwm bmtajrh jydh mʿ alsyaḥ .

english: Maybe you can tell me where I can find Tom.
arabic: ربّما تخبرني عن مكانٍ أجد فيه توم.
transliteration: rbma tkhbrny ʿn mkanin ajd fyh twm.

english: Maybe you can tell me where I can find Tom.
arabic: ربّما تخبرينني عن مكانٍ أجد فيه توم.
transliteration: rbma tkhbrynny ʿn mkanin ajd fyh twm.

english: My mother permitted me to go to the movies.
arabic: سمحت لي أمي بأن أذهب إلى السينما.
transliteration: smḥt ly amy ban adhhb ilā alsynma.

english: My name is known to everybody in my school.
arabic: اسمي معروف لدى الجميع في مدرستي.
transliteration: asmy mʿrwf ldā aljmyʿ fy mdrsty.

english: My older sister often drinks tea with milk.
arabic: عادةً ما تشرب أختي الكبيرة الشاي مع الحليب.
transliteration: ʿadhan ma tshrb akhty alkbyrh alshay mʿ alḥlyb.

english: My older sister often drinks tea with milk.
arabic: كثيراً ما تشرب أختي الكبرى الشاي بالحليب.
transliteration: kthyraan ma tshrb akhty alkbrā alshay balḥlyb.

english: Never in my life have I heard such a thing.
arabic: لم أسمع في حياتي بهذا البتة.
transliteration: lm asmʿ fy ḥyaty bhdha albth.

english: Norway is the richest country in the world.
arabic: النرويج هي أغنى دولةٍ في العالم.
transliteration: alnrwyj hy aghnā dwlhin fy alʿalm.

english: Promise me you won't get mad if I tell you.
arabic: عدني أنك لن تغضب إن قلت لك.
transliteration: ʿdny ank ln tghḍb in qlt lk.

english: Recent advances in medicine are remarkable.
arabic: التطورات الاخيرة في الدواء جديرة بالملاحظة
transliteration: altṭwrat alakhyrh fy aldwaء jdyrh balmlaḥẓh

english: She has made the same mistake as last time.
She spent her life in pursuit of the truth.
arabic: أمضت حياتها في السعي وراء الحقيقة.
transliteration: amḍt ḥyatha fy alsʿy wraء alḥqyqh.

english: She's busy now, so she can't talk with you.
arabic: إنها مشغولة الآن, لذا لا تستطيع التحدث معك.
transliteration: inha mshghwlh alān, ldha la tstṭyʿ altḥdth mʿk.

english: Success in life calls for constant efforts.
arabic: النجاح في الحياة يتطلب جهودًا متواصلة.
transliteration: alnjaḥ fy alḥyah ytṭlb jhwdana mtwaṣlh.

english: The children love listening to fairy tales.
arabic: الأطفال يحبون الاستماع إلى القصص الخيالية.
transliteration: alaṭfal yḥbwn alastmaʿ ilā alqṣṣ alkhyalyh.

english: The doctor advised that she take a holiday.
The doctor's office is on the second floor.
The football players were tired, but happy.
arabic: كان لاعبي كرة القدم متعبين لكنّهم سعداء.
transliteration: kan laʿby krh alqdm mtʿbyn lknhm sʿdaء.

english: The hammer and sickle symbolizes communism.
The house standing on the hill is very old.
arabic: المنزل الواقف على التلة قديم جداً.
transliteration: almnzl alwaqf ʿlā altlh qdym jdaan.

english: The man who is standing there is my father.
arabic: الرجل الذي يقف هناك هو أبي.
transliteration: alrjl aldhy yqf hnak hw aby.

english: The police think that Tom knows who did it.
arabic: تظن الشرطة أن سامي يعلم من الفاعل.
transliteration: tẓn alshrṭh an samy yʿlm mn alfaʿl.

english: The stock reached its high point last July.
arabic: وصلت أسعار الأسهم ذروتها في يوليو الماضي.
transliteration: wṣlt asʿar alashm dhrwtha fy ywlyw almaḍy.

english: There are a lot of problems we can't avoid.
arabic: هناك الكثير من المشاكل التي لا يمكننا تجنبها.
transliteration: hnak alkthyr mn almshakl alty la ymknna tjnbha.

english: There's no one in the office at the moment.
The three countries were united to make one country.
arabic: إتحدت الدول الثلاث ليكوّنوا دولة واحدة.
transliteration: itḥdt aldwl althlath lykwnwa dwlh waḥdh.

english: They are watching what's happening closely.
arabic: إنهم يراقبون ما يحدث عن كثب.
transliteration: inhm yraqbwn ma yḥdth ʿn kthb.

english: They kept it secret that they were in love.
Those scientists are the cream of the crop.
Tom complained that he couldn't find a job.
arabic: اشتكي توم من أنه لم يستطع إيجاد وظيفة
transliteration: ashtky twm mn anh lm ystṭʿ iyjad wẓyfh

english: Tom didn't show up at the party last night.
arabic: لم يأتي توم إلى الحفلة الليلة الماضية.
transliteration: lm yaty twm ilā alḥflh allylh almaḍyh.

english: Tom has been at Mary's house all afternoon.
arabic: كانت توم في منزل ماري طوال الظهيرة.
transliteration: kant twm fy mnzl mary ṭwal alẓhyrh.

english: Tom is only pretending he's not interested.
arabic: توم فقط يتظاهر بأنه غير مهتم.
transliteration: twm fqṭ ytẓahr banh ghyr mhtm.

english: Tom tried to kiss me, but I didn't let him.
Tom wanted to know if Mary had a boyfriend.
arabic: أراد توم معرفة ما إن كان لِماري حبيب.
transliteration: arad twm mʿrfh ma in kan lِmary ḥbyb.

english: Tom wants me to help him with his homework.
arabic: يريد توم منّي مساعدته في حلّ واجبه المنزليّ.
transliteration: yryd twm mny msaʿdth fy ḥl wajbh almnzly.

english: Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all children.
We haven't finished what we have to do yet.
arabic: لم نكمل ما علينا إنجازه بعد.
transliteration: lm nkml ma ʿlyna injazh bʿd.

english: We haven't had those kinds of problems yet.
We haven't seen you in the past four years.
arabic: لم يرك أحد منذ أربع سنوات.
transliteration: lm yrk aḥd mndh arbʿ snwat.

english: We haven't seen you in the past four years.
We must go there whether we like it or not.
arabic: علينا الذهاب إلى هناك شئنا أم أبينا.
transliteration: ʿlyna aldhhab ilā hnak shئna am abyna.

english: We must go there whether we like it or not.
arabic: يجب أن نذهب إلى هناك سواء أردنا ذلك أم لا.
transliteration: yjb an ndhhb ilā hnak swaء ardna dhlk am la.

english: What time did she arrive at Narita Airport?
What would you say if you were in my place?
arabic: ماذا كنتَ ستقول لو كنت في مكاني؟
transliteration: madha kntَ stqwl lw knt fy mkany؟

english: What would you say if you were in my place?
arabic: ماذا كُنتِ ستقولينَ لو كنتِ في مكاني؟
transliteration: madha kُntِ stqwlynَ lw kntِ fy mkany؟

english: What you say does not make any sense to me.
arabic: ما تقوله ليس له أيُ معنىً لي.
transliteration: ma tqwlh lys lh ayُ mʿnāan ly.

english: What's Tom doing here? I didn't invite him.
arabic: ماذا يفعل توم هنا؟ لم أرسل له دعوة.
transliteration: madha yfʿl twm hna؟ lm arsl lh dʿwh.

english: What's the best way to resolve the problem?
Where do you intend to spend your vacation?
Why did you lend money to someone like her?
Why didn't you do that the way I suggested?
arabic: لم لم تقم بذلك كما عرضت الأمر عليك؟
transliteration: lm lm tqm bdhlk kma ʿrḍt alamr ʿlyk؟

english: Why didn't you do that the way I suggested?
arabic: لم لم تقم بذلك وفقا لاقتراحي؟
transliteration: lm lm tqm bdhlk wfqa laqtraḥy؟

english: Why does Tom have to sit in the back today?
arabic: لماذا يجب علي توم الجلوس في الخلف اليوم؟
transliteration: lmadha yjb ʿly twm aljlws fy alkhlf alywm؟

english: You have to change trains at the next stop.
arabic: عليك أن تركب قطاراً آخر عند المحطة القادمة.
transliteration: ʿlyk an trkb qṭaraan ākhr ʿnd almḥṭh alqadmh.

english: You have to get this work finished by noon.
arabic: يجب عليك أن تنهي هذا العمل قبل الظهر.
transliteration: yjb ʿlyk an tnhy hdha alʿml qbl alẓhr.

english: You have to wait until there's a seat free.
arabic: عليك الانتظار حتى يترك أحد مقعده.
transliteration: ʿlyk alantẓar ḥtā ytrk aḥd mqʿdh.

english: You'd be crazy to turn that job offer down.
arabic: ستكون أحمق إذا رفضت تلك الفرضة العمل.
transliteration: stkwn aḥmq idha rfḍt tlk alfrḍh alʿml.

english: You'd better not swim if you've just eaten.
arabic: من الأفضل لك ألا تسبح إذا أكلت للتو.
transliteration: mn alafḍl lk ala tsbḥ idha aklt lltw.

english: You'll feel better if you take these pills.
arabic: ستشعر بتحسن إذا تناولت هذه الحبوب.
transliteration: stshʿr btḥsn idha tnawlt hdhh alḥbwb.

english: You're very good at doing that, aren't you?
arabic: أنت جيد جدًا في فعل ذلك ، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: ant jyd jdana fy fʿl dhlk ، alys kdhlk؟

english: Your house is three times as large as mine.
arabic: بيتك أكبر من بيتي ثلاث مرات.
transliteration: bytk akbr mn byty thlath mrat.

english: Your house is three times as large as mine.
arabic: منزلك أكبر من منزلي بثلاث مرات.
transliteration: mnzlk akbr mn mnzly bthlath mrat.

english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
arabic: عصفور في اليد خير من عشرة على الشجرة.
transliteration: ʿṣfwr fy alyd khyr mn ʿshrh ʿlā alshjrh.

english: A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.
arabic: القليل من المعرفة يمكن أن يكون شيء خطير.
transliteration: alqlyl mn almʿrfh ymkn an ykwn shyء khṭyr.

english: A pelican can fit a lot of fish in its beak.
arabic: يمكن للبجعة أن تستوعب الكثير من الأسماك في منقارها.
transliteration: ymkn llbjʿh an tstwʿb alkthyr mn alasmak fy mnqarha.

english: All Tom really needed was about ten dollars.
arabic: كل ما كان يحتاجه توم كان حقاً بخصوص عشرة دولارات.
transliteration: kl ma kan yḥtajh twm kan ḥqaan bkhṣwṣ ʿshrh dwlarat.

english: Are you sure you haven't forgotten anything?
arabic: هل أنت متأكد أنك لم تنسَ شيئاً؟
transliteration: hl ant mtakd ank lm tnsَ shyئaan؟

english: Are you sure you haven't forgotten anything?
arabic: أمتأكد أنك لم تنسَ شيئاً ما؟
transliteration: amtakd ank lm tnsَ shyئaan ma؟

english: Artificial light is produced by electricity.
As far as I know, he's an excellent student.
arabic: على حد علمي، هو طالب ممتاز.
transliteration: ʿlā ḥd ʿlmy، hw ṭalb mmtaz.

english: At the time, we were just fifteen years old.
arabic: كان عمرنا حينها خمس عشرة سنة فقط.
transliteration: kan ʿmrna ḥynha khms ʿshrh snh fqṭ.

english: Both of those students didn't pass the test.
Can we go to the lake and watch the sunrise?
arabic: هل بإمكاننا الذّهاب إلى البحيرة لمشاهدة شروق الشّمس؟
transliteration: hl bimkanna aldhhab ilā albḥyrh lmshahdh shrwq alshms؟

english: Do you really want me to go there right now?
arabic: هل تريدني حقاً أن أذهب إلى هناك الأن؟
transliteration: hl trydny ḥqaan an adhhb ilā hnak alan؟

english: Do you really want me to go there right now?
arabic: هل تريديني حقاً أن أذهب إلى هناك الأن؟
transliteration: hl trydyny ḥqaan an adhhb ilā hnak alan؟

english: Do you remember the night when we first met?
arabic: هل تذكر الليلة التي تقابلنا فيها أول مرة؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr allylh alty tqablna fyha awl mrh؟

english: Do you sometimes go abroad on your holidays?
arabic: هل تذهب أحيانا إلى خارج البلاد لقضاء عطلتك؟
transliteration: hl tdhhb aḥyana ilā kharj alblad lqḍaء ʿṭltk؟

english: Do you think you could do what Tom is doing?
arabic: أتَضُنُّ أنَّكَ تَستَطيعُ فِعلَ ما يفعَلَهُ توم؟
transliteration: atَḍُnُ anَkَ tَstَṭyʿُ fِʿlَ ma yfʿَlَhُ twm؟

english: Do you want me to help you with the cooking?
Don't count your chickens before they hatch.
arabic: لا تَعَوِل على شيء جيد قبل حدوثه
transliteration: la tَʿَwِl ʿlā shyء jyd qbl ḥdwthh

english: He comes every day to visit his sick friend.
arabic: يأتي كل يوم لزيارة صديقه المريض.
transliteration: yaty kl ywm lzyarh ṣdyqh almryḍ.

english: He couldn't bring himself to shoot the deer.
arabic: لم يستطع أن يجعل نفسه تطلق على الأيِّل.
transliteration: lm ystṭʿ an yjʿl nfsh tṭlq ʿlā alayِl.

english: He has published many papers on the subject.
arabic: نشر العديد من الأوراق حول هذا الموضوع.
transliteration: nshr alʿdyd mn alawraq ḥwl hdha almwḍwʿ.

english: He made up his mind to keep his plan secret.
He reached home shortly before five o'clock.
arabic: وصل إلى بيته قبل الخامسة بدقائق.
transliteration: wṣl ilā byth qbl alkhamsh bdqaئq.

english: He told his son to get down from the ladder.
arabic: قال لابنه أن ينزل عن السلم.
transliteration: qal labnh an ynzl ʿn alslm.

english: Her disappointment was apparent to everyone.
How long does it take to get to the station?
arabic: كم من الوقت يلزم للوصول إلى المحطّة.
transliteration: km mn alwqt ylzm llwṣwl ilā almḥṭh.

english: How often do you forget to do your homework?
I didn't know that Tom had to do that by himself.
arabic: لم أعلم بأنه كان على توم فعل ذلك بنفسه.
transliteration: lm aʿlm banh kan ʿlā twm fʿl dhlk bnfsh.

english: I don't like him because he is sly as a fox.
I don't think Tom would buy a pink umbrella.
arabic: لا أظن أن توم سيشتري مظلة وردية.
transliteration: la aẓn an twm syshtry mẓlh wrdyh.

english: I hate mosquitoes, but they seem to love me.
arabic: أكره البعوض جدًا، إلا أنهم يحبونني جدًا.
transliteration: akrh albʿwḍ jdana، ila anhm yḥbwnny jdana.

english: I have books that I've reread several times.
I haven't had a chance to see the movie yet.
arabic: لم تسنح لي الفرصة لمشاهدة الفيلم.
transliteration: lm tsnḥ ly alfrṣh lmshahdh alfylm.

english: I just want a straight answer. Nothing more.
arabic: أريد فقط إجابة صريحة، لا أكثر.
transliteration: aryd fqṭ ijabh ṣryḥh، la akthr.

english: I looked all over the house for that letter.
arabic: بحثت في المنزل كله عن تلك الرسالة.
transliteration: bḥtht fy almnzl klh ʿn tlk alrsalh.

english: I met her in a coffee shop near the station.
arabic: قابلتها في المقهى القريب من المحطة.
transliteration: qabltha fy almqhā alqryb mn almḥṭh.

english: I think I mistakenly sent that email to Tom.
arabic: أنا أعتقد أني بطريق الخطأ أرسلت البريد الإلكتروني إلى توم.
transliteration: ana aʿtqd any bṭryq alkhṭa arslt albryd alilktrwny ilā twm.

english: I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
I used to swim every day when I was a child.
arabic: كنت أسبح كل يوم عندما كنت صغيراً.
transliteration: knt asbḥ kl ywm ʿndma knt ṣghyraan.

english: I worked hard in order to support my family.
arabic: عملت عملا شاقا لكي أدعم عائلتي.
transliteration: ʿmlt ʿmla shaqa lky adʿm ʿaئlty.

english: I'm looking for a book about medieval Spain.
arabic: إني أبحث عن كتاب عن اسبانيا في العصور الوسطى.
transliteration: iny abḥth ʿn ktab ʿn asbanya fy alʿṣwr alwsṭā.

english: I'm looking forward to your Halloween party.
arabic: أنا أتتطلع لحفلة عيد القديسيين خاصتك.
transliteration: ana attṭlʿ lḥflh ʿyd alqdysyyn khaṣtk.

english: I'm looking forward to your Halloween party.
I'm not sure if I like this one or that one.
arabic: لست متأكدًا مما إذا كنت أفضل هذا أم ذاك.
transliteration: lst mtakdana mma idha knt afḍl hdha am dhak.

english: I've already given Tom his birthday present.
arabic: سبق أن أعطيت توم هدية عيد ميلاده.
transliteration: sbq an aʿṭyt twm hdyh ʿyd myladh.

english: If it rains tomorrow, will you stay at home?
arabic: هل ستبقى في المنزل إذا أمطرت غداً؟
transliteration: hl stbqā fy almnzl idha amṭrt ghdaan؟

english: If the weather is good, I'll go to the park.
arabic: لو كان الجو جيدًا، سأذهب إلى الحديقة
transliteration: lw kan aljw jydana، sadhhb ilā alḥdyqh

english: If you keep trying, you'll get better at it.
If you've got something to say, just say it.
arabic: إن كان لديك ما تقول، فقُله.
transliteration: in kan ldyk ma tqwl، fqُlh.

english: In case of fire, telephone the fire station.
arabic: في حالة الحريق، اتصل بمحظة المطافي.
transliteration: fy ḥalh alḥryq، atṣl bmḥẓh almṭafy.

english: In order to do that, you have to take risks.
Isn't there something you want to say to me?
arabic: ألا يوجد ما تريد قوله لي؟
transliteration: ala ywjd ma tryd qwlh ly؟

english: It isn't as hot here as I expected it to be.
arabic: انها ليست ساخنة هنا كما توقعت.
transliteration: anha lyst sakhnh hna kma twqʿt.

english: It was difficult to remove the coffee stain.
arabic: كان من الصعب إزالة بقعة القهوة.
transliteration: kan mn alṣʿb izalh bqʿh alqhwh.

english: It would seem that the weather is improving.
It's impossible to learn English in a month.
arabic: من المستحيل تعلم الإنجليزية في شهر.
transliteration: mn almstḥyl tʿlm alinjlyzyh fy shhr.

english: Let's forget about what happened last night.
Let's forget that this whole thing happened.
arabic: لننسى أنّ شيئا كهذا قد حصل.
transliteration: lnnsā an shyئa khdha qd ḥṣl.

english: Mary wanted to know if Tom had a girlfriend.
arabic: أرادت ماري معرفة ما إن كان لِتوم حبيبة.
transliteration: aradt mary mʿrfh ma in kan lِtwm ḥbybh.

english: My father gives my mother all of his salary.
arabic: أبي يعطي أمي كل راتبه الشهري.
transliteration: aby yʿṭy amy kl ratbh alshhry.

english: Now that I am here, you don't have to worry.
One of Tom's ancestors lived in that castle.
arabic: أَحدْ أجدَاد توم عَاشَ في هذهِ القلْعَة.
transliteration: aَḥd ajdَad twm ʿَashَ fy hdhhِ alqlʿَh.

english: People are living in all parts of the world.
arabic: الناس يعيشون في جميع أنحاء العالم.
transliteration: alnas yʿyshwn fy jmyʿ anḥaء alʿalm.

english: She didn't know what to do with the problem.
arabic: لم تعرف كيف تتصرف تجاه المشكلة.
transliteration: lm tʿrf kyf ttṣrf tjah almshklh.

english: Some children play video games all the time.
arabic: بعض الأطفال يلعبون ألعاب الفيديو في جميع الأوقات.
transliteration: bʿḍ alaṭfal ylʿbwn alʿab alfydyw fy jmyʿ alawqat.

english: Some children play video games all the time.
arabic: بعض الأطفال يلعبون ألعاب الفيديو في كل الأوقات.
transliteration: bʿḍ alaṭfal ylʿbwn alʿab alfydyw fy kl alawqat.

english: Some people in the world suffer from hunger.
arabic: في هذا العالم يعاني بعضُ الناسِ الجوعَ.
transliteration: fy hdha alʿalm yʿany bʿḍُ alnasِ aljwʿَ.

english: TV plays an important part in everyday life.
arabic: يلعب التلفاز دوراً هاماً في الحياة اليومية.
transliteration: ylʿb altlfaz dwraan hamaan fy alḥyah alywmyh.

english: The Texans began to organize their own army.
The accused is innocent until proven guilty.
The explanation was beyond my understanding.
The police got to the scene of the accident.
The tourist asked for lodging for the night.
arabic: سال السائح بخصوص المكوث لهذه الليلة .
transliteration: sal alsaئḥ bkhṣwṣ almkwth lhdhh allylh .

english: There is not enough demand for this product.
arabic: لا يوجد إقبال كافٍ على هذه البضاعة.
transliteration: la ywjd iqbal kafin ʿlā hdhh albḍaʿh.

english: There was a post office on this corner once.
arabic: في يوم من الأيام كان هناك مكتب بريدي على هذه الزاوية من الشارع.
transliteration: fy ywm mn alayam kan hnak mktb brydy ʿlā hdhh alzawyh mn alsharʿ.

english: There were three people waiting in front me.
There's a swimming pool and a bowling alley.
These are my books, and those are his books.
They must be crazy to believe such nonsense.
arabic: يجب أن يكونوا قد جُنّوا للاعتقاد في مثل هذا الهراء.
transliteration: yjb an ykwnwa qd jُnwa llaʿtqad fy mthl hdha alhraء.

english: This flower is more beautiful than that one.
This is just what Tom didn't want to happen.
arabic: هذا بالضبط ما لم يكن توم يريد حدوثه.
transliteration: hdha balḍbṭ ma lm ykn twm yryd ḥdwthh.

english: This is the biggest cat that I've ever seen.
arabic: هذه أكبر قطة رأيتها في حياتي.
transliteration: hdhh akbr qṭh raytha fy ḥyaty.

english: This restaurant has many vegetarian options.
arabic: يقدّم هذا المطعم خيارات كثيرة للنباتيين.
transliteration: yqdm hdha almṭʿm khyarat kthyrh llnbatyyn.

english: Today's paper says that a typhoon is coming.
arabic: جريدة اليوم تحذّر من قدوم عاصفة.
transliteration: jrydh alywm tḥdhr mn qdwm ʿaṣfh.

english: Tom has called me many times this past week.
arabic: اتصل بي توم مرات كثيرة الأسبوع الماضي.
transliteration: atṣl by twm mrat kthyrh alasbwʿ almaḍy.

english: Tom is outside playing frisbee with his dog.
arabic: توم في الخارج يلعب لعبة الصحن الطائر مع كلبه.
transliteration: twm fy alkharj ylʿb lʿbh alṣḥn alṭaئr mʿ klbh.

english: Tom is really interested in Greek mythology.
Tom is sitting at the table near the window.
arabic: يجلس توم على الطاولة بقرب النافذة.
transliteration: yjls twm ʿlā alṭawlh bqrb alnafdhh.

english: Tom said he doubted that Mary would do that.
arabic: قالَ توم أنهُ شَكَّ أنَّ ماري سَتَفعلُ ذلِكَ
transliteration: qalَ twm anhُ shَkَ anَ mary sَtَfʿlُ dhlِkَ

english: Tom said that he could make it to the party.
arabic: قال توم أنه يمكنه إدراك الحفلة.
transliteration: qal twm anh ymknh idrak alḥflh.

english: Tom told me that he thought Mary was skinny.
arabic: أخبرني توم أنه اعتقد أن ماري كانت نحيفة.
transliteration: akhbrny twm anh aʿtqd an mary kant nḥyfh.

english: Tom tried to stop Mary from talking to John.
arabic: حاول توم إيقاف ماري عن التحدث مع جون.
transliteration: ḥawl twm iyqaf mary ʿn altḥdth mʿ jwn.

english: Waking up is the opposite of going to sleep.
Waking up is the opposite of going to sleep.
We can't be the only two people who're late.
arabic: لا نستطيع أن نكون الشخصان الوحيدان المتأخران
transliteration: la nstṭyʿ an nkwn alshkhṣan alwḥydan almtakhran

english: What's your impression of the United States?
You are the only one who can save the world.
arabic: أنت الواحد والوحيد الذي يستطيع إنقاذ العالم.
transliteration: ant alwaḥd walwḥyd aldhy ystṭyʿ inqadh alʿalm.

english: You can spend the night with us if you want.
arabic: يمكنك قضاء الليل معنا إن أحببت.
transliteration: ymknk qḍaء allyl mʿna in aḥbbt.

english: You don't have any plants or animals, right?
arabic: ليست معك حيوانات أو نباتات، صحيح؟
transliteration: lyst mʿk ḥywanat aw nbatat، ṣḥyḥ؟

english: You don't think Tom will call again, do you?
arabic: لا تظن أن توم سيتصل بك مجددا، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: la tẓn an twm sytṣl bk mjdda، alys kdhlk؟

english: You haven't washed your hands yet, have you?
arabic: أنت لم تغسل يديك بعد, هل فعلت؟
transliteration: ant lm tghsl ydyk bʿd, hl fʿlt؟

english: You haven't washed your hands yet, have you?
arabic: أنت لم تقم بغسل يديك إلي الآن ،أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: ant lm tqm bghsl ydyk ily alān ،alys kdhlk؟

english: You shouldn't judge others on how they look.
arabic: يجب أن لا تحكم على الآخرين من مظهرهم.
transliteration: yjb an la tḥkm ʿlā alākhryn mn mẓhrhm.

english: As soon as he saw the policeman, he ran away.
arabic: ما أن رأى الشرطي حتى ركض هارباً.
transliteration: ma an raā alshrṭy ḥtā rkḍ harbaan.

english: At last, I graduated from junior high school.
arabic: و أخيراً أنهيت دراسة المرحلة الإعدادية.
transliteration: w akhyraan anhyt drash almrḥlh aliʿdadyh.

english: Can you tell me how to get to Lincoln Center?
arabic: هل لك أن تخبرني كيف أصل إلى مركز لنكن؟
transliteration: hl lk an tkhbrny kyf aṣl ilā mrkz lnkn؟

english: Did it not occur to you to close the windows?
arabic: ألم يخطر ببالك أن تغلق النوافذ؟
transliteration: alm ykhṭr bbalk an tghlq alnwafdh؟

english: Do I really have to go to Australia with Tom?
arabic: هل يتوجب علي حقاً الذهاب إلى أستراليا مع توم؟
transliteration: hl ytwjb ʿly ḥqaan aldhhab ilā astralya mʿ twm؟

english: Do you have any idea why Tom doesn't like me?
arabic: هل لديك أدنی فكرة عن سبب كره "توم" لي ؟
transliteration: hl ldyk adnی fkrh ʿn sbb krh "twm" ly ؟

english: Do you think he made that mistake on purpose?
Don't forget to count how many people attend.
Don't worry. The ambulance will be here soon.
arabic: لا تقلق. سيارة الإسعاف ستكون هنا قريباً.
transliteration: la tqlq. syarh alisʿaf stkwn hna qrybaan.

english: Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
arabic: سامحني على فتح خطابك عن طريق الخطأ.
transliteration: samḥny ʿlā ftḥ khṭabk ʿn ṭryq alkhṭa.

english: Florence is the most beautiful city in Italy.
He extorted a large amount of money from her.
arabic: لقد ابتزّها بمبلغ كبير من المال.
transliteration: lqd abtzha bmblgh kbyr mn almal.

english: He looked at me out of the corner of his eye.
He was very thirsty and asked for some water.
arabic: كان عطشاناً جداً فطلب القليل من الماء.
transliteration: kan ʿṭshanaan jdaan fṭlb alqlyl mn almaء.

english: His new book is going to come out next month.
How many people did you invite to your party?
How much did you have to pay for the tickets?
arabic: ما المبلغ الذي كان عليك دفعه للتذاكر؟
transliteration: ma almblgh aldhy kan ʿlyk dfʿh lltdhakr؟

english: I am going to do it whether you agree or not.
arabic: سوف أفعلها سواءاً وافقت أم لم توافق.
transliteration: swf afʿlha swaءaan wafqt am lm twafq.

english: I broke down the door because I lost the key.
arabic: لقد كسرت الباب لأنني أضعت المفتاح.
transliteration: lqd ksrt albab lanny aḍʿt almftaḥ.

english: I can't possibly finish the work by tomorrow.
arabic: ليس بمقدوري إنهاء العمل قبل حلول الغد.
transliteration: lys bmqdwry inhaء alʿml qbl ḥlwl alghd.

english: I can't remember what I had to eat yesterday.
arabic: لا أستطيع أن أتذكر ما أكلتهُ بالأمس.
transliteration: la astṭyʿ an atdhkr ma aklthُ balams.

english: I don't know if he would have done it for me.
arabic: لا أدري إن كان ليفعلها لأجلي.
transliteration: la adry in kan lyfʿlha lajly.

english: I don't like this hat. I prefer the gray one.
arabic: لا احب هذه القبعه. افضل الرماديه اكثر
transliteration: la aḥb hdhh alqbʿh. afḍl alrmadyh akthr

english: I don't think we have enough time to do that.
arabic: لا اعتقد اننا نملك الوقت الكافي لفعل ذلك.
transliteration: la aʿtqd anna nmlk alwqt alkafy lfʿl dhlk.

english: I don't want to have anything to do with you.
arabic: لا أريد أن تكون أية صلة بين و بينك.
transliteration: la aryd an tkwn ayh ṣlh byn w bynk.

english: I found this ring on the street this morning.
arabic: وجدت هذا الخاتم في الشارع هذا الصباح
transliteration: wjdt hdha alkhatm fy alsharʿ hdha alṣbaḥ

english: I guarantee that this information is correct.
arabic: أضمن لك أنّ هذه المعلومات صحيحة.
transliteration: aḍmn lk an hdhh almʿlwmat ṣḥyḥh.

english: I guarantee that this information is correct.
I had no idea you knew how to play the cello.
arabic: لم يكن لدي أي فكرة أنك تعرف كيف تعزف على التشيلو.
transliteration: lm ykn ldy ay fkrh ank tʿrf kyf tʿzf ʿlā altshylw.

english: I have to give back the book before Saturday.
arabic: عليّ أن أعيد الكتاب قبل السبت.
transliteration: ʿly an aʿyd alktab qbl alsbt.

english: I need to talk to you about an urgent matter.
arabic: أحتاج التحدث معك عن أمر طارئ
transliteration: aḥtaj altḥdth mʿk ʿn amr ṭarئ

english: I replied automatically when I heard my name.
I thought Tom would be doing that by himself.
I thought you didn't know how to do anything.
arabic: ظننت أنّك لا تعرف فعل أيّ شيء.
transliteration: ẓnnt ank la tʿrf fʿl ay shyء.

english: I usually have a glass of milk for breakfast.
arabic: أشرب عادةً كوبًا من الحليب على الإفطار.
transliteration: ashrb ʿadhan kwbana mn alḥlyb ʿlā alifṭar.

english: I wanted to hit him, but he ran away from me.
arabic: أردت أن أضربه و لكنه هرب مني.
transliteration: ardt an aḍrbh w lknh hrb mny.

english: I'll do my best not to disturb your studying.
arabic: سأحاول ما استطعتُ ألّا أُقاطِع مذاكرتك.
transliteration: saḥawl ma astṭʿtُ ala aُqaṭِʿ mdhakrtk.

english: I'll get in touch with you by phone tomorrow.
I'm in love with you and I want to marry you.
I'm in love with you and I want to marry you.
I'm not trying to deprive you of your rights.
arabic: إنني لا أحاول أن أسلبك حقوقك.
transliteration: inny la aḥawl an aslbk ḥqwqk.

english: I'm not trying to deprive you of your rights.
I'm sorry, but I don't want to talk about it.
arabic: المعذرة، لا أريد التحدث عن الموضوع.
transliteration: almʿdhrh، la aryd altḥdth ʿn almwḍwʿ.

english: I've come to like the picture more than ever.
arabic: بدأت أحب الصورة أكثر من أي وقت مضى.
transliteration: bdat aḥb alṣwrh akthr mn ay wqt mḍā.

english: If you're not with us then you're against us.
arabic: إذا لم تكن معنا فأنت ضدنا.
transliteration: idha lm tkn mʿna fant ḍdna.

english: If you're not with us then you're against us.
arabic: إذا لم تكن في صفنا فسنعدك من أعدائنا.
transliteration: idha lm tkn fy ṣfna fsnʿdk mn aʿdaئna.

english: If you're not with us then you're against us.
arabic: إذا لم تكن تؤيدنا فأنت عدونا.
transliteration: idha lm tkn tؤydna fant ʿdwna.

english: In Venice, there are always lots of tourists.
arabic: في البندقية , دائما هنالك الكثير من السياح .
transliteration: fy albndqyh , daئma hnalk alkthyr mn alsyaḥ .

english: Is it true that Europeans don't shower daily?
arabic: أصحيح أن الأوروبيين لا يستحمون كل يوم؟
transliteration: aṣḥyḥ an alawrwbyyn la ystḥmwn kl ywm؟

english: It was quite dark when I got home last night.
arabic: كانت الدنيا مظلمةً حين وصلت إلى منزلي ليلة أمس.
transliteration: kant aldnya mẓlmhan ḥyn wṣlt ilā mnzly lylh ams.

english: It's been a pleasure doing business with you.
It's going to be difficult for us to do that.
arabic: سيكون من الصعب علينا فعل ذلك.
transliteration: sykwn mn alṣʿb ʿlyna fʿl dhlk.

english: It's not as big a problem as you think it is.
arabic: إنها ليست مشكلة كبيرة كما تعتقد.
transliteration: inha lyst mshklh kbyrh kma tʿtqd.

english: It's the perfect place for a romantic dinner.
Lack of food had left him weak and exhausted.
arabic: إنعدان الطعام أضحت به ضعيفاً ومنهكاً.
transliteration: inʿdan alṭʿam aḍḥt bh ḍʿyfaan wmnhkaan.

english: Manchester United won the match, four to two.
arabic: فاز فريق مانتشستر يونايتد بأربعة أهداف مقابل إثنين.
transliteration: faz fryq mantshstr ywnaytd barbʿh ahdaf mqabl ithnyn.

english: Many tourists come to this island every year.
arabic: يأتي العديد من السياح الى هذه الجزيرة كل سنة .
transliteration: yaty alʿdyd mn alsyaḥ alā hdhh aljzyrh kl snh .

english: My grandfather usually eats breakfast at six.
arabic: عادةً ما يفطر جدي عند السادسة.
transliteration: ʿadhan ma yfṭr jdy ʿnd alsadsh.

english: No matter what happens, I won't be surprised.
Nobody listens until you say something wrong.
arabic: لن يصغي إليك أحدا حتى تقول شيئا خاطئاً.
transliteration: ln yṣghy ilyk aḥda ḥtā tqwl shyئa khaṭئaan.

english: People used to think that the earth was flat.
arabic: كان الناس يعتقدون بأن الأرض مسطحة.
transliteration: kan alnas yʿtqdwn ban alarḍ msṭḥh.

english: People who will lie for you, will lie to you.
Please speak slowly, so I can understand you.
arabic: من فضلك تحدث ببطء, كي أفهمك.
transliteration: mn fḍlk tḥdth bbṭء, ky afhmk.

english: Please translate this sentence into Japanese.
arabic: من فضلك ترجم هذه الجملة إلى اليابانية.
transliteration: mn fḍlk trjm hdhh aljmlh ilā alyabanyh.

english: She accomplished the task through sheer will.
She greeted him cheerfully as she always did.
She talks as if she knew everything about it.
arabic: تتكلم كأنها تعرف كل شيء عنه.
transliteration: ttklm kanha tʿrf kl shyء ʿnh.

english: She wants to buy a present for her boyfriend.
Some religious people can be very judgmental.
arabic: بعض الأشخاص المتدينين قد يكون سريعي الأحكام.
transliteration: bʿḍ alashkhaṣ almtdynyn qd ykwn sryʿy alaḥkam.

english: That's the biggest strawberry I've ever seen.
arabic: هذه أكبر حبة فراولة رأيتها حتى الآن.
transliteration: hdhh akbr ḥbh frawlh raytha ḥtā alān.

english: That's the biggest strawberry I've ever seen.
The gardener didn't let us walk on the grass.
arabic: لم يسمح لنا البستاني بالمشي على العشب.
transliteration: lm ysmḥ lna albstany balmshy ʿlā alʿshb.

english: The hijackers moved to the rear of the plane.
arabic: تحركوا خاطفو الطائرة الى مؤخرة الطائرة .
transliteration: tḥrkwa khaṭfw alṭaئrh alā mؤkhrh alṭaئrh .

english: Their trip was postponed because of the rain.
Their trip was postponed because of the rain.
There are many words that I don't understand.
arabic: ثمّة العديد من الكلمات التي لا أفهمها.
transliteration: thmh alʿdyd mn alklmat alty la afhmha.

english: There is a strange man in front of the house.
There used to be a small castle on this hill.
arabic: كان هناك قلعة على هذا التل.
transliteration: kan hnak qlʿh ʿlā hdha altl.

english: There used to be a small castle on this hill.
arabic: كان هناك حصن على تلك الهضبة في يوم من الأيام.
transliteration: kan hnak ḥṣn ʿlā tlk alhḍbh fy ywm mn alayam.

english: There's something I want to discuss with you.
arabic: هناك شيئا اريد ان اناقشه معك.
transliteration: hnak shyئa aryd an anaqshh mʿk.

english: This book is even more interesting than that.
arabic: هذا الكتاب ممتع أكثر من ذاك.
transliteration: hdha alktab mmtʿ akthr mn dhak.

english: This isn't my umbrella; it's somebody else's.
arabic: هذه ليست مظلتي، إنها لشخص ما.
transliteration: hdhh lyst mẓlty، inha lshkhṣ ma.

english: Though it was cold, he didn't light the fire.
arabic: لم يشعل النار مع أن الجو كان بارداً.
transliteration: lm yshʿl alnar mʿ an aljw kan bardaan.

english: Tom and Mary decided to go see a scary movie.
arabic: قرّر سامي وليلى مشاهدة فيلم مخيف.
transliteration: qrr samy wlylā mshahdh fylm mkhyf.

english: Tom and Mary enjoyed themselves at the party.
arabic: لم يفوت توم وماري على أنفسهما الاستمتاع بالحفلة.
transliteration: lm yfwt twm wmary ʿlā anfshma alastmtaʿ balḥflh.

english: Tom didn't know how many of them needed help.
arabic: لم يعرف توم كم واحداَ منهم احتاج الي مساعدة
transliteration: lm yʿrf twm km waḥdaَ mnhm aḥtaj aly msaʿdh

english: Tom is better at French than you might think.
arabic: توم أفضل مما تعتقد في الفرنسية
transliteration: twm afḍl mma tʿtqd fy alfrnsyh

english: Tom spends a lot of time playing video games.
arabic: يقضي سامي وقتًا طويلًا في ألعاب الفيديو.
transliteration: yqḍy samy wqtana ṭwylana fy alʿab alfydyw.

english: Tom thought he had all the time in the world.
arabic: يعتقد توم انه كان في كل وقت في العالم.
transliteration: yʿtqd twm anh kan fy kl wqt fy alʿalm.

english: Tom wanted to get married after he graduated.
Too much stress can lead to physical disease.
arabic: الكثير من الضغط ربما يؤدي إلى مرض عضوي.
transliteration: alkthyr mn alḍghṭ rbma yؤdy ilā mrḍ ʿḍwy.

english: Tourists often bought souvenirs in this shop.
arabic: غالباً ما يشتري السياح الهدايا التذكارية من هذا المتجر .
transliteration: ghalbaan ma yshtry alsyaḥ alhdaya altdhkaryh mn hdha almtjr .

english: Tourists take over this island in the summer.
arabic: يجتاح السياح هذه الجزيرة في الصيف.
transliteration: yjtaḥ alsyaḥ hdhh aljzyrh fy alṣyf.

english: Turn off the television. I can't concentrate.
Was Tom the one who gave you this squirt gun?
arabic: هل توم هو من اعطاك مسدس الماء هذا ؟
transliteration: hl twm hw mn aʿṭak msds almaء hdha ؟

english: What do I have to do now that I'm registered?
arabic: ما الذي عليّ فعله الآن بعد أن سجّلت؟
transliteration: ma aldhy ʿly fʿlh alān bʿd an sjlt؟

english: What do I have to do now that I'm registered?
arabic: ماذا أفعل الآن بعد أن أصبحت عضواً؟
transliteration: madha afʿl alān bʿd an aṣbḥt ʿḍwaan؟

english: What is the difference between this and that?
arabic: ما الفرق بين هذا و ذاك؟
transliteration: ma alfrq byn hdha w dhak؟

english: Where are the documents that were on my desk?
arabic: أين هي الوثائق التي كانت على طاولتي؟
transliteration: ayn hy alwthaئq alty kant ʿlā ṭawlty؟

english: You didn't know I shouldn't do that, did you?
arabic: لَمْ تَعلَمْ أنني لَمْ يَجِبْ أَن أَفعَلَ ذلك، ألَيسَ كَذلك؟
transliteration: lَm tَʿlَm anny lَm yَjِb aَn aَfʿَlَ dhlk، alَysَ kَdhlk؟

english: You people go ahead. We'll bring up the rear.
arabic: ايها الناس امضوا قدماً . نحن سوف نتبعكم .
transliteration: ayha alnas amḍwa qdmaan . nḥn swf ntbʿkm .

english: Your success is the result of your hard work.
An ant can lift more than 50 times its weight.
arabic: تستطيع النملة أن ترفع أكثر من خمسين ضعف وزنها.
transliteration: tstṭyʿ alnmlh an trfʿ akthr mn khmsyn ḍʿf wznha.

english: Aren't you worried that Tom might get injured?
arabic: ألست قلقا من إحتمال أن يُجرح توم؟
transliteration: alst qlqa mn iḥtmal an yُjrḥ twm؟

english: As soon as we sat down, she brought us coffee.
arabic: ما إن جلسنا حتى جاءت لنا بالقهوة.
transliteration: ma in jlsna ḥtā jaءt lna balqhwh.

english: Could you give me a lift to the train station?
arabic: أيمكنك أن توصلني إلى محطة القطار؟
transliteration: aymknk an twṣlny ilā mḥṭh alqṭar؟

english: Could you give me a lift to the train station?
arabic: أبإمكانك أن تقلني إلى محطة القطار؟
transliteration: abimkank an tqlny ilā mḥṭh alqṭar؟

english: Croatia is in the southeastern part of Europe.
arabic: تقع كرواتيا في الجزء الجنوبي الشرقي من أوروبا.
transliteration: tqʿ krwatya fy aljzء aljnwby alshrqy mn awrwba.

english: Did you discuss any of the issues on our list?
arabic: هل ناقشت أيًا من المسائل في قائمتنا ؟
transliteration: hl naqsht ayana mn almsaئl fy qaئmtna ؟

english: Don't forget that you need to buy some onions.
arabic: لا تنس أنّه يجب أن تشتري قليلا من البصل.
transliteration: la tns anh yjb an tshtry qlyla mn albṣl.

english: Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong.
arabic: لا تحشر أنفك في ما لا يعنيك.
transliteration: la tḥshr anfk fy ma la yʿnyk.

english: Don't worry. I'm not going to tell the police.
arabic: لا تقلق. أنا لن أقول للشرطة.
transliteration: la tqlq. ana ln aqwl llshrṭh.

english: He couldn't wait to try out his new surfboard.
arabic: إنهُ لم يستطع أن ينتظر ليجرب لوح ركوب الأمواج.
transliteration: inhُ lm ystṭʿ an yntẓr lyjrb lwḥ rkwb alamwaj.

english: He looks young, but actually he is over forty.
arabic: يبدو صغيراً، ولكن في الواقع هو فوقَ الأربعين.
transliteration: ybdw ṣghyraan، wlkn fy alwaqʿ hw fwqَ alarbʿyn.

english: He nodded to show that he approved of my plan.
arabic: أومأ برأسه إشارةً إلى موافقته على خطتي.
transliteration: awma brash isharhan ilā mwafqth ʿlā khṭty.

english: He put salt into his cup of coffee by mistake.
arabic: وضع الملح في فنجان قهوته بالخطأ.
transliteration: wḍʿ almlḥ fy fnjan qhwth balkhṭa.

english: He wants to buy a pearl necklace for his wife.
He was stupid enough to believe what she said.
arabic: لقد كان غبي بما يكفي لتصديق ما قالته.
transliteration: lqd kan ghby bma ykfy ltṣdyq ma qalth.

english: How long do you think Tom can hold his breath?
arabic: برأيك، لكَم من الوقت يستطيع توم حبس نفَسه؟
transliteration: brayk، lkَm mn alwqt ystṭyʿ twm ḥbs nfَsh؟

english: I am already forgetting my grandmother's face.
I bought this when I was in the United States.
arabic: لقد اشتريت هذا عندما كنت في الولايات المتحدة.
transliteration: lqd ashtryt hdha ʿndma knt fy alwlayat almtḥdh.

english: I cannot thank you enough for your assistance.
arabic: لا أعرف كيف أشكرك على مساعدتك هذه.
transliteration: la aʿrf kyf ashkrk ʿlā msaʿdtk hdhh.

english: I decided to take his side against the others.
arabic: قررت أن أقف لجانبه ضد الآخرين.
transliteration: qrrt an aqf ljanbh ḍd alākhryn.

english: I didn't know how long the meeting would last.
I don't remember exactly where I put the keys.
I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
arabic: أنا لا أريد أن يكون هناك أي سوء فهم.
transliteration: ana la aryd an ykwn hnak ay swء fhm.

english: I exhausted myself by walking a long distance.
I feed my cat every morning and every evening.
arabic: أطعم قطتي كل صباح وكل مساء.
transliteration: aṭʿm qṭty kl ṣbaḥ wkl msaء.

english: I forgot to write the address on the envelope.
I had a fight with my older brother yesterday.
I heard that Tom is going to get married soon.
I just want to relax and listen to some music.
arabic: لا أريد سوى الاسترخاء وسماع الموسيقى.
transliteration: la aryd swā alastrkhaء wsmaʿ almwsyqā.

english: I studied Chinese at the University of Venice.
I want an answer from you as soon as possible.
arabic: أريد إجابة منك في أسرع وقت ممكن
transliteration: aryd ijabh mnk fy asrʿ wqt mmkn

english: I would rather stay home than go out with him.
arabic: أفضل البقاء في البيت على الخروج معه.
transliteration: afḍl albqaء fy albyt ʿlā alkhrwj mʿh.

english: I wouldn't be calling if it weren't important.
arabic: ما كنت لأتصل بك لولا أن الأمر مهم .
transliteration: ma knt latṣl bk lwla an alamr mhm .

english: I'd like to have a few minutes alone with Tom.
I'm not allowed to tell what you want to know.
arabic: لم يؤذن لي بإطلاعك على ما تريد معرفته.
transliteration: lm yؤdhn ly biṭlaʿk ʿlā ma tryd mʿrfth.

english: I'm trying to understand why you didn't do it.
arabic: أحاول أن أفهم لماذا لم تقم بالأمر .
transliteration: aḥawl an afhm lmadha lm tqm balamr .

english: It is a very popular destination for tourists.
It is like looking for a needle in a haystack.
arabic: كَمن يبحث عن إبرة في كومة قَشّ.
transliteration: kَmn ybḥth ʿn ibrh fy kwmh qَsh.

english: It's important to me that we follow the rules.
It's not polite to speak with your mouth full.
arabic: ليس من الأدب أن تتكلم و فمك ممتلئ.
transliteration: lys mn aladb an ttklm w fmk mmtlئ.

english: Let us know if you don't understand something.
arabic: اخبرنا عندما لم تفهم شيئا ما.
transliteration: akhbrna ʿndma lm tfhm shyئa ma.

english: Let's have a tea party the day after tomorrow.
Maybe Tom should quit before he hurts himself.
arabic: ربما على توم التوقف قبل أن يؤذي نفسه.
transliteration: rbma ʿlā twm altwqf qbl an yؤdhy nfsh.

english: My father and my brother work in this factory.
arabic: يعمل أبي وأخي في هذا المصنع.
transliteration: yʿml aby wakhy fy hdha almṣnʿ.

english: My new job leaves me little time to socialize.
arabic: عملي الجديد يترك لي القليل من الوقت للاختلاط.
transliteration: ʿmly aljdyd ytrk ly alqlyl mn alwqt llakhtlaṭ.

english: Nobody there knew that Tom was Mary's brother.
arabic: لا أحد هناك عرف أن توم هو شقيق ماري.
transliteration: la aḥd hnak ʿrf an twm hw shqyq mary.

english: Oh, I just remembered. Tom left you a message.
arabic: أخ، تذكرت. ترك لك سامي رسالة.
transliteration: akh، tdhkrt. trk lk samy rsalh.

english: Our restaurant is better than that restaurant.
Please fill out the attached job application form.
arabic: يرجى ملء نموذج طلب الوظيفة المرفق.
transliteration: yrjā mlء nmwdhj ṭlb alwẓyfh almrfq.

english: Please wash your hands properly before eating.
arabic: رجاءً، اغسل يديك جيدًا قبل الأكل.
transliteration: rjaءan، aghsl ydyk jydana qbl alakl.

english: She doesn't want me to speak about this issue.
arabic: هي لا تريد مني التحدث عن هذه المسألة.
transliteration: hy la tryd mny altḥdth ʿn hdhh almsalh.

english: She left for America the day before yesterday.
She lost her only son in the traffic accident.
arabic: فقدتْ ابنها الوحيد في حادث مروري.
transliteration: fqdt abnha alwḥyd fy ḥadth mrwry.

english: Some people like baseball, others like soccer.
arabic: البعض يحب كرة القاعدة و البعض الآخر يحب كرة القدم.
transliteration: albʿḍ yḥb krh alqaʿdh w albʿḍ alākhr yḥb krh alqdm.

english: Stop taking pictures. You look like a tourist.
arabic: توقف عن اخذ الصور ، تبدو و كأنك سائح .
transliteration: twqf ʿn akhdh alṣwr ، tbdw w kank saئḥ .

english: The author of this article is a famous critic.
The church was built in the fifteenth century.
arabic: الكنيسة بُنيت في القرن الخامس عشر.
transliteration: alknysh bُnyt fy alqrn alkhams ʿshr.

english: The drug smuggler was arrested at the airport.
arabic: أُلقي القبض على مهرب المخدرات في المطار.
transliteration: aُlqy alqbḍ ʿlā mhrb almkhdrat fy almṭar.

english: The tourists were ripped off at the nightclub.
There's a coffee shop in front of the station.
This book is about a king who loses his crown.
arabic: يتحدث الكتاب عن ملك يفقد تاجه.
transliteration: ytḥdth alktab ʿn mlk yfqd tajh.

english: This book is about a king who loses his crown.
This bracelet is more expensive than that one.
This is the place where the battle took place.
Today is Saturday and tomorrow will be Sunday.
Tom and I have written several books together.
arabic: كتبنا أنا وتوم عدة كتب معا.
transliteration: ktbna ana wtwm ʿdh ktb mʿa.

english: Tom did his best to explain what had happened.
arabic: بذل توم ما بوسعه لشرح ما حدث.
transliteration: bdhl twm ma bwsʿh lshrḥ ma ḥdth.

english: Tom has a lot of money, but he has no friends.
arabic: لتوم الكثير من المال، ولكنه يفتقر للأصدقاء.
transliteration: ltwm alkthyr mn almal، wlknh yftqr llaṣdqaء.

english: Tom isn't the only one who missed the meeting.
arabic: لم يكن توم الوحيد الذي فوّت الاجتماع.
transliteration: lm ykn twm alwḥyd aldhy fwt alajtmaʿ.

english: Tom looked at himself in the rear-view mirror.
arabic: نظر توم لنفسه في مرآة الرؤية الخلفية.
transliteration: nẓr twm lnfsh fy mrāh alrؤyh alkhlfyh.

english: Tom opened his refrigerator and looked inside.
arabic: فتح توم ثلاجته و نظر داخلها.
transliteration: ftḥ twm thlajth w nẓr dakhlha.

english: Tom parked the truck in front of Mary's house.
arabic: ركن توم الشاحنة أمام منزل ماري.
transliteration: rkn twm alshaḥnh amam mnzl mary.

english: Tom told me he thought Mary wanted to do that.
arabic: توم أخبرني أنه اعتقد أن ماري تريد القيام بذلك
transliteration: twm akhbrny anh aʿtqd an mary tryd alqyam bdhlk

english: Tom told me he was planning to leave his wife.
arabic: توم اخبرني بانه يخطط لترك زوجته.
transliteration: twm akhbrny banh ykhṭṭ ltrk zwjth.

english: Tom wants Mary to know that she can trust him.
arabic: يريد توم أن تعرف ماري بأنها يمكنها الوثوق به.
transliteration: yryd twm an tʿrf mary banha ymknha alwthwq bh.

english: Tom was the most handsome man at Mary's party.
arabic: كان سامي أكثر الرجال أناقة في حفلة ليلى.
transliteration: kan samy akthr alrjal anaqh fy ḥflh lylā.

english: Traffic accidents are increasing year by year.
Traffic accidents are increasing year by year.
We have to do something about what's going on.
arabic: علينا القيام بشيء حيال ما يحصل.
transliteration: ʿlyna alqyam bshyء ḥyal ma yḥṣl.

english: We have very little time, so listen carefully.
arabic: ليس لدينا الكثير من الوقت لذا أنصت لي جيدا.
transliteration: lys ldyna alkthyr mn alwqt ldha anṣt ly jyda.

english: What made you say such a stupid thing as that?
arabic: مالذي جعلك تقول شيئا غبيا كهذا؟
transliteration: maldhy jʿlk tqwl shyئa ghbya khdha؟

english: When I got home, I found I had lost my wallet.
arabic: عندما عدت إلى المنزل ، اكتشفت أني أضعت محفظتي.
transliteration: ʿndma ʿdt ilā almnzl ، aktshft any aḍʿt mḥfẓty.

english: Which one do you prefer, this one or that one?
Which one do you prefer, this one or that one?
Why did you break up with your last boyfriend?
You are not in a position to ask for anything.
arabic: أنتَ لستُ في موقف يسمح لتسأل عن أي شئ.
transliteration: antَ lstُ fy mwqf ysmḥ ltsal ʿn ay shئ.

english: You are not in a position to ask for anything.
arabic: أنتَ لست في وضع يسمح لكي تسأل عن أي شئ.
transliteration: antَ lst fy wḍʿ ysmḥ lky tsal ʿn ay shئ.

english: You are undoubtedly the best swimmer among us.
arabic: بلا شك أنت السبّاح الأفضل بيننا.
transliteration: bla shk ant alsbaḥ alafḍl bynna.

english: You don't seem to know what's going to happen.
arabic: لا يَبدوا أَنَّكَ تَعرِفُ ما سَيَحصُل
transliteration: la yَbdwa aَnَkَ tَʿrِfُ ma sَyَḥṣُl

english: You have to learn to put up with this weather.
arabic: عليك أن تتعلم الصبر على هذا الجوّ.
transliteration: ʿlyk an ttʿlm alṣbr ʿlā hdha aljw.

english: You know that I'm in love with you, don't you?
arabic: انت تعلم اني احبك, اليس كذلك.
transliteration: ant tʿlm any aḥbk, alys kdhlk.

english: You must avoid making those kinds of mistakes.
arabic: يجب عليك تجنب مثل هذه الاخطاء
transliteration: yjb ʿlyk tjnb mthl hdhh alakhṭaء

english: You're definitely the best player on the team.
arabic: أنت حتماً اللاعب الأفضل في الفريق.
transliteration: ant ḥtmaan allaʿb alafḍl fy alfryq.

english: You're just running away from life's problems.
arabic: أنتَ فقط تهرب من مشاكل الحياة.
transliteration: antَ fqṭ thrb mn mshakl alḥyah.

english: You're just running away from life's problems.
arabic: أنتِ فقط تهربين من مشاكل الحياة.
transliteration: antِ fqṭ thrbyn mn mshakl alḥyah.

english: A woman like you doesn't deserve a man like me.
arabic: امرأةً مثلك لا تستحق رجلاً مثلي.
transliteration: amrahan mthlk la tstḥq rjlaan mthly.

english: All you have to do is to take care of yourself.
arabic: كل ما عليك فعله أن تنتبه لنفسك.
transliteration: kl ma ʿlyk fʿlh an tntbh lnfsk.

english: Almost every tourist carries a camera with him.
arabic: تقريباً يحمل جميع السياح آلة تصوير معهم.
transliteration: tqrybaan yḥml jmyʿ alsyaḥ ālh tṣwyr mʿhm.

english: Do you ever dream about flying through the sky?
arabic: هل سبق لك أن حلمت بالطيران في السماء؟
transliteration: hl sbq lk an ḥlmt balṭyran fy alsmaء؟

english: Does this letter have to be written in English?
arabic: هل يجب ان تُكتْب هذه الرسالة بالإنجليزية
transliteration: hl yjb an tُktb hdhh alrsalh balinjlyzyh

english: Don't forget to remind me to renew my passport.
Don't forget to return the book to the library.
arabic: لا تنس إعادة الكتاب إلى المكتبة.
transliteration: la tns iʿadh alktab ilā almktbh.

english: Don't worry about things that aren't important.
arabic: لا تقلق بشأن الأشياء الغير مهمة.
transliteration: la tqlq bshan alashyaء alghyr mhmh.

english: Everything was fine until Tom started drinking.
arabic: كل شيء كان على ما يرام حتى بدأ توم الشرب.
transliteration: kl shyء kan ʿlā ma yram ḥtā bda twm alshrb.

english: Have you ever borrowed money from your company?
arabic: هل سبق أن استدنت من شركتك؟
transliteration: hl sbq an astdnt mn shrktk؟

english: He saved the child at the risk of his own life.
He saved the child at the risk of his own life.
He told me that he wanted to leave the company.
He was foolish enough to believe what she said.
arabic: لقد كان أحمق بما يكفي ليصدق ما قالته.
transliteration: lqd kan aḥmq bma ykfy lyṣdq ma qalth.

english: He would tell me the truth, if I would ask him.
arabic: كان سيخبرني بالحقيقة إذا كنت سألته.
transliteration: kan sykhbrny balḥqyqh idha knt salth.

english: How many days does it usually take to get there?
arabic: كم يوماً تحتاج عادةً للوصول إلى هناك؟
transliteration: km ywmaan tḥtaj ʿadhan llwṣwl ilā hnak؟

english: How many suitcases are you taking on your trip?
I cook, but I don't do that with much pleasure.
arabic: أنا أطهو, ولكن لا أفعل هذا بمتعة كبيرة.
transliteration: ana aṭhw, wlkn la afʿl hdha bmtʿh kbyrh.

english: I cook, but I don't do that with much pleasure.
arabic: أنا أطبخ, لكن لا أفعل هذا بمتعة كبيرة.
transliteration: ana aṭbkh, lkn la afʿl hdha bmtʿh kbyrh.

english: I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.
arabic: لم أكن لأفعل ذلك من دون مساعدتك.
transliteration: lm akn lafʿl dhlk mn dwn msaʿdtk.

english: I don't think that Tom was hesitant to do that.
arabic: لا أعتقد أن توم كان مترددا في القيام بذلك.
transliteration: la aʿtqd an twm kan mtrdda fy alqyam bdhlk.

english: I found the problem easier than I had expected.
arabic: وجدت المشكلة أسهل مما كنت أتوقع.
transliteration: wjdt almshklh ashl mma knt atwqʿ.

english: I have a daughter who's married to a Frenchman.
arabic: لديُ إبنة متزوجه من رجل فرنسي.
transliteration: ldyُ ibnh mtzwjh mn rjl frnsy.

english: I have a feeling I've met her somewhere before.
arabic: يراودني إحساسٌ بأنّي قابلتها في مكانٍ ما سابقًا.
transliteration: yrawdny iḥsasun bany qabltha fy mkanin ma sabqana.

english: I have a friend whose father is a famous actor.
I like swimming, but I don't like to swim here.
arabic: أنا أحب السباحة, ولكن لا أحب أن أسبح هنا.
transliteration: ana aḥb alsbaḥh, wlkn la aḥb an asbḥ hna.

english: I never for a moment imagined that I would win.
arabic: لم أكن أتخيل للحظة أنني سوف أفوز.
transliteration: lm akn atkhyl llḥẓh anny swf afwz.

english: I wanted to go somewhere I'd never been before.
arabic: أردت الذهاب إلى مكان لم يسبق لي الذهاب إليه.
transliteration: ardt aldhhab ilā mkan lm ysbq ly aldhhab ilyh.

english: I'll get the money from Tom one way or another.
arabic: سأحصل على المال من توم بطرقة أو بأخرى.
transliteration: saḥṣl ʿlā almal mn twm bṭrqh aw bakhrā.

english: I'm afraid I have addressed the parcel wrongly.
arabic: أخشى أني أرسلت الطرد للعنوان الخطأ.
transliteration: akhshā any arslt alṭrd llʿnwan alkhṭa.

english: I'm going to teach you how to fish next Sunday.
arabic: سوف أعلمك كيفية صيد السمك الاحد المقبل.
transliteration: swf aʿlmk kyfyh ṣyd alsmk alaḥd almqbl.

english: I'm looking forward to doing business with you.
I'm not going to stop looking until I find Tom.
arabic: لن أتوقّف عن البحث حتّى أجد توم.
transliteration: ln atwqf ʿn albḥth ḥtā ajd twm.

english: I'm pretty sure I can do it one way or another.
arabic: أنا متأكد أني أستطيع أن أفعل هذا بطريقة أو بأخري.
transliteration: ana mtakd any astṭyʿ an afʿl hdha bṭryqh aw bakhry.

english: If you have nothing to do, why not read a book?
arabic: إن لم يكن هناك ما تفعله، لمَ لا تقرأ كتابا؟
transliteration: in lm ykn hnak ma tfʿlh، lmَ la tqra ktaba؟

english: Is it possible that it's already eight o'clock?
arabic: هل من الممكن أنها بالفعل الساعة الثامنة؟
transliteration: hl mn almmkn anha balfʿl alsaʿh althamnh؟

english: It is said that smoking is bad for your health.
It took me two hours to memorize this sentence.
arabic: أمضيت ساعتين و أنا أحفظ هذه الجملة.
transliteration: amḍyt saʿtyn w ana aḥfẓ hdhh aljmlh.

english: It was very kind of you to give me a nice gift.
arabic: كان لطفًا عظيمًا منك أن تهديني هديةً جميلةً.
transliteration: kan lṭfana ʿẓymana mnk an thdyny hdyhan jmylhan.

english: It was very kind of you to lend me an umbrella.
arabic: كان من عظيم لطفك أن أعرتني مظلةً.
transliteration: kan mn ʿẓym lṭfk an aʿrtny mẓlhan.

english: My father and mother were sitting under a tree.
arabic: كان أبي وأمي جالسين تحت شجرةٍ.
transliteration: kan aby wamy jalsyn tḥt shjrhin.

english: Nobody argued against choosing him as chairman.
arabic: لم يعارض أحد انتخابه كرئيس للمجلس.
transliteration: lm yʿarḍ aḥd antkhabh krئys llmjls.

english: One day, she told me that she wanted a pet cat.
arabic: أخبرتني ذات يوم أنها أرادت قطة أليفة.
transliteration: akhbrtny dhat ywm anha aradt qṭh alyfh.

english: One million people lost their lives in the war.
Perhaps you would have preferred a French dish.
Please leave a message on my answering machine.
arabic: رجاء اترك رسالة على المجيب الآلي.
transliteration: rjaء atrk rsalh ʿlā almjyb alāly.

english: Please tell me how I can get in touch with her.
arabic: من فضلك أخبرني كيف أكون على تواصل معها.
transliteration: mn fḍlk akhbrny kyf akwn ʿlā twaṣl mʿha.

english: Please tell me how I can get in touch with her.
arabic: من فضلِك أخبريني كيف أكون على تواصل معها.
transliteration: mn fḍlِk akhbryny kyf akwn ʿlā twaṣl mʿha.

english: Please tell me how I can get in touch with him.
arabic: أخبرني كيف أتصل به لو سمحت.
transliteration: akhbrny kyf atṣl bh lw smḥt.

english: She doesn't want me to speak about this matter.
arabic: هي لا تريدني أن أتحدث حول هذه المسألة.
transliteration: hy la trydny an atḥdth ḥwl hdhh almsalh.

english: She is well known both in Japan and in America.
arabic: إنها مشهورة في اليابان وأمريكا أيضًا.
transliteration: inha mshhwrh fy alyaban wamryka ayḍana.

english: Spending time with your children couldn't hurt.
arabic: قضاء وقت مع أطفالك لن يضر.
transliteration: qḍaء wqt mʿ aṭfalk ln yḍr.

english: Tell Tom that when he's finished, he can leave.
arabic: أخبر توم أنه يمكنه الذهاب عندما ينتهي.
transliteration: akhbr twm anh ymknh aldhhab ʿndma ynthy.

english: The bell had already rung when I got to school.
arabic: عند وصولي للمدرسة كان الجرس رن.
transliteration: ʿnd wṣwly llmdrsh kan aljrs rn.

english: The boy could not find his way out of the maze.
arabic: لم يستطع الفتى أن يجد طريق الخروج من المتاهة.
transliteration: lm ystṭʿ alftā an yjd ṭryq alkhrwj mn almtahh.

english: The concert concluded with the national anthem.
The heavy rain prevented us from going fishing.
arabic: منعنا المطر الغزير من الذهاب للصيد.
transliteration: mnʿna almṭr alghzyr mn aldhhab llṣyd.

english: The policeman arrested him for drunken driving.
arabic: اعتقله الشرطي لقيادته تحت تأثير الكحول.
transliteration: aʿtqlh alshrṭy lqyadth tḥt tathyr alkḥwl.

english: The rainy weather lasted for ten days straight.
arabic: استمر الجو الممطر عشرة أيام متواصلة.
transliteration: astmr aljw almmṭr ʿshrh ayam mtwaṣlh.

english: The tourists had to leave the town before dawn.
arabic: وجب على السياح مغادرة البلدة قبل حلول الفجر .
transliteration: wjb ʿlā alsyaḥ mghadrh albldh qbl ḥlwl alfjr .

english: There was absolutely no furniture in that room.
arabic: لم يكن هناك أي أثاث في الغرفة على الإطلاق.
transliteration: lm ykn hnak ay athath fy alghrfh ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: This is the village where I spent my childhood.
arabic: هذه هي القرية التي عشت فيها طفولتي.
transliteration: hdhh hy alqryh alty ʿsht fyha ṭfwlty.

english: Tom asked me if I knew how to get to his house.
arabic: .سألني توم إن كنت أعرف كيف أصل إلى منزله.
transliteration: .salny twm in knt aʿrf kyf aṣl ilā mnzlh.

english: Tom bought a pair of leather motorcycle gloves.
arabic: اشترى توم زوج قفازات دراجة نارية جلدية
transliteration: ashtrā twm zwj qfazat drajh naryh jldyh

english: Tom bought a pair of leather motorcycle gloves.
arabic: اشترى توم زوج قفازات جلدية للدراجة النارية
transliteration: ashtrā twm zwj qfazat jldyh lldrajh alnaryh

english: Tom didn't have any reason not to believe Mary.
arabic: لا يوجد أي سبب يدعو توم لئلا يصدق ماري.
transliteration: la ywjd ay sbb ydʿw twm lئla yṣdq mary.

english: Tom didn't have any reason not to believe Mary.
arabic: لا يوجد أي سبب يدعو توم لكي لا يصدق ماري.
transliteration: la ywjd ay sbb ydʿw twm lky la yṣdq mary.

english: Tom easily convinced Mary that he was innocent.
arabic: توم أقنع بسهولة ماري أنهُ كان بريئاً.
transliteration: twm aqnʿ bshwlh mary anhُ kan bryئaan.

english: Tom often complains about his mother's cooking.
arabic: غالبا ما يشكو توم من طهو أمه
transliteration: ghalba ma yshkw twm mn ṭhw amh

english: Tom often complains about his mother's cooking.
arabic: غالبا ما يتذمر توم من طهو أمه
transliteration: ghalba ma ytdhmr twm mn ṭhw amh

english: Tom often drives slightly over the speed limit.
arabic: غالباَ مايقود توم سيارته أسرع قليلا من الحد المسموح به
transliteration: ghalbaَ mayqwd twm syarth asrʿ qlyla mn alḥd almsmwḥ bh

english: Tom often drives slightly over the speed limit.
arabic: غالباَ ما يتجاوز توم حد السرعة بقيادته بشكل طفيف
transliteration: ghalbaَ ma ytjawz twm ḥd alsrʿh bqyadth bshkl ṭfyf

english: Tom said Mary was likely to still be terrified.
arabic: قال توم بأنه من المحتمل أن ماري لازالت مرتعبة.
transliteration: qal twm banh mn almḥtml an mary lazalt mrtʿbh.

english: Tom said that he thought Mary didn't like John.
arabic: قال توم إنه يعتقد أن ماري لم تحب جون.
transliteration: qal twm inh yʿtqd an mary lm tḥb jwn.

english: Tom spends about an hour a day studying French.
arabic: ينفق توم ساعة يوميا في تعلم الفرنسية.
transliteration: ynfq twm saʿh ywmya fy tʿlm alfrnsyh.

english: Tom told Mary that their relationship was over.
arabic: أخبر توم ماري بأن علاقتهما انتهت.
transliteration: akhbr twm mary ban ʿlaqthma antht.

english: What does the word "get" mean in this sentence?
arabic: ما الذي تعنيه كلمة "get" في هذه الجملة؟
transliteration: ma aldhy tʿnyh klmh "get" fy hdhh aljmlh؟

english: When I entered his room, he was reading a book.
arabic: عند دخولي إلى الغرفة كان مستغرقاً في قراءة كتاب.
transliteration: ʿnd dkhwly ilā alghrfh kan mstghrqaan fy qraءh ktab.

english: Wherever you go, you'll find Japanese tourists.
arabic: اينما تذهب ، سوف تجد سياح يابانيون .
transliteration: aynma tdhhb ، swf tjd syaḥ yabanywn .

english: Why do Muslims place such importance on burial?
Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
arabic: هل تريد أن تذهب إلى حديقة الحيوان بعد ظهر هذا اليوم؟
transliteration: hl tryd an tdhhb ilā ḥdyqh alḥywan bʿd ẓhr hdha alywm؟

english: You are young. I, on the other hand, am very old.
arabic: أنت شاب. أما أنا -فعلى العكس- طاعن في السن.
transliteration: ant shab. ama ana -fʿlā alʿks- ṭaʿn fy alsn.

english: You should distinguish between right and wrong.
arabic: ينبغي أن تميز بين الصحيح والخطأ.
transliteration: ynbghy an tmyz byn alṣḥyḥ walkhṭa.

english: You should read such books as will benefit you.
arabic: ينبغي أن تقرأ كتبًا مشابهةً إذ أنها نافعة لك.
transliteration: ynbghy an tqra ktbana mshabhhan idh anha nafʿh lk.

english: You shouldn't judge a person by his appearance.
arabic: يجب عليكَ أن لا تحكم علىَ شخص من مظهرهُ.
transliteration: yjb ʿlykَ an la tḥkm ʿlāَ shkhṣ mn mẓhrhُ.

english: You shouldn't judge a person by his appearance.
arabic: يجب عليكِ أن لا تحكمىِِ علىَ شخص من مظهرهُ.
transliteration: yjb ʿlykِ an la tḥkmāِِ ʿlāَ shkhṣ mn mẓhrhُ.

english: You were shouting at her and I don't like that.
arabic: لا أحب أن أراك تصرخ في وجهها.
transliteration: la aḥb an arak tṣrkh fy wjhha.

english: You won't get there on time if you don't hurry.
arabic: لن تصل هناك على الوقت إن لم تستعجل.
transliteration: ln tṣl hnak ʿlā alwqt in lm tstʿjl.

english: You're not going to like what I'm going to say.
You're not going to like what I'm going to say.
You're undoubtedly the best player on the team.
arabic: أنت بلاشك اللاعب الأفضل في الفريق.
transliteration: ant blashk allaʿb alafḍl fy alfryq.

english: A boy like Tom doesn't deserve a girl like Mary.
arabic: ولد مثل توم لا يستحق فتاة مثل ماري.
transliteration: wld mthl twm la ystḥq ftah mthl mary.

english: A boy like Tom doesn't deserve a girl like Mary.
arabic: ولد مثل توم لا يستحق بنت مثل ماري.
transliteration: wld mthl twm la ystḥq bnt mthl mary.

english: A child could not have understood the situation.
arabic: لم يكن لطفلٍ أن يفهم الموقف.
transliteration: lm ykn lṭflin an yfhm almwqf.

english: A known mistake is better than an unknown truth.
arabic: خطأ معلوم خيرٌ من حق مجهول.
transliteration: khṭa mʿlwm khyrun mn ḥq mjhwl.

english: A survey shows that many businessmen skip lunch.
arabic: إستطلاع يُظهر أن العديد من رجال الأعمال يتخطون الغداء.
transliteration: istṭlaʿ yُẓhr an alʿdyd mn rjal alaʿmal ytkhṭwn alghdaء.

english: Are there any English magazines in this library?
arabic: أتوجد مجلّات إنجليزيّة في هذه المكتبة؟
transliteration: atwjd mjlat injlyzyh fy hdhh almktbh؟

english: Are you sure we're going in the right direction?
arabic: هل أنتَ مُتأكِّد أنّنا نسير في الاتّجاه الصّحيح؟
transliteration: hl antَ mُtakِd anna nsyr fy alatjah alṣḥyḥ؟

english: Could you give me a hand in the kitchen, please?
Could you please speak a little bit more slowly?
arabic: أيمكنك أن تتحدث ببطئ من فضلك؟
transliteration: aymknk an ttḥdth bbṭئ mn fḍlk؟

english: Did you have a good time on your trip to London?
arabic: هل اسمتعت بوقتك في رحلتك إلى لندن؟
transliteration: hl asmtʿt bwqtk fy rḥltk ilā lndn؟

english: Don't challenge someone who has nothing to lose.
arabic: لا تتحدى من ليس لديه ما يخسره.
transliteration: la ttḥdā mn lys ldyh ma ykhsrh.

english: Everyone in the class learned the poem by heart.
arabic: حفظ جميع من في الصف القصيدة عن ظهر قلب.
transliteration: ḥfẓ jmyʿ mn fy alṣf alqṣydh ʿn ẓhr qlb.

english: Go to church with your parents and pray for her.
arabic: اذهب إلى الكنيسة مع والديك وادعُ لها.
transliteration: adhhb ilā alknysh mʿ waldyk wadʿُ lha.

english: Go to church with your parents and pray for her.
arabic: اذهب إلى الكنيسة مع والديك وصلّ لها.
transliteration: adhhb ilā alknysh mʿ waldyk wṣl lha.

english: He makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
arabic: هو لديه عادة أن يمشي كل صباح.
transliteration: hw ldyh ʿadh an ymshy kl ṣbaḥ.

english: He was laid off until there was more work to do.
arabic: أخرج من وظيفته إلى أن يجدوا مزيدا من الأعمال.
transliteration: akhrj mn wẓyfth ilā an yjdwa mzyda mn alaʿmal.

english: How long did it take you to translate this book?
arabic: كم من الوقت استغرقك لتترجم هذا الكتاب؟
transliteration: km mn alwqt astghrqk lttrjm hdha alktab؟

english: How much is the car that you're planning to buy?
arabic: كم ثمن السيارة اللتي تنوي أن تشتريها؟
transliteration: km thmn alsyarh allty tnwy an tshtryha؟

english: I cannot thank you enough for all your kindness.
arabic: أنا لا أستطيع شكرك بما يكفي على كل لطفك.
transliteration: ana la astṭyʿ shkrk bma ykfy ʿlā kl lṭfk.

english: I didn't want to say anything in Tom's presence.
arabic: لم أُرِد أن أقول أي شيء في وجود توم.
transliteration: lm aُrِd an aqwl ay shyء fy wjwd twm.

english: I find it hard to get up early on cold mornings.
arabic: من العسير علي أن أصحو باكراً في الايام الباردة .
transliteration: mn alʿsyr ʿly an aṣḥw bakraan fy alayam albardh .

english: I found the hotel crowded with foreign tourists.
arabic: لقد وجدت الفندق مزدحم بالسياح الاجانب .
transliteration: lqd wjdt alfndq mzdḥm balsyaḥ alajanb .

english: I heard a crash at about ten o'clock last night.
arabic: سمعت صوت اصطدام حوالي العاشرة ليلة الأمس.
transliteration: smʿt ṣwt aṣṭdam ḥwaly alʿashrh lylh alams.

english: I looked Tom in the eyes and told him the truth.
arabic: أنا نظرت في أعيُن توم وأخبرتةُ الحقيقة.
transliteration: ana nẓrt fy aʿyُn twm wakhbrthُ alḥqyqh.

english: I never wanted you to get involved in this mess.
arabic: لم أرغب أبداً أن تتورط فى هذهِ الفوضىَ.
transliteration: lm arghb abdaan an ttwrṭ fā hdhhِ alfwḍāَ.

english: I remember hearing a very similar story to that.
I think this dictionary is useful for beginners.
arabic: أرى أن هذا المعجم مفيد للمبتدئين.
transliteration: arā an hdha almʿjm mfyd llmbtdئyn.

english: I wish she would stop playing that stupid music.
arabic: أتمنى أن تتوقف عن تشغيل تلك الموسيقى الغبية.
transliteration: atmnā an ttwqf ʿn tshghyl tlk almwsyqā alghbyh.

english: I'm not satisfied with the quality of your work.
arabic: أنا لستُ راضياً عن جودةِ عملكَ.
transliteration: ana lstُ raḍyaan ʿn jwdhِ ʿmlkَ.

english: I'm really looking forward to tonight's concert.
I'm sick of hearing the same thing all the time.
arabic: سئمت من سماع نفس الموشّح دائمًا.
transliteration: sئmt mn smaʿ nfs almwshḥ daئmana.

english: I'm sorry I wasn't able to attend Tom's funeral.
arabic: أنا أسف لعدم قدرتي لحضور عزاء توم.
transliteration: ana asf lʿdm qdrty lḥḍwr ʿzaء twm.

english: I'm sorry to have caused you such inconvenience.
arabic: أعتذر عن ما سببته لك من متاعب.
transliteration: aʿtdhr ʿn ma sbbth lk mn mtaʿb.

english: I'm sure Tom would never do something like that.
arabic: متأكد أن توم لن يفعل شيئا كهذا.
transliteration: mtakd an twm ln yfʿl shyئa khdha.

english: I'm trying my best to forget that ever happened.
arabic: أنا أقوم بكل ما بوسعي لأنسى أنّ ذلك قد حدث.
transliteration: ana aqwm bkl ma bwsʿy lansā an dhlk qd ḥdth.

english: I'm very ashamed of myself about what I've done.
If Tom finds out I told you this, he'll kill me.
arabic: سيقتلني توم إن عرف أنّي قلتُ لكَ هذا.
transliteration: syqtlny twm in ʿrf any qltُ lkَ hdha.

english: If Tom finds out I told you this, he'll kill me.
arabic: سيقتلني توم إن عرف أنّي قلتُ لكِ هذا.
transliteration: syqtlny twm in ʿrf any qltُ lkِ hdha.

english: If her temperature goes up, send for the doctor.
It didn't really happen the way Tom said it did.
arabic: لم يحدث ذلك كما قال توم
transliteration: lm yḥdth dhlk kma qal twm

english: It is impossible to finish the report in a week.
It is impossible to finish the report in a week.
arabic: يستحيل إنهاء التقرير في غضون أسبوع.
transliteration: ystḥyl inhaء altqryr fy ghḍwn asbwʿ.

english: Japan has economically become a powerful nation.
Never swim while under the influence of alcohol.
arabic: إياك أن تسبح تحت تأثير الكحول.
transliteration: iyak an tsbḥ tḥt tathyr alkḥwl.

english: No matter what you do, you have to do your best.
arabic: لا يهم ما تفعله, يجب عليك أن تفعل أفضل ما لديك.
transliteration: la yhm ma tfʿlh, yjb ʿlyk an tfʿl afḍl ma ldyk.

english: Please forgive me for not having written sooner.
Please inform me of any change in his condition.
arabic: الرجاء ابلاغي عن أي تغيير في حالته.
transliteration: alrjaء ablaghy ʿn ay tghyyr fy ḥalth.

english: That guy who was just here gave me this for you.
arabic: الشاب الذي كان هنا أعطاني هذه لك.
transliteration: alshab aldhy kan hna aʿṭany hdhh lk.

english: The accident happened because he wasn't careful.
arabic: لقد حدث هذا الحادث بسبب إهماله
transliteration: lqd ḥdth hdha alḥadth bsbb ihmalh

english: The accident happened right in front of my eyes.
The child's face glowed when he saw Santa Claus.
arabic: أشرق وجه الطفل حين رأى بابا نويل.
transliteration: ashrq wjh alṭfl ḥyn raā baba nwyl.

english: The force of the wind made it difficult to walk.
The kidnappers tied Tom's hands behind his back.
arabic: ربط الخاطفون يدي توم خلف ظهره.
transliteration: rbṭ alkhaṭfwn ydy twm khlf ẓhrh.

english: The only thing constant in this world is change.
arabic: الشيء الوحيد الثابت في هذا العالم هو التغيير.
transliteration: alshyء alwḥyd althabt fy hdha alʿalm hw altghyyr.

english: The people of Boston hated the British soldiers.
The problem is that solar energy costs too much.
arabic: المشكلة أن الطاقة الشمسية تكلف كثيرا.
transliteration: almshklh an alṭaqh alshmsyh tklf kthyra.

english: There was only a little milk left in the bottle.
arabic: كان هناك قليل من الحليب المتبقي في الزجاجة.
transliteration: kan hnak qlyl mn alḥlyb almtbqy fy alzjajh.

english: There's a drinking fountain by the tennis court.
arabic: هناك نافورة ماء للشرب قرب ملعب التنس.
transliteration: hnak nafwrh maء llshrb qrb mlʿb altns.

english: They usually go to school from Monday to Friday.
arabic: عادةً ما يذهبون إلى المدرسة من الاثنين الى الجمعة.
transliteration: ʿadhan ma ydhhbwn ilā almdrsh mn alathnyn alā aljmʿh.

english: This book is too difficult for me to understand.
arabic: يصعب عليّ جدا أن أفهم هذا الكتاب.
transliteration: yṣʿb ʿly jda an afhm hdha alktab.

english: This is the first time for me to read the Bible.
arabic: هذه أول مرة أقرأ فيها الكتاب المقدس.
transliteration: hdhh awl mrh aqra fyha alktab almqds.

english: This is the place where the incident took place.
Tom didn't have to tell me, but I'm glad he did.
arabic: لم يكن على توم إخباري، لكني مسرورة لأنه فعل.
transliteration: lm ykn ʿlā twm ikhbary، lkny msrwrh lanh fʿl.

english: Tom doesn't seem to want to go to bed right now.
arabic: لايبدو أن توم يريد الذهاب للفراش الآن
transliteration: laybdw an twm yryd aldhhab llfrash alān

english: Tom found that he couldn't study with the TV on.
arabic: أدرك توم بأنه لا يستطيع الدراسة إن كان التلفاز يعمل.
transliteration: adrk twm banh la ystṭyʿ aldrash in kan altlfaz yʿml.

english: Tom pretended that he didn't know what was happening.
arabic: تظاهر توم بأنه يجهل ما كان يحدث.
transliteration: tẓahr twm banh yjhl ma kan yḥdth.

english: Tom said that he thought I should do that today.
arabic: قال توم إنه يعتقد أنني يجب أن أفعل ذلك اليوم.
transliteration: qal twm inh yʿtqd anny yjb an afʿl dhlk alywm.

english: Tom spent three years in prison for what he did.
arabic: لقد أمضى توم 3 أعوام في السجن جزاءاَ لما قام به
transliteration: lqd amḍā twm 3 aʿwam fy alsjn jzaءaَ lma qam bh

english: Tom told Mary that she shouldn't go there alone.
arabic: أخبر توم ماري بأنها لا يجب أن تذهب إلى هناك بمفردها.
transliteration: akhbr twm mary banha la yjb an tdhhb ilā hnak bmfrdha.

english: Tom wanted to take me to a dance, but I said no.
arabic: اراد توم ان ياخذني للرقص ، ولكني قلت لا
transliteration: arad twm an yakhdhny llrqṣ ، wlkny qlt la

english: Trust yourself and follow your heart to the end.
arabic: ثق بنفسك واتبع قلبك حتي النهاية.
transliteration: thq bnfsk watbʿ qlbk ḥty alnhayh.

english: We can't see ultraviolet light, but insects can.
arabic: لا نسطيع رؤية الأشعّة فوق البنفسجيّة، لكنّ الحشرات تستطيع أن تراها.
transliteration: la nsṭyʿ rؤyh alashʿh fwq albnfsjyh، lkn alḥshrat tstṭyʿ an traha.

english: What time did you leave your house this morning?
What would you do if you were ten years younger?
arabic: ماذا كنتَ ستفعلُ لو كنت أصغر بعشر سنين؟
transliteration: madha kntَ stfʿlُ lw knt aṣghr bʿshr snyn؟

english: What would you do if you were ten years younger?
arabic: ماذا كنتِ ستفعلينَ لو كُنتِ أصغر بعشر سنين؟
transliteration: madha kntِ stfʿlynَ lw kُntِ aṣghr bʿshr snyn؟

english: Why do girls care so much about what guys think?
arabic: لماذا تهتم البنات بما يفكّر الأولاد لهذه الدرجة؟
transliteration: lmadha thtm albnat bma yfkr alawlad lhdhh aldrjh؟

english: Why is taking pictures of trains so interesting?
arabic: لماذا قد يكون أخذ صور للقطارات مثيرًا؟
transliteration: lmadha qd ykwn akhdh ṣwr llqṭarat mthyrana؟

english: You always said you wanted to live in Australia.
arabic: كنت تقول دائما انك تريد العيش في استراليا.
transliteration: knt tqwl daئma ank tryd alʿysh fy astralya.

english: You know that we don't have much time right now.
arabic: ليس أمامنا وقت لهذا كما تعلم.
transliteration: lys amamna wqt lhdha kma tʿlm.

english: You know why I don't have to do that, don't you?
arabic: تعلم لم أنا لست مضطرّا للقيام بهذا، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: tʿlm lm ana lst mḍṭra llqyam bhdha، alys kdhlk؟

english: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.
arabic: ستتفاجأ حين ترى ما تستطيع تعلمه في أسبوع.
transliteration: sttfaja ḥyn trā ma tstṭyʿ tʿlmh fy asbwʿ.

english: You're not old enough to get a driver's license.
arabic: لست كبيرا بما يكفي لتحصل علي رخصة قيادة.
transliteration: lst kbyra bma ykfy ltḥṣl ʿly rkhṣh qyadh.

english: All I want to do right now is sit here and relax.
arabic: ما أريده الآن هو الجلوس والاسترخاء.
transliteration: ma arydh alān hw aljlws walastrkhaء.

english: Did you receive the message I sent you yesterday?
arabic: هل إستلمتَ الرسالة التي أرسلتها لكَ بالأمس؟
transliteration: hl istlmtَ alrsalh alty arsltha lkَ balams؟

english: Do you remember the day when we saw the accident?
arabic: هل تذكر اليوم الذي رأينا فيه الحادث؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr alywm aldhy rayna fyh alḥadth؟

english: Do you remember the day when you and I first met?
arabic: هل تذكر اليوم الذي تقابلنا فيه أنا وأنت أول مرة؟
transliteration: hl tdhkr alywm aldhy tqablna fyh ana want awl mrh؟

english: He doesn't mean to be mean. It's just his nature.
arabic: إنه لا يقصد أن يعامل الآخرين بقسوة. إنها طبيعته فحسب.
transliteration: inh la yqṣd an yʿaml alākhryn bqswh. inha ṭbyʿth fḥsb.

english: His father consented to my plan against his will.
arabic: وافق أبوه على خطتي رغما عنه.
transliteration: wafq abwh ʿlā khṭty rghma ʿnh.

english: I agree with you that the actor is very talented.
arabic: أوافقك الرأي أن الممثل موهوب جدا.
transliteration: awafqk alray an almmthl mwhwb jda.

english: I always carry a bottle of mineral water with me.
arabic: أحمل معي قنينة مياه معدنيّة دومًا.
transliteration: aḥml mʿy qnynh myah mʿdnyh dwmana.

english: I called my friend after arriving at the station.
arabic: اتصلت بصديقي بعد أن وصلتُ إلى المحطة.
transliteration: atṣlt bṣdyqy bʿd an wṣltُ ilā almḥṭh.

english: I don't have a prejudice against foreign workers.
arabic: ليست لدي أحكام مسبقة ضد العمال الأجانب.
transliteration: lyst ldy aḥkam msbqh ḍd alʿmal alajanb.

english: I don't know what to say to make you feel better.
arabic: لا أعرف ماذا أقول لأجعلك تشعر بشعور أفضل.
transliteration: la aʿrf madha aqwl lajʿlk tshʿr bshʿwr afḍl.

english: I had a problem similar to that not too long ago.
I have the feeling that I've met that guy before.
arabic: يراودني إحساسٌ بأنّي قابلتُ ذاك الفتى سابقًا.
transliteration: yrawdny iḥsasun bany qabltُ dhak alftā sabqana.

english: I ought to have made a hotel reservation earlier.
arabic: كان علي أن أحجز في الفندق مسبقا.
transliteration: kan ʿly an aḥjz fy alfndq msbqa.

english: I told you the truth when I told you I loved you.
arabic: أخبرتك بالحقيقة عندما بُحت بحبي لك.
transliteration: akhbrtk balḥqyqh ʿndma bُḥt bḥby lk.

english: I was very thirsty and I wanted to drink something cold.
arabic: كنت عطشاناً فأردت أن أشرب شيئاً بارداً.
transliteration: knt ʿṭshanaan fardt an ashrb shyئaan bardaan.

english: I'll never forget the experience I had yesterday.
arabic: لن أنس أبدا التّجربة التي عشتها البارحة.
transliteration: ln ans abda altjrbh alty ʿshtha albarḥh.

english: I'm hungry, so I'm going to get something to eat.
arabic: أنا جائع، لذلك سأذهب لتناول بعض الطعام.
transliteration: ana jaئʿ، ldhlk sadhhb ltnawl bʿḍ alṭʿam.

english: It is important to remember who your friends are.
arabic: من المهم أن تتذكر من هم أصدقاؤك.
transliteration: mn almhm an ttdhkr mn hm aṣdqaؤk.

english: It'll be easy to find someone to do that for you.
arabic: سيكون من السهل إيجاد شخص يقوم بذلك من أجلك.
transliteration: sykwn mn alshl iyjad shkhṣ yqwm bdhlk mn ajlk.

english: It's a good idea to see a doctor once in a while.
arabic: إنّها لفكرة جيّدة أن يزور المرأ طبيبا من حين لآخر.
transliteration: inha lfkrh jydh an yzwr almra ṭbyba mn ḥyn lākhr.

english: Let's just pretend like we don't know each other.
arabic: دعونا فقط نتظاهر كأننا لا نعرف بعضنا البعض.
transliteration: dʿwna fqṭ ntẓahr kanna la nʿrf bʿḍna albʿḍ.

english: Let's just pretend like we don't know each other.
arabic: دعنا فقط نتظاهر وكأننا لا نعرف بعضنا البعض.
transliteration: dʿna fqṭ ntẓahr wkanna la nʿrf bʿḍna albʿḍ.

english: Let's just pretend like we don't know each other.
arabic: دعينا فقط نتظاهر وكأننا لا نعرف بعضنا البعض.
transliteration: dʿyna fqṭ ntẓahr wkanna la nʿrf bʿḍna albʿḍ.

english: Mary is cute, but I don't think she's very smart.
arabic: ماري جميلة، لكن لا أظن أنها ذكية جدا.
transliteration: mary jmylh، lkn la aẓn anha dhkyh jda.

english: My doctor told me that I should drink more water.
arabic: أخبرني الطبيب أن علي شرب المزيد من المياه.
transliteration: akhbrny alṭbyb an ʿly shrb almzyd mn almyah.

english: My father was about to leave when the phone rang.
arabic: كان أبي على وشك أن يغادر عندما رن جرس الهاتف.
transliteration: kan aby ʿlā wshk an yghadr ʿndma rn jrs alhatf.

english: Our website is offline for scheduled maintenance.
arabic: موقعنا على الوِب متوقّف للصيانة المجدولة.
transliteration: mwqʿna ʿlā alwِb mtwqf llṣyanh almjdwlh.

english: Parents need to encourage their children to read.
arabic: على الوالدين تشجيع أبناءهم على القراءة.
transliteration: ʿlā alwaldyn tshjyʿ abnaءhm ʿlā alqraءh.

english: Please give me a pencil and some sheets of paper.
arabic: من فضلك أعطني قلماً و بضعة أوراق.
transliteration: mn fḍlk aʿṭny qlmaan w bḍʿh awraq.

english: Some children were playing frisbee near the pond.
arabic: بعض الاطفال كانو يلعبون لعبة الصحن الطائر قرب البركة .
transliteration: bʿḍ alaṭfal kanw ylʿbwn lʿbh alṣḥn alṭaئr qrb albrkh .

english: Thanks to the bad weather, the game was canceled.
That was probably what influenced their decision.
arabic: كان ذلك على الأرجح ما أثّرَ على قرارِهِم.
transliteration: kan dhlk ʿlā alarjḥ ma athrَ ʿlā qrarِhِm.

english: The band upped the number of shows in their tour.
arabic: زادت الفرقة الموسيقية عدد الحفلات في جولتها.
transliteration: zadt alfrqh almwsyqyh ʿdd alḥflat fy jwltha.

english: The odds against that happening are astronomical.
arabic: هناك احتمال ضعيف جدا أن يحدث ذلك.
transliteration: hnak aḥtmal ḍʿyf jda an yḥdth dhlk.

english: The one who uses this toothbrush isn't my mother.
arabic: الشخص الذي يستخدم فرشاة الأسنان هذه ليس أمي.
transliteration: alshkhṣ aldhy ystkhdm frshah alasnan hdhh lys amy.

english: The problem was that I had nothing to say to him.
arabic: المشكلة هي أنني لم يكن لديّ ما أقوله له.
transliteration: almshklh hy anny lm ykn ldy ma aqwlh lh.

english: The program will finish with the national anthem.
The vote was twenty-eight for and twenty against.
arabic: كانت نتيجة التصويت 28 صوتا بنعم و 20 بلا.
transliteration: kant ntyjh altṣwyt 28 ṣwta bnʿm w 20 bla.

english: There are a few apples on the tree, aren't there?
arabic: هناك القليل من التفاح على الشجرة ، أليس كذلك؟
transliteration: hnak alqlyl mn altfaḥ ʿlā alshjrh ، alys kdhlk؟

english: There's no need to hurry. We have plenty of time.
arabic: ليس هناك حاجة للاستعجال. لدينا متسع من الوقت.
transliteration: lys hnak ḥajh llastʿjal. ldyna mtsʿ mn alwqt.

english: This book hasn't yet been translated into French.
arabic: لم يُترجم هذا الكتاب إلى الفرنسية بعد.
transliteration: lm yُtrjm hdha alktab ilā alfrnsyh bʿd.

english: This drawing dates back to the fifteenth century.
arabic: هذا الرسم يعود تاريخه الى القرن الخامس عشر.
transliteration: hdha alrsm yʿwd tarykhh alā alqrn alkhams ʿshr.

english: This flower is the most beautiful of all flowers.
arabic: هذه الوردة هي أجمل الورود على الإطلاق.
transliteration: hdhh alwrdh hy ajml alwrwd ʿlā aliṭlaq.

english: This one's crowded, so let's take the next train.
This project will take at least a year to finish.
This project will take at least a year to finish.
arabic: سيستغرق إنهاء المشروع سنةً على الأقل.
transliteration: systghrq inhaء almshrwʿ snhan ʿlā alaql.

english: Tom brushes his teeth at least three times a day.
arabic: توم ينظف أسنانه بالفرشاة ثلاث مرات على الأقل يومياَ
transliteration: twm ynẓf asnanh balfrshah thlath mrat ʿlā alaql ywmyaَ

english: Tom noticed a police car in the rear-view mirror.
arabic: لاحظ توم سيارة الشرطة في مرآة الرؤية الخلفية.
transliteration: laḥẓ twm syarh alshrṭh fy mrāh alrؤyh alkhlfyh.

english: Tom told me he wanted me to learn how to do that.
arabic: أخبرني توم بأنه أراد مني أن أتعلم كيف أفعل ذلك.
transliteration: akhbrny twm banh arad mny an atʿlm kyf afʿl dhlk.

english: Tom wanted to explain, but Mary wouldn't let him.
arabic: أراد توم التوضيح ولكن ماري لم تدعه.
transliteration: arad twm altwḍyḥ wlkn mary lm tdʿh.

english: We must finish everything before Tuesday morning.
arabic: يجب علينا إنهاء كل شيء قبل صباح الثلاثاء.
transliteration: yjb ʿlyna inhaء kl shyء qbl ṣbaḥ althlathaء.

english: What did you do when you got back home yesterday?
arabic: ماذا فعلت عندما رجعت إلى منزلك أمس؟
transliteration: madha fʿlt ʿndma rjʿt ilā mnzlk ams؟

english: What gives you the right to talk to me like that?
